Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great, it's very loud. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great...it will last upto 6-7hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 40mins. Connectivity is fine within 15ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money"

name: Mridul
title: Poor build-up quality and low bass.
content: Build-up quality is average types... bricks are made up of poor quality plastic and buttons are also not that great.. I myself bought this product after seeing such an excellent reviews but now i wonder.... what made them write such thing.. From my experience i am saying....the Bass is very low apart from that treble and medium is also ok types. If you want high bass and premium look then this product is not for you.

name: Ankush
title: Poor quality Boult audio probass neckband.
content: When I first baught this product around7-8 months back,I am impressed with boult audio,the sound quality,the flexibility of the neck band,the bass.So I planned to buy another one but this time the product quality is worst,there is no vibration when it powered on or incoming call,the quality of neck band is also getting bad.The bluetooth connectivity is also not good as I have to pair again and again,because it is not autopair with the device.So I returned this product after one day use.. I am really not impressed with boult quality this time.

name: Supriya Sankar
title: Disappointing
content: Doest connect to more than one at a time. Microphone can't catch our voice until we keep on the mouth. If you only want to listen to music or watch movies then fine . If you want have phone conversation just search for something else.

name: SAYAAüñ§
title: Best quality
content: This product is best in this price range.. Built quality is durable. Wire adjustment is very nice it fits comfortably on neck. Sound quality is best for this price range Bass is. average, balanced sound,but the overall experience is too good.. Battery backup is really good; 8 to 10 hours continues play. (Depends on volume level)...Charge time 2 hours fully charge by 1.0 Amp. charger. Red stable light indicator when changing and Blue stable light when battery gets charged. ...3D sound is really good but it found on high volume. the noise cancellation feature is average.

name: Harsha Vardhan
title: Bluetooth range is very bad and gets some disconnections while walking
content: Edit: Mine stopped working in 2 months and it is not connecting to any bluetooth device now.. Pros:. Sound Clarity is good,. comfortable to use. Good battery life. Cons:. Very bad bluetooth connectivity and range. While walking it keeps on disconnecting. While travelling if you keep mobile in pocket, then also it keeps disconnecting. Buy only if you want it to use in indoor and with stable range

name: Vignesh
title: Worst...Worst ...Worst Headset ever !
content: It's a worst Bluetooth headset ever I have seen it will not cost more then 300rs for its quality..Very worst... IAM using this for the second day and when it is connected showing in mobile and IAM not able to hear anything ...No return option for this... Very bad decisions I have ever made... Amazon I want to return the headset pls help me..

name: SAIKAT HALDER
title: Overall good product.
content: Received this product on 29th Nov'20, purchased date was 27th Nov'20.. Using it from last 17days, overall experience are good.. Pros.:. Voice calling good.. Music Sound good.. Bass okay.. Noise cancelation during Voice calls good.. Till now no practical experience about IP-rating.. Cons.:. Only cons. till now, I found poor packaging when I received this.

name: Dilip Kumar Misra
title: Bad Product
content: Just after using 2 months now, the battery exhausts within half an hour even after a full charge and switching off. Due to its light weight, the instruments vibrates a lot when there is an incoming call. Since the return window time is closed now, therefore there is no opportunity for a replacement and refund. Suggesting, to avoid this product.

name: sanjiv
title: Great product at this price range - life of a year
content: Brought this many months back, and it's working perfectly. Use it very often for listening to music and for phone calls. Good sound quality and a bit of noise cancellation. One charge lasts 5-6 days with 3-4 hours of use per day. Worth the money. Update in May 2020. Unit stopped charging and died.RIP.

name: Amol Ghule
title: Within 7 days product not working
content: Do not buy this product....very cheap quality.. Within 7 days the product not working and asking for warranty product to be sent at Delhi and that is to be on own courier charges..In india only one service center that is in Delhi.... Additional feedback : After lot of discussion I have decided to dispatch it after 7 day's I received product and it's found second hand used product they given me..they are playing with Customers..so humble request to all of you pls do not buy this product... As per the warranty policy faulty Parts to be replaced but here product has been replaced and provided second hand ..

name: Vijay
title: Beyond my expectations
content: Although I returned it on Amazon & bought from somewhere else but I must say this product is really worth every penny for music lovers.. It provides everything an expensive headphone can deliver.. It has crisp sound, better connectivity, good noise isolation & good low & high output.. Thank you.

name: Abhay Gavali
title: Completely satisfying purchase.
content: Giving good battery backup upto more than 15 hrs. The sound quality is awesome.. Bass quality is awesome and boosted.. Build quality is great. Easily connects to smart phone and laptop. Design quality is very good and as product is curve pro so comfortably suits to neck.. This is very good noise cancellation earphone.. Provides good sound effects while listening to MP3 songs. Really good choice for travellers, online video conferences and whine doing exercise in gym. Comfortably fits in the ears.. Conclusion: This is the best ear phone one can get in this price.

name: Jaideep Singh Rathore
title: Not the product which is described. Could be a fake.
content: Well the connectivity was good.. Voice through the micro phone was not that great.. Bass was not their, treble was on a higher side.. No vibration of any sort as they claim.. Built quality is not the best, every time you plug in the ear buds you can make out the cheap quality used.. Better to go for MI or boat.. I had to return it immediately due to false commitment made in the description.

name: Mohamed Yasar
title: Great product worthy for the price budget
content: Boult probass curve Bluetooth neckband was a good product worth for the price. I am using it for the past 6-7 months and it was good experience. And the boult audio customer support is also very good as i had some issue with the earphone the had gave a good support and gave an replacement for my earphone my experience was good with the boult audio and i strongly recommend to buy this earphones

name: Ganesh
title: good for video and audio but not good for calls
content: good and recommended if you are only going to use it for video and audio from mobile or pc/laptop.. But not recommended for calls, as sometimes there is problem with audio wherein the audio is something like waves, not clear enough. Even tried replacement but even the replacement piece had the same issue did not replace it further.

name: prathyusha
title: Got Defective product also got item with seal already opened and no user manual inside.
content: Waste of money , horrible product . Not working properly . I didn't get a brand new product , Bluetooth head set package seal was already opened and no user manual inside .. Issue with the seller :. I got package from Amazon and Amazon packing seems to be good but after I opened the Amazon package, I noticed that Bluetooth headset packing seal was broken , after I opened the package I noticed that no user manual inside , I suspect that they replaced original one with defective or some already used product . I lost confidence on this seller and eventually on Amazon to encouraging these kind of sellers.. Issue with product :. Item is not working properly . I kept charging for the whole day and still struggling to turn on it . After several attempts ( easily I tried for at least 30 times ) I was able to turn it on and after turn on it when we click on volume buttons again Bluetooth is turning off. Horrible product . And from then i couldn't turn on it till now . I am very much disappointed with this product . It's waste of money

name: Anil Raj
title: Don't buy this product. Wrost quality and service.
content: 1 st time I got defective product (not working) within 10 days replaced with new one.. After 6 months I face sound quality issues and and Bluetooth cable was low grade after it was broken both sides.. Product in 1 year warranty. I discussed with Amazon team they simply said spoke to Boult service.. Boult service was very bad I courier buletooth to Boult service team delhi. it completed almost 1 month process but my problem was not resolved and im not get any update from Boult.. I had discussed with Boult team and send reminder mails also but no use.. Don't buy this product and don't weast your valuable time.

name: ankit
title: Not Satisfied with customer service, fake warranty
content: Product is ok but after using it for few month it stopped working , first i send t product to company for service but they return same product , then after few days company service center call me to send product again for better repairement . I send again this time to repair , now old problem is solved but sound from the devices become too low to hear so another problem.. Better if company provided new product but they did repair and give another problem which is not satisfactory.

name: Rajesh Kumar
title: Awesome Earphones
content: Highly stretchable neckband. Comfort 10/10. Sound 9/10. Noise Cancellation 7/10. Bass 7/10. Bluetooth Connectivity 9/10. Range 8-9 m. Very light, you can also sleep wearing this neckband.. Very good mic quality.. Buttons are also of good quality.. Battery Backup 10 to 12 hours at 60 to 70 % volume and after charging 1.5 ¬± 0.2 hours (approx). No vibration alert, this increases it's battery backup.. You can buy it at ‚Çπ900 to 1000, it's worth in that price range.. Overall 8.5/10. At ‚Çπ900, 9/10

name: Deven singh
title: Pathetic.. please read the review
content: I bought the bluetooth not 2 months back and I started facing issues in 1st week itself. In the end, to end my agony, i contacted customer care and they told me to courier it to Delhi and wait for 10 working days. I did as asked and when I received my device back, it was worse than before and when I tried to contact them, they didn't respond. ( no answers to mail until 3rd day). They said their senior will contact me and it's been two days for that. they are asking me to send it again(through mail) for repair. It's really bad and it's been a waste of money. I bought it for 1299‚Çπ as suggested by my friend

name: Rupesh S.
title: Fantastic buy.
content: Pro's. 1. it's super light weight. U wouldn't even feel there's something sitting on ur neck.. 2. U can adjust the size of the ear piece wire which is awesome. It need not keep hanging all the way down all the time.. 3. Sound out put, bass, noise cancellation is all awesome. I was Neva keeping it at full volume even while driving. It's that good.. 4. Battery life is fantastic. 1.5 to 2 days easily.. Cons. The only con is that the build quality doesn't look very premium for some reason. Not that it looks cheap but doesn't feel premium either. That's all.

name: Manni
title: Disappointed!!!üòê
content: When i got it firstly, i was very impressed by sound quality and its perfectly fits in your ear but problem starts when i am doing audio aur video call it was distorted, a lot of electronic noise came at the time of calling.. I gave it another shot and replace it and guess what the model i got was the older one this time which had vibration feature. It had connection issue even in 1 or 2 meter range its bluetooth got break and connect which is quite annoying.. And now finally im returning it, Boult Audio your product was good but work on these small things, it makes a lot of differnce.

name: Lakshay
title: Probably best in this price range
content: So here is the thing.. i got the reference of these earphones from a colleague at work.. i was looking to buy a Bluetooth Earphones and he suggested me this... After using this for a week. : Sound quality is best, i mean it catches all the sounds happening in a song.. :Bass is not too much high but if you're like me and dont need extreme boom so you're welcome yo buy.. : maybe uncomfortable for some on y'all but they provide you extra earbuds so adjust according to your need... :battery backup is real deal here. Its actually so good that i can use it without thinking about charging... :It is Water resistant, iam a sweaty guy and i have seen sweat gone inside but still works fine after few blows... so if you're looking for bluetooth earphones under 1500.. I can't suggest you bettet than this..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boult service is very pathetic
content: It stopped working in just 45 days. Contacted boult service Center and they asked to ship it to their Center in Delhi. I already did it and paid courier charges as well. However, still waiting to hear on this from boult service. This is waste of time and money both. I would recommend not to buy boult products as you will end up with frustration. Go with some good brands...

name: BHIM SEN RAJPUT
title: Don't buy this Product ,No response from Supplier
content: I purchased this item in June , after 4 month I giving review ‚Äì. 1‚ÄìSound & Bass etc ok üëç. 2‚ÄìAmazon dilivery service was ok üëç. 3‚ÄìNow after 4 Month Earphone is not charging ,No LED status showing when plugged for charging.. 4‚ÄìWorst response from Boult Audio customer care , I tried to call Boult but as soon as I presses 1 option to register new complaint ,call disconnect itself.. 5‚ÄìSame issue mailed to Supplier but no update till now , I didn't receive any mail .üëé

name: S. Navin
title: Close your eyes üëÄ and purchase .. Awesomeness
content: Audio makers should learn from BOULT. Marvellous earphone.. So far I used many headset, even the 15k Sony and skull candy Sean I used haven‚Äôt sounded this good. This is mind blowing people just go for it without thinking twice. I regret why I haven‚Äôt purchased it so far. Feeling 500 percent happy with this product in terms of sound quality, call quality.. voice assistant etc ... Awesome

name: Anton Jerald
title: Quality is not god
content: Quality is not good. I returned the item.

name: Mahi
title: Good but ... Ok ok type for me.
content: Every thing seem ok for me.. Only thing I dislike is the vibration once u go out of 10 m range from laptop or mobile which was connected it keeps on vibrating since it was scanning to get connected ... which was annoying for me.

name: Nik99TB
title: DONT GO FOR IT IF YOU ARE NOT FROM DELHI
content: the bad thing about this product is that the battery is having issues while charging the battery gets puffed and become out of size and service center are only in delhi and if you sre from any other city or state you have to put your own expense and company is not going to pay for it... literally useless dont buy at all until they open service center for other city or states

name: Navin A.
title: Third review in 5 months, product sucks
content: Writing this 3rd review after 5 months. Firstly isdue was related to device not switching off completely wherein lights remain on even after switch off. This problem started after 8 used it once to work out. Now the product has completely stopped working. Money down the drain. Suggest people to put in but more money and buy a Samsung brand.

name: AsmiD
title: Perfect for on the go music and easy phone call reception, until it breaks open and stops working.
content: Light weight, good quality wireless earphones for music and easy phone calls on the go.. Review update: The earphone's earbud are fragile. If you lie down on your side with earbud on, it might break open and you will loose sound output in that ear. Thats the exact case I faced (Bought in August, earphone broke somewhere by the end of december). Amazon didn't help with service either.

name: Avaneesh K M
title: Awasome product
content: From 8th month onwards using this product. Product is very Nice. So I am writing this some of review points.. 1.Good Sound quality.. 2.Awasome battery backup.. 3.Button action is very Fast ( Power ON, Power Off, Connection, ). 3.Immediately connect with Bluetooth (Computer, Mobile).. 4. Quick Charges.. 5. Less price compare to other Company product. üòâ

name: Abha Tripathi
title: Reasonable price, great earpiece
content: I got them for Rs. 1399 and for the price they‚Äôre actually really great.. Noise cancellation is good, not the best, but given the price it‚Äôs quite nice. The highs and lows are pretty good. It got connected pretty easily and I didn‚Äôt find any kind of trouble with connection or interference of any sort when jogging or running. Bass is okayish and that‚Äôs the only downside of this earpiece. Overall, for a price of 1399 it‚Äôs a good alternative compared to Boat wireless earphones

name: G.Pranoy krishna
title: Couple of things not right
content: I don't understand why the box seal are open. I bought two Bluetooth earphones, one was day before yesterday and today but seal was open and gum strength was strong on other side, I realized that some thing is happening. And it is written that if the seal is broken don't take the box, but how can I know until I open the packages, Delivery boys they just give but they won't wait. OK , if I return the devices I will get other, but still the ridiculous thing is why those seal are open even though this has strong adhesive. But I feel ok with what I got because I am trust Amazon .

name: Raag Sagar
title: Can't listen much time
content: It's good one but... Can't here for long time... It's my experience as I have a migran issue.. After listening for 2 Hours... I feel very bad headache.... Not preferable for the sensitive people.... If you don't have any giddy feel about Bluetooth.. you can go for it

name: Ritesh
title: Poor quality of the product, not switching on
content: The product has stopped working just 2 days after I received the set. The buttons provided for on/off and the charger port given are of inferior quality. Doesn't give the value for money purchase and the build quality is not at all good.. Very much dissatisfied by the purchase and now I feel cheated. I have wasted my money in this deal.. I would request everyone, not to buy this product. Instead go for Boat Bluetooth headphone. My friend bought it recently. Boat is really good and looks a quality product.

name: Priyanka
title: A good earphone
content: I have purchased this product's old varient, and I experienced no issue at all during my 1.5 years usage.. Now I have purchased this varient a day before yesterday. I like the changed design. Although it comes in a plastic body to make it light in weight yet the design and neckband are just amazing.. In terms of sound quality the bass is amazing, highs and lows are decent (good for the price range) vocals are clear as well.. Noice isolation is just amazing in this pair. They are really comfortable to the ears as well due to its 60 degree design of earbuds.. No major issue as of now.

name: Lalit Singh Karki
title: Good product under rs 1 k.
content: Bolut curve neckband is a very good product under 1k Indian rupees. I had bought this on Amazon sale for rs 999.. .. Pros-. *Good quality sound, both bass and treble is too high..so for a pleasing sound you should have to download third-party equaliser software program, because inbuilt phone eq. doesn't work on it though it's a Bluetooth neckband.. *battery life is great.. .. Cons-. *Built quality on the side pannels of neckband seems cheaper like rs200-300 type product.should be improved by using soft plastic.. *the first tap for the volume and next button is annoying.. for next or previous track you have to press and hold for around 2-3 sec...it should be like one tap for next or previous track and press and hold to increase or decrease volume.

name: Manoj K.
title: Broken seal seems spurious item
content: Seal of the packet is broken. Trying to return but yet not done within return period violating it's own policy.

name: sunil kumar
title: Awesome üëè
content: im writing this review after using near about a month battery life is overall good,build quality is also good the basss is littlebit low but for silent songs it feels good.simply u can prefer this product undoubtedly ü•∞ü•∞üëåüèªüëåüèª.I have more confidence on this company (BOULT).Actually I purchased 3boult curve pro neckband all of them are good there is no complaints on this company and also for the product this is my genuine review üëåüèªüëåüèªüéâüéâüéâ.thanks to boult company for maintaining quality along with price when compared with other

name: Johann Quadros
title: Totally loved the Boult Audio Probass and 100% Recommend it!
content: Tried a couple of Bluetooth headsets before I decided to totally settle for this one. Loved the Boult Audio Probass Bluetooth Headset!! Great and clean sound quality. The battery lasts for over 8-9 hours maybe more but I'm super satisfied. Wearing comfort is perfect and seats comfortably around the neck with adjustable wire length to comfortably reach the ears. I totally recommended this product!!

name: Kabir
title: Budget friendly and quality product.
content: I bought this product in October and since then had been using it constantly, like a regular headphone. I have ditched my wired earphones and few reasons would be my satisfaction with the product.. Battery life is great and of you have an android device or any device other than Apple, you can refine sound to a minimum. However, in apple it doesn't goes to the lowest level, hence a few times it may feel loud(only if you have sensitive ears).. Rest the product is great and would recommend everyone who are looking for an affordable and quality product.

name: akkash
title: After using this product for long time. (real review from akkash)
content: It's good product but for those who love sad songs and watch movies becs its hd sound give you best experience of it.. Yaa but it's not good for base lover people becs the base is not that much good or i say u don't feel base it has Little base and of you are gym lover u have to buy it becs ye nikalte he nhi hai yrr kaan mai jese bs song chlre h pta he nhi chlta. And vibration effect is removed from this product which makes its battery life move then 13hr by songs so standby mai nd call maybe 24hr to 30hr cross easily kr deyge. I am useing it from last 2 week and still it's is best i don't have any complain regarding it.

name: Praveen Nookala
title: Good product and must buy for this price
content: Amazon first delivered a product which was damaged, I replaced the product and the new one was perfect.. it was new product.. east to connect and battery charge lasts for more than 4 days.. I have not charged till now after the product got delivered.. sounds quality is good and mic is also pretty decent.. noise cancellation is pretty awesome.. finally a good product for less than Rs1500.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unreliable and faulty
content: The headset worked well until I decided to go for a jog, it started vibrating insanely until the battrey drained out, on charging the vibration erupted. I decided to raise a complaint with the company, they asked me to send back the headset and promised me to replace it with a new one if my issue was genuine. I received a tampered box 15 days later, the replacement headset too was faulty, the right earphone always kept on producing a humming sound and overheating in ears and the battrey did nt last for more than an hour. Now i again have to shell out courier charges to return the faulty piece.

name: Pravin Nevhe
title: Third class after sales service!
content: Product is good, but aftet sales service is worst then ever! Product get faulty in 1 month, after that, please note that! Boult has no any service centre in any of the district or state! We've to courier the product to boult by spending Rs.400 & then my product is delivered to them & after that they repaired my product in 3 days and after that they took 15 days to just dispatch the product! So.. overall if your boult product gets faulty, then you're gone bro! Lot of head ache, minimum 1 month to get back the repaired headset.. only if you took 1000 times followup!

name: Suresh Kitty
title: Awesome Battery Backup, Wire Management and design
content: Pros. 1. Wire Management. 2. Neckband - Very light weight, sits perfectly over the neck. Thanks to the curve design.. 3. Battery Backup - Minimum 8-10 hours with extreme usage, 12-14 hours with mild usage. 4. Superb Noice cancellation, Decent Sound Quality and Bass

name: Priyanka
title: Honest non paid review
content: Honestly im writing this review about it after using it for a couple a days..and frankly speaking not very highly impressed with the phones.. let me divide. Pros:. Built quality : very good. Light weight. Looks decent. Battery life 1 day to 1.5 days (average usage). Mic placement and call quality 4.5stars. Connectivity quick and stable. There is one more plus point which is there is a small vibrator on the one tip which vibrates when you receive a call..so you get notified about even if you didnt hear the phone ringing. Cons:. The biggest con in these phones is the Sound.. Its too too loud..considering The Treble and The Vocal..one cannot hear the songs on high volume and without changing the equiliser.. irritation starts. in ears after a minute or two... bass is just next to Ok..not that good..just thumping a bit thats it..

name: Jas
title: CRAP
content: Crap product... Keeps getting disconnected when on call. Has heavy background metallic / electronic noise when on call, it like as if one is speaking to someone in outer space. Battery backup is just about ok.. Better products for cheaper prices are available. Avoid buying this

name: prateek  suryawanshi
title: Best product!!!
content: Excellent product.. The quality of the product is very impressive. Earphones are very light and flexible.. Sound quality is very clear and smooth. And the bass quality is very impressive and outstanding.. Battery: In this headset I like most is that it's battery backup. It last around 2 to 3 days from your charging. And charging is very fast it take you only 45 to 55 min for 70% to 80% charging.. Finally if you are looking for a headset this is the product you must check out first. At last this product is "Value for money". Don't think buy it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Microphone does not work. Don't buy..
content: While it works well just for listening, the microphone is absolutely useless. The person on the other side of the phone could barely hear me. I did a mic test n it failed miserably. And the worse part that I cant even return it. Only replacement is possible, for which I have placed an order. I hope it's just a defect with the piece n the next one is better else it'll be a waste of money.. Really regretting buying this..

name: Upendra Bage
title: Suggest to Don't Buy for Online Gamers Specially "PUBG" Players.
content: Don't Buy this product after read my review , Otherwise you will waste your money on water.. 1.This product doesn't have well sound and bass too.. 2. Within 5 minutes usages Battery drained to "0% after of 40%.. 3. This product doesn't fit well on ears , it's comes out from ears in every second.. 4. You couldn't play online games like "PUBG" ,"Call of duty' Due to sounds delivered to you very late or slow.. 5. Bluetooth could not reach one bed room to another any room. I mean music not comes in earphones.. 6.Noise cancellation is very poor,I don't think boult have provided noise cancellation on this neckband.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Battery status notification issues
content: This is second time i am seeung the issue with Boult neckband. I am getting the battery low indication when its showing as 20% left. Previously one i ordered from my friend account. That also same problem. Then i get it replaced. But this one when i got the product, i am planning to move out of station for 10 to 12 days. I forget to take this with me. Today i am checking the product and getting this problem. The product sound quality also not up to the standard.. I am expecting this to be replaced with new and proper one..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Bang for a buck !
content: I brought this product on august 2020.. As a music enthusiast i realy appreciates a good headset.. So Im writing this review.. 1. First of it got a very soft any sweat band which is very comfortable.. 2. Connectivity is fast with latest bluetooth version. I can connect to my both my phone and laptop at same time.. 3 . Sounds quality is very good and its easy to listen music for a long time.. 4. Last , battery performance is excellent . It charges in a less time ands gives whole day lasting performance.

name: Rashmi Sawarn
title: Do not BUY at all.
content: As of my personal experience of using this earphones... I personally do not liked it at all. The quality of earphone is so cheap that it looks like you have worn a fake or some artificial earphones.. Also, the sound quality the company have guaranteed in their advertisement is totally opposite. I mean the quality is also poor with no bass at all. Battery life is also poor.... you can hardly use it for about 6 hrs after a full charger, for which the company guaranteed to provide atleast 12 hrs of usage after full charge.. So guys i would recommend you, not to buy this product and instead go for "Boat Rockkerz" which cost only 1200Rs.

name: Arjun Ajith
title: It's just OK
content: Don't expect true deep bass or noise cancellation from this pair.. Being entry level, there are a lot of things you can't expect of this.. In spite of all that, the build is sturdy, it rarely falls off, the battery lasts for weeks, the mic is crisp and even while riding a motorcycle, people at the other end have no issues hearing you.

name: Anurag bhatia
title: Good product in 1.5k budget
content: After reading so many reviews and researching i always ended up on boult curve... I had a gut feeling that this product might be good for my budget and workout... I read negative reviews too that it wont connect properly if you jog.. Bluetooth not working fine... But I'm using it for past 3 4 days... It hasn't disconnected even if my phone was 20 25 ft away... Sound quality is good,noise cancellation too... But i would recommend that you play it in half volume cz you cannot hear whats going outside or if someone is calling you.. So overall nice product built quality is fine for this budget... If you don't have a high budget this is the best deal for you... Keep you eyes closed and buy it. :)

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boult definitely better than Boat!!!
content: I loved the Boult Headphones that I just received yesterday. Earlier I was using Boat headphones and wasn't satisfied with the sound quality as well as built quality. Had to return it as well but did get a replacement. The sound quality of the Boult headphones is amazing. The look and feel of the headphones is also great. I loved the Lime Green color too. The bass is amazing and we can actually feel the micro woofers in them when I use these headphones. Overall I am very satisfied with the headphones and specially the bass quality is amazing. Love the product.

name: avinash b.
title: Best neckband in this price segment
content: First of all I bought this one because of its great battery backup and I was thinking that the sound may not be soo good but after using it I am highly surprised as the sound quality and bass is just awesome.. 1. Battery backup: 8-9 hrs ( 3-4 days standby). 2. Sound quality: Great üòç. 3. Bass is very good.. 4. Calling: No issues, works absolutely fine.. 5. Bluetooth range: 10 mtrs. 6. Noise cancellation: Good, but can be better but in this price its better than others.. 7. Light weight.. 8. Sweatproof.. Just go for it.. You will not be disappointed.. Great neckband, worth its price üôÜüôÜ.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Product , nice base and Good for the price....
content: My Package Got delivered very fast within 4-5 days . And I had no issues regarding the package . But the box was little damaged on the corners . Bu it's ok . The earphones were safe inside. I got all the contents which was mentioned in the product description. But a few of them got a movie voucher , but that was not mentioned . But that's fine...... ABOUT THE PRODUCT :. The neckband looks good to me and has got a premium look outside. Talking about the built quality , I found it better for the price . But the buttons were a little lose , as it had a sound coming when I just touched it .. AUDIO PERFORMANCE:. The songs I played were rocky songs and some bollywood love songs , both sounded good ! The earphone has got A good base , which gives a good effect. But it has got medium sized ear buds plugged on it , and I dint try wearing the small sized earbuds. The medium sized earbuds were a little lose and I had to press a little when I was listening to music. I hope the small ear buds go well on my ears. !. CONS ( PROBLEMS REGARDING IT ). ‚óÜThe neckband slips from my neck and come back when I am running .. ‚óÜI don't get calls on the earphones .. ‚óÜThe call comes on My phone , and the earphone doesn't vibrate while the call is ringing.. ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ. This is all the problem I faced with the earphones. Rest everything is fine .. BOULT COMPANY , please fix my problem of connecting the neck band when I am on Call .

name: Sharda Bhawar
title: Don't buy. It's a fake product
content: This product was an utter disappointment. In fact amazon should remove it. When I first received it, it was clearly a fake one. Then I replaced it but received a same product again. So finally I have returned it.. They are selling some local earphones under the name of boult. The original boult headphones are not at all like this. So please don't waste your time and money. Instead, look for some other brand and seller too.

name: Neelam Rathi
title: Poor connectivity, Impossible to use outside home while walking or exercising
content: The headphone has a good battery life and it is very comfortable to wear.. The noise cancellation is also good.. The sound quality of the headphone is good but it is impossible to use this headphone outside home or while walking or doing any other work.. It has a very poor network range. The connection keeps breaking even if you are walking slowly. As soon as you come out of home, the headphone starts vibrating indicating poor connectivity.. You can't talk to someone on phone using this headphone outdoors. Even listening to music is impossible.. I don't know how come it has been labeled fit for workouts.. For the sound quality, it can be rated 4. But for connectivity I won't even give it one star, it is so pathetic in that area.

name: Sandip Bote
title: Boult Audio Probass
content: Amazing product from Boult, received the headphones before the delivery date. Amazing service from Amazon. The quality headphones is so at best, earbuds and the quality of the frame is also very good compare to other headphones. Battery backup also very good, its works for atleast 6-7 hrs with one tome charging. Charge the headphones within few mints.. Overall Amazing product from Boult.. Sound Quality- 5‚≠ê. Bass - 5‚≠ê. Noise Cancellation- 4‚≠ê. Battery Backup - 4‚≠ê. Thank you Amazon & Boult.

name: PremPrakash Yadav
title: No specifications details on case, why?
content: Is item given inside doesn't match the advertised specifications hence they haven't mentioned anything related to Bluetooth version, battery time and battery capacity anything on case. I will return it if found got cheated by unethical selling strategy by seller/company. And will file complain at govt consumer site.. Govt must make mandatory to flash specifications on box if they want people should trust and buy products from Indian company.

name: Muthukumar
title: Particularly now the offer Price Products are defective
content: When I received this product, complete charge takes only 2 hours of time to use. So need to charge again. Hence returned the defective one and they sent another. In that the device after paring connected will disconnect with in 2 min, so I need to connect again for continue the call. Finally returned the product and received the cash back.

name: Mohammed Alam
title: False Feautures mentioned in product description
content: The product description mentioned is:. "Boult Audio ProBass CurvePro Bluetooth Neckband with Vibration Alert for Calls, in-Ear Wireless Earphones with 12 Hour Battery Life, Fast Charging & in-Built Mic, IPX5 Sweat proof Headphones (Black)".. However, after using the device I realized that there is no "vibration alert for calls", i verified this by going through the supplied product manual as well. The supplier needs to correct the description on this product immediately.. Apart from the above I was satisfied with the product and its performance.

name: RK
title: Review for My Boult Audio Headset Pair
content: Performance of the headset is as expected, audio quality, noise cancellation feature and the volume of the headset.. It is good for high volume lovers and in my case I cannot keep it above 70-80%.. Overall it is good for this price range.

name: Bhagavan Srinivasan
title: Price to Performance Excellent - PPE
content: Hi Boult Audio ProBass Curve in my opinion is an excellent Engineered product and at the outset it scores over all products for its Price to Performance ratio. The mechanical design, the perfect fit universally to most majority ears, the feature of noise cancellation built in this device giving excellent sound quality and add to this the bass effect especially listening to Carnatic music as I do, made me after 1 year buy one more unit for myself while this was bought for my wife an year back.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It does not pair with the Smart TV and do not vibrate.
content: The product is generally good and pair/connect with mobile/laptop. However it does not pair with the smart TV. I have a Sony Bravia TV and despite repeated efforts it is not pairing/connecting with it. The TV is easily pairing/connecting with other BlueTooth devices but is not able to search/identify this headset even when it is in a pairing mode.. Also as per the manual it should vibrate when swtiched on or off but instead of vibrating it only send sounds "Power on" or "connected" etc. this means that vibrating feature is wrongly advt.

name: Saran Limbu
title: Two words about the product..
content: V. Good product from Boult in that range of prize.... Sound quality is also very good... Chances of damage is also less... This earphone can be use while working by keeping phone at safety place... Delivery timing is also quicker than ecpected.... Hoping for more great products in future... Thank You Amazon....

name: D
title: Worst Earphones
content: Earphones stopped working on second day. I contacted Boult to send back the product to Boult service center & get a new earphone, but they didn't give me a new phone. Instead they sent a repaired one. After I received the product back again they called me daily for 15 days to write a good review & win some prize. I knew this was a scam, but since they were torturing me with the call. I wrote a positive review & sent them screenshot. Now I am editing this review. Don't go for this product, it's not worth. The product stopped working again in less than 30 days, not worth for the money.

name: Bhushan
title: Bang for the bucks Dammn Yes stylish
content: First i was skeptical to choose this brand over Boat 255 which were available for 200 Rs cheaper at 1100 during sale. However given it had adjustable ear plugs and vibration alert over the Boat 255 thought of giving this thing a try and hell yes i was surprised wit the quality it persist.. Bass is awesome (Ensure you use correct set of buds for that perfect bass effect). Treble is good and not overpowered by Bass. Good for for quick brisk walk, Run, ZUMBA session, It gives that punch to motivate for another K. Fit i ears is comfortable for long sessions as well, yet to test the battery life of the same.

name: Josekutty Antony
title: It is good earphone with high quality sound
content: Boult Bluetooth neck band offers you to make calls and listen music fir a non stoppable time of 8-10 hours. It has amazing sound quality and bass quality.Noise cancellation feature is also available.. We can control the volume,change track with it.. There is a charging indicator is also available.When it is charging a red light blink and when it is fully cahrged a blue light sparks.. It offers high speed and easy connecting with your phone, tablet,ipad,etc,.... It can be use upto a range of 10 metres range.

name: GAGANDEEP SINGH
title: User Review
content: U cant find a better wireless earphone :. Pros.. 1. Perfict fit.. 2. Superb back-up (upto 8 hrs.). 3. Sturdy Design. 4. Anti Sweat. 5. Loud enough that u"ll never hear in full sound.. 6. Super bass.. 7. Charges within 1.5 hrs.. Cons:. 1. Noice cancellation is not too good.. 2. Misses vibration which was there in previous model.. 3. Mic quality is not upto the marks.

name: Amazon_Customer
title: High Expectations, Low Delivery
content: It's a Okay neckband ,not quite expected. Sound Quality is just normal, nothing extraordinary. It mentioned multi phone connect but it does not work. Moreover, after a month of purchase central button for call pickup doesn't work. Had ask support to check but support is slow response and moreover asked to courier product at my cost which is not nice as its product fault and company should arrange pickup for repair/replacement. Was more expecting from product and company but not disappointed

name: Sonam Dewangan
title: WORST SERVICE
content: Overall the product is good in terms of sound and bass. Noise cancellation is not up to the mark sometime creates disturbance but at this price what we get is awesome.. But I rate it 4 star cause my earphone isn't working well and it's just 2 months I have bought this product and want to exchange or return this product. Applied for warranty as it gives 1 year warranty. Hope for the best service!. DON'T BUY FROM BOULT, THE SERVICE PROVIDE BY THEM IS WORST. Yet they didn't solve my issue, it already more than 5 months.

name: Venkatesh rajan
title: Pathetic after sales support
content: Got this product delivered through Amazon on 29.6.20. Realised that the product has charging issues. Unfortunately the return time window on Amazon expired a day before I realised the problem. Hence had to contact boult directly. After several calls and emails I got a response from them. They asked to courier the product to Delhi and then they would examine it . I‚Äôm in Bangalore and during this lockdown courier charges are exorbitant. Boult refuses to get it collected or replaced. WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME. DO NOT BUY THIS UNLESS YOU ARE IN DELHI

name: Jay Trivedi
title: Received defecated product from seller
content: Product was defective. I requested to return it back. But shared my quick experience.. Received replaed product.. 1. Base/ Bass is very low in case you are a bass lover then this is definately not the product you are looking for. 2. Listening song will give you a OK feeling but i believe at this price it should be better. 3. Quality and comfort is again a disappointed in this product. With heavy heart i am sending this product back. I found it as waste of money. Could be better if available in 500 ‚Çπ but not a single penny more on this.

name: Mohammad Akbar Shaikh
title: Perfect All-rounder!
content: I bought this for my younger sister as the headphones which came with her mobile phone went dead on one ear (as it happens often) with standard OEM headphones.. The sound quality is hits the sweet spot. Bass is balanced and not heavy. Treble is right as it suits the user. Noise cancellation is also very good. No distortion is good. Hope this runs for long.. Also, not to forget that for the quality of this headphones it was an absolute steal @ Rs 999 on Freedom Sale by Amazon.. Delivery was right on as scheduled. Props to Amazon!. P.S. Got another one for another younger sister.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst product ever seen
content: I bought it on October 2019 from Amazon.But after one month its bluetooth mic connectivity was lost.So i couldn't call to others through this headset and only used it for music and video watching. But two months back it shows low music play time, ie, below half an hour. Then it was gone to fully dead. Though company assures one year service so called customer care service several times and got no one reply. Then i email to this company and have no reply.. name: Ashish Eric
title: Please don‚Äôt waste your time and money.
content: Faced issues within 7 days of purchase.Sent back instead of replacement they repaired that be not properly.I sent product in brand box n with accessories, they returned it without any accessories n brand box. I received calls twice but that went without any solution n false assurance. I‚Äôll never recommend any Boult product to anyone as their after sale service is pathetic and customer handling is very poor.

name: Ansh Saxena
title: Best under this price.
content: I have been using this blutooth earphone since 24 hours and my experience so far is.... 1.Sound quality is quite impressive in this price range.. 2.Bass is also good.. 3.Bluetooth connectivity is just above the average (won't trouble you a lot).. 4.Battery backup is awesome.. For me it is a win win deal because, I purchased it for a price of Rs. 899/- that to with Rs. 750/- cashback I got on a smartphone deal. For me it just costed Rs. 149/-

name: Anzar Hussain
title: Worst product in market please don't buy.. go for Another product
content: Worst service provide by any company.. When my earphone Stop work i make it replaced. But in Return i got some cheap Quality fake product,in which sound feels like some low Quality Earphone which distroy your hearing power.. When i raised complaint and asked for replacement but they start putting my phone in hold after listening the complaint. .

name: Subhasis Das
title: Good product Bad service from Boult
content: Product was good when I received it, i had no issues with it. But within 6 months its not working properly, it gets automatically disconnected & after that I'm unble to connect, buttons stopped working etc. So I contacted Boult about this issue & they asked me to send it to their Dehli via courier, which is costly. & there is no other way. Thats not the kind of experience i was expecting. So buy it with your own risk.

name: Chirag
title: Unhappy with headphone sound quality
content: Sound quality: below average. Bass: average, Too high. comfort: good. Battery: good. Range: average. Giving 1 star for,. - poor sound performance. - received an unboxed product and amazon refuse to get it replace. 1st time I have very poor experience with Amazon support.

name: Ramesh
title: Just Go for It.....Great Product With this price.
content: Just Loved The Product....Best fit for ears.Compared the other Earphones Or Headphones.....Pro bass curve is really good with bass and The battery backup Is minimum 10hrs for sure.The advantage Of this product is that It has Adjustment For wires..Its really a Great thing about pro bass curve.. JUST GO FOR IT. If you read negative reviews And keep on searching for the fault You wont Come to buy....Just be positive And Be boultüòÑto buy.. 5/5 STARS - TO OVERALL PRODUCT

name: Ujwal Nandeshwar
title: Duplicate and Refurbished Product Selling by Amazon as New Product
content: Amazon is selling Duplicate and Refurbished Product as new product. One of my friend buyed same product from Flipkart have better finish and sound quality as compared to my product and better finishing touch also my product have some manufacturing defect that headphone is not fit in right side ear, also it damaged automatically in just 1 month... I also contacted to Amazon customer care for this but they told me it can't be replaced.. Very Bad Service By Amazon and Shipper... Keep it up provide Refurbished Product as new... Thumb Off to you amazon

name: sudarsan raman
title: Affordable price and good quality BT
content: Good quality Bluetooth headphone at a affordable price. I have been using it for a month now, the sound quality is good and noise cancellation is great as well. Worth a buy for anyone looking to purchase a affordable BT.

name: RD
title: Worth the money
content: I bought this at the time of prime sale so got it for pretty cheap price.. However, I as excited I was awaiting for the product to be delivered, I had a contrasting feeling once it was delivered. Below are the reasons.. 1. The boult would not connect at all. I thought initially due to lack of sufficient charge it was causing this issue. But, it was later even post full charge, and it was refusing to connect.. 2. I was disappointed and called the customer care and they asked me to return to Amazon which I did. It wasn't vibrating as well when there was an incoming call as the company claims.. Hence, got it replaced with another one which worked as expected but still there is no vibe on incoming call.. Overall, I the bass effect, sound quality is fair enough for the pricing. The built and make is of premium quality that really makes this stand out for this pricing

name: Anup B.
title: It's a Good product
content: I got this neck band at Rs 999 during sale. So I really can't complain much. At this price range this is a good option. Below are the some pros and cons.. Pros. 1. Price. During no sale it costs Rs 1399-1499. During sale you can get it at low as Rs 999. 2. Bluetooth version 5. So no lag while watching YouTube/Netflix. Audion Video sync is good. Clear sound. 3. Battery backup. Though the company claims of 10 hours, it gives around 5-6 hours heavy ussage (continuous music and voice call) if the battery is 100% charged.. 4. Good packing by Amazon. Provides 1 year warranty and 2 extra pairs of ear buds.. 5. Magnetic ear pieces. So that it does not get loose from your neck.. Cons. 1. Built quality not so good. The bend is off flexible plastic. The wire is too thin. Seems cheap quality material is used. Can be torned anytime if proper care not taken.. Buttons are not so good quality. May damage soon if you use it continuously. So use your phone's volume rocker/call receiving buttons.. 2. Company claims of high bass, but bass is not that good. If your phone is high end, the music is good but other wise you ll miss the bass part. Treble is high. You may need to do some manual setting in your phone to get the best output.. 3. Bluetooth range is not that good. Can be good if you use it in one room. If you go to another room it will give you hicups. I used it in my balcony and my phone was in the room, I found the connectivity is not so good. You can use it within max 10 feet radius without any wall or solid obstacle.. So this is it. As I said at this price range I really can't complain or find any cons. So if you are looking for a Rs1000-1200 range Bluetooth band. Go for it. Even if it works for 1 year or so without any problem, it's Paisa vasool. Do let me know your review on this

name: Rohit khatri
title: Wonderful product and good voice clarity!!
content: The headphones are worth a take. Wonderful product and looks durable. The sound quality and call quality is awesome. The microphone is placed at the correct spot and your voice can be easily heard onto the other side and that too with great clarity. The clarity of microphone is worth it of someone wants to use the headphones majorly to attend calls.

name: Sunil Pandey
title: Very good product, good battery life, nice sound
content: Very good product at a very attractive price - very good value for money. I am able to connect both my laptop and mobile at once and listen and talk on both. The should quality is better than my earlier headset with good bass too.

name: Vasu K
title: For Music Lover -- Go for it ...
content: Better than Samsung level U and other products . Vendor is offering some Gift voucher for the rating so you will not trust the rating whoever posting here. Pros :. 1. Good battery backup (8-10 hrs) -- great thumbs. 2. Adequate bass and treble , you will never get this sound quality as compared to price tag. 3. Good build quality. Cons :. 1. Poor Bluetooth range ,even not more than 3mtrs .. 2. Poor voice clarity . I can rate 3/5. 2. Hard earbuds -- unbearable :-( .

name: Archana Jadhav
title: Good earphone... In that price range go for it
content: Overall good earphone.... Only thing is bass is less but.. If u adjust equalizer in music player for bass then... Perfect earphones in that price range... Go for it... Battery backup also good 2days backup for daily 5 to 6 hours use.... Light weight and style look

name: Saroj B.
title: Original Reviews
content: Everything is good if Got the Original One.. which i uploaded the photos.. The last Coupon pic's are Comparison between Duplicate or Copy Product with Original One.. it's your Luck if you got the right one or Copied One.. Sound is Awesome Compared to Tagg Inferno, Wings, Mivi Thunder Bass, Noise tune Duo and Elite,Mi Neckband and Mi Wireless earphone ,JBL 160T BT.. You think why i not add the Boat Rocker 255 model because this model is no where near to these exampled earphones.. and please please if have heavy budget then go for atleast Sony XB series . and please please don't buy the Skullcandy. you will be definitely cry.. Sounds Quality :-. First Time you feel 3D Acoustic Sound with Bass ( you feel Bass but don't know where it come from ). Stereo :- good yes you got 5.1 channel like experience (if it in your video). Build- Metal with Plastic ( you feel Comfortable for long time ). wire quality is Manageable (not kevlar protected). Battery- Continuously 6hr with max vol ( yes i tested). Wireless Connectivity - actually i don't know which version it has Amazon says it has latest v5.0 but i can't find anywhere in and out of the box neither in phone it doesn't connected through Bluetooth Low Energy .. i think it still Bluetooth v4.2. Bluetooth range is good in 3mtr ( with moving location). and 10mtr in (constant location) either you or your phone.. if think your going to use it while jogging or walking. then you feel sound is pulsing.yes it occurs but i can't find the reason ( i think in vertical position our phone Bluetooth range is very weak) that's why.. i don't have con's because neither it's come from a brand or neither it's too costly.. keep in mind (you just got more what's you pay.). i think everyone is waiting to buy when price is RS-999/- with 10% SBI Discount.üòÑ. please don't find the cons in this price segment.

name: nayeem akhtar
title: Best for bike travellers , sport person, gym etc. like me
content: Overall good product. Pros. 1- long battery life ( avarage 2 day backup normal use). 2- lightweight. 3- comfortable... Fit in ear üëÇ and also extra earbud for different size.. 4- easy to pickup call( for me .. mostly i ride bike and very easy for me to pickup call while driving.. 5 - wireless help me to do work while on the phone call. ( Hands are free ... So i can do workout , gym, listen audio book while doing less focus work example - cleaning room , jogging etc.. Cons-. 1- it should be under price 1000 ( i think it is little bit over price for me.)

name: Pradyut parida
title: Only design, no performance.
content: It's only been 20 days I have been using this product and it has already started showing connectivity issues. Even though the ear phone is right besides the phone still it continuously is getting disconnected. And this happens even when the battery is at 60%. I am highly disappointed with this . I don't understand how people have rated it above 4 . I feel this is a waste of money and I am not sure how long will this piece last. I would suggest that you spend some extra bucks and go for more renowned brands like Sony or Samsung . Even Boat also works well. Highly Disappointed I am.Even as I am writing this review the device has disconnected and connected 3 times already. Don't waste your money on this.

name: Mayur seliya
title: Only good thing is price
content: Honestly not good sound quality, even people reviewed it 4 star, definitely it's not product of that good.. I have purchased and returned because I found it doesn't have that good sound quality as Sony and jbl gives but I don't know why they are rated below this earphones.. I suggest if you have budget then go for Sony or jbl, believe me you will not regret.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for Money product.
content: Nice earphones. Built quality and sound is good. Bass is not high but decent. Battery life is nice, on 50% volume it work almost 13 hrs. First i had received used unit which seal was already broken. After replacement seller sent me new unit. So if you received box without seal, just apply for replacement.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great purchase
content: Pure indulgence in the mid range budget wireless headphones segment. Great bass, good crisp vocals and clarity with decent noise cancellation. Minimal distortion at 90% volume levels. Reviews given while listening to Faded in 320kbps.

name: Technology Evangelist
title: DEAD AFTER 5 MONTHS OF USE
content: I see lot of people complaining about getting a faulty hardware. Those review s do not contribute for the devices actual quality. You can always get a hardware replacement in those cases. My point here is regarding on the product itself. Everything looks ok. But it's a lot of interference whhen you drive a bike and listen through this. You will disconnect and choppy sounds at times. Otherwise it is fine. So if you are one of those who bought this to use while driving a bike, this is product is a not the right option for you at least from my experience. Hopefully this will help few of the buyers.

name: RAHUL TRIPATHI
title: Best Value for money in this range # Unbeatable
content: The earphones looks very Elegant.It feels very light and comfortable around neck and is really very soft .The ear piece is made of metal and attched together via magnets placed inside them.The battery backup is pretty decent and one can easily get minimum 12 hours of play time through this being connected to Phone via Bluetooth having version 5.0. Best value for money and and is really good at cancelling Noise.

name: Linse David
title: Nice product!
content: Actually I wanted to purchase Jbl Glide N120 ... Soon I changed my mind and ordered Boult by watching you tube reviews. Its a nice product.Really fits in my neck.. No pain in ears even after prolonged use.. Really useful for office use... Bass is not that much as I expected..Still decent... Overall nice experience

name: Sunjyot singh
title: Wastage of money
content: Guys don't buy this earphone, Amazon selling the fake product. M oader 2 headphone 1 is orginal and 2nd 1 is dublicate with in 10 days 1 headphone is stop working and also issue to charging point and disconnect the the Bluetooth afte 5 mint automatically .. pleas don't buy this headphone .totaly wast of money
