title: So many troubles, confused with the product. Worse than Roadside product Quality.
content: Calls get muted automatically sometimes. It connects to any open Bluetooth and produce beep sound continuously. Please dont get trapped by purchasing. During call, the sound is not audible due to heavy bass. It's bass effect suits only for music. So, purchase 2üòÇ. If u bend ur neck n mic is obstructed, the mic stops receiving sound completely.. Noice cancellation works well.. Only one side is working.ü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èü§¶‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

name: Ankan N.
title: No bass at all
content: I wanted a bluetooth earphone that has good bass, but this lacks it, sound clearity is awesome but no bass at all my 400rs mi earphone gives an emersive bass experience as compared to this. Noise cancellation is passive so dont expect much.. And I expected a better build quality, this feels flimsy.

name: Rajdeep Brahma
title: Best earphone at this price.
content: I bought it at 1099/-. Now it's cost reached to 899/- during festival. At this price this is the best.. It gets charged in 40-50 mins and last for 02 days @ 10-12 hrs continuous use per day. I use is in office.. Perfect companion for travelling. Watching movies and music is cool...

name: Aay Kay
title: Overall a good earphone !!!
content: Ordered this product but was bit worried about the brand. But post going through the reviews by other Amazon customers decided to order this piece. Delivery was fast & product is really good. Sound quality is better than most of key brands. Connecting it is smooth. Recommended to buy.

name: Aakash Verma
title: FOR MUSIC LOVERS üëç but hold up...
content: *sound quality (especially after using EqualizerFx app) is amazing. *CONNECTIVITY IS HORRIBLE! it loses connection stability when you place your phone in your jeans butt-side pocket while standing or walking. It is pretty much unpredictable when it may start losing connection. Seriously for a bluetooth device it is DISGUSTING!. *battery backup is as mentioned üëç

name: adivamsi
title: Music lovers don't buy it
content: Genuine review. Pros:. Battery lasts for long 8hours. Price is good. Noise cancellation. I bought one year ago but no problem for its working. Cons:. The charges pin guard is broken (not charger pin). Unable to talk calls clearly for voice calls it is worst. Even for music if we are sitting it was good but when walking or in journey the earphones was worst. Bass is not high it's just normal bass a music lover can not enjoy music with it. I recommend not to buy this becuase of those reasons

name: Paras Ashara
title: Buy this product if you feel want to get Harressesd
content: Right product wrong Service.. You will be harressesd by Boult team if your handsfree goes faulty. Product is very good but service is bad.. Firstly you will have to Ship the faulty product at your expense. (Should not be a problem for 1 time.) But product is returned un-repaire adds to your agony and re-ship the faulty product at your own cost againnand fell the burn for mistake commited by the reapir team.. If you want to get harressesd in after sales service but this product.

name: Akshay
title: Poor Bluetooth Connection.
content: Review after 1 month usage on Mi Note 5 Pro, Redmi 8A Dual, Samsung M20.. Pros:-. Battery Backup is awesome (>1 day). Sound Quality is acceptable.. Lightweight. Cons:-. Bluetooth connection starts hampering when the connecting device is >6ft away, if there is obstruction in between. Due to lots of obstruction in Gym, sound cracks in between multiple times which is irritating.

name: Aravind Sridharan
title: Good product - Worst support
content: Good ergonomics on this one. The neck bracelet is very helpful and non intrusive. Audio quality is good, however sound can be heard outside when the volume is too high. Not much of a bass fan, no comments there. Battery life is decent, lasts me for 4-5 days staying connected with calls throughout the day for office.. Edit: No gripes with the product but Boult support contacted and offered a gift for writing review. I wrote one and then never honored the arrangent, hence moving the review to 1 üåü

name: K S Saketh
title: Good earphone to buy to experience good quality of sound and bass
content: I don't say the best, but Good earphones to buy in its range, works well and doesn't irritate the ears even at high or max volume, best in quality and best in its class for the bass, better than boat, it will be the best earphones for the people who don't love too much of bass

name: Preetham SS
title: Fabulous product.......must buy
content: Best product at this price range i got it for @899.This is very help full for my online classes I use to listen classes and music as well.Avereage I use this almost 7hrs in a day even though the battery remain at 50-60%. If u are seeking for best ear phone in medium budget rage this is perfect.... Some times I haven't used this product for 3 days even though the battery remaim same ..... I love amazon because I also got 2 years warranty in a sale.....the product delivered within 48hrs...surprised a lot...24hrs before the time mentioned...must buy.....

name: Ram N
title: Faulty Earphones...flunked in hardly 2 Months
content: These are good quality earphones as far as battery life is concerned but sound quality is very average. Lot of disturbance in bluetooth connection, if you bring it near smart watch or any other gadget. Its vibration function can be really irritating, and keeps vibrating like cheap gadgets with no option of disabling the same. Most important thing is that My earphones suddenly stopped working in hardly two months with practically careful usage. The same are not getting started only despite being fully charged. Getting in touch with their customer care is really difficult. All the time you will keep hearing the message that all their customer care guys are busy on the calls and system will prompt you to keep a message. You will never get a call back from them after that. Think twice before opting for these earphones.

name: KUMAR S.
title: Something good at this price, atleast that's what atmost you'll get.
content: Well, this is a good product at INR 1799? But I guess the users have mostly given 4 or 5 star to maybe get those free movie tickets!. Anyways, expecting something like a Skullcandy or Bose' sound would really be not legitimate here with a Boult INR 1799 earphones but it's a good product. The expectation comes because in past with products like QCY Bluetooth earphones have been so good with the sound quality. Although the durability was questionable! Can't comment for this one since it has been just 3-4 days. And yes, the in ear long time experience would be bad. Means it will hurt, not a bit but I guess a lot more. But again 1799? It's a fair show. If you want something more better in all regard, then shell out more bucks.. Thanks

name: nishant jhalani
title: Seal is broken and accessories are missing
content: Seal is broken and again taped by extra tape.. Mentioned accessories on the Box are missing like usb cable and extra earbuds. It is one year old piece which is imported in sept-19.. I am very disappointed with quality of products on Amazon even there is no return of this item. Hope it is not duplicate item.

name: Manjunath
title: Boult Headphones review
content: Guys let me tell you about this Bluetooth headphones. First the sound quality is good.And noise cancellation is not that perfect .Bass is really good guys .... Quality of headphones is really good and very comfortable in neck ..It really fits well in ears no issues with that.. Google assistant is good and the build quality is really good..And finally when it comes to connectivity it's around 10 to 15 meters nothing more than that...I thought they should have improved this...And finally guys really worth for money.. I recommend you guys to go for it .I didn't get any movie tickets to write a positive review..It's my view about the headphones. I will give 4/5*...

name: Feby
title: Wired headsets are always better
content: It's okay to speak while using mobile phone calls. Not good for any of these call purposes like skype, Teams, Zoom. I can't hear properly as always a disturbing sound is coming while using with laptop( sound connection is not stable). So I have to connect my wired headset to hear properly. I'm not saying it's a waste of money but for me it doesn't serve the purpose.

name: Suyash Kindo
title: Worth the Price, But could have been better
content: This product is pretty Good after using for 1/2 month I'm reviewing it. It has a Good Bass and great sound for music lover and even when you play PUBG it's has that left and right calibration for it. One time charge can go whole day if you play 2-3 match in PUBG or listen to music in an interval. Noise Cancellation is not so good, if you use it in a crowded places. It's durability is top-notch. Overall I purchased during the Festival Sale and it was worth the money.. You can go for it if you are a college student like me. !!

name: Mohammad Arshad
title: The borken seal.
content: Voice quality is very poor during the call and other major issue is that when I opened the initial packing I was shocked becuase the main packet's seal was broken which show the wrong commitment of the company.

name: Stephen
title: One of the Best device for sound quality .
content: First product from Boult . I wasn‚Äôt confident enough in making a decision to go for the purchase. Because of the offer I did purchase and this one didn‚Äôt disappoint. It fits to the ear perfectly. Sound quality is clear, I can literally feel the surround sound. For IOS it was impeccable and with Android I felt little disappointed. In an android device the. Bass could‚Äôve been better. And Noise cancellation can‚Äôt make out in both IOS and Android.. Other manufactured components are worth the price.

name: manan oza
title: Excellent battery backup, fast charging and superb sound quality. Excellent service by Boult.
content: Strongly recommend this product to buy.. I have been using this product form last one year and no issues at all.. Excellent battery backup and fast charging. Very good built and audio quality . Clear sound and smooth working. I have been doing rough use since buying. Daily use almost 9 to 10 hrs still working fine.. BOULT as a company also very good. Excellent service. I faced one small issue during lockdown in product and I contacted company and they resolved it immediately.. Thank you BOULT.

name: Roshan Jha
title: Nice sound but no travelling case and now reduced features.
content: Update: I have ordered one more after few months and now they have removed the vibration feature which was good as you don't had to put headphones in ear all the time. So now 1 star only.. Sound is nice controller are good and while using for calling so noise cancellation is also fine. Every thing is good the only issue is then have written in description "Free travel case" which is not included in it.

name: Prabhat
title: Value for money.
content: It's been a month using this product and it's turning out to be a very good product. Fits perfectly on neck and flexible too. Sound and call quality it good. I'm bass head and was doubtful before purchasing this one but it serves my purpose for daily use during commuting to work. Treble is little high but can be adjusted with equalizer. Water resistance I would say it survived Mumbai rains but always use product carefully if you want it to work longer üòäüòâ.

name: Sumayya
title: Just fine - a one day usage review
content: Why is my box different than everybody else's?. Bought it on 11 aug 2019... The inside packaging was really bad especially the frame that held the neckband which made me doubt the genuinity of the product... Range isn't good... The audio starts cutting from a little distance only... Sound quality is "okay"... Less than expectation but still it's okay... The material of neckband is also okay, there's nothing to complain about in the material but the wire could have been thicker or flat ones bec the ones in these look fragile... I'm writing this review only after a day's use... I used it for 6 hours or more and the battery is still 50% and this is the only thing that I like about these earphones... Idk about the warranty yet... The card was there tho.. I've seen other reviews and my box and it's contents seem to be different than any of those in the review which is making me feel a bit skeptical about if they're actually genuine.... Hope the warranty is genuine and they work well for long (you don't buy earphones for a few months use, do you? You want them to work for a couple of years at least...

name: Bunny
title: Sound Clarity, Good Bass , Sound don't get distorted even in high volume.
content: I seriously got these 5 minutes back and I can assure you this is the best product one can have.. I got ptron urban bassbuds too but compare to these those are nothing.. Anybody willing to go have a good gadget instead of complete wireless bluetooth earphone.. The quality and clarity of this is what got me deeply impressed.. I don't usually right reviews but I am completely satisfied and happy with Boult ProBass Curve.. Kudos to the brand.ü§üüèª. as well as to Amazon for getting them delivered in a day.

name: Sanket More
title: Bluetooth connectivity issue
content: I am writing this review after using this headphones for around 3 days.. Bought this during the sale for 899.. Overall I'll say its a good buy. ‚Ä¢The sound quality is quite good,. ‚Ä¢you wont find the depth in the music,. ‚Ä¢due to more enhanced base the vocals and the instrument music is over shadowed.. ‚Ä¢Like me if you are switching from a superior brand to boult then you'll find the sound quality below par. (Jbl to boult no comparison between quality ). The major con which i found in this product was the. ‚Ä¢Bluetooth connection stability: this device connects instantly but while on the move the audio is constantly interrupted. Even if I keep my hand on the pocket in which the phone is kept, it interrupts audio (while walking). And not only for few seconds, but it keep on interrupting through out my walk which is quite irritating. If I'm using it with the phone in front of me it's awesome, but not at all good while walking. Due to this glitches I am returning this headphones as for me the Bluetooth connectivity is pretty low.

name: Ankit kumar
title: Pathetic Headphone received through Amazon , Unacceptable, (Useless , No value for money)
content: Its extremely unexpected from Amazon, Bought a Bluetooth headphone (1200 INR) but its quality of sound seems very poor after use of 01 week , not even charged stored for 02 days, although i have unable to contact with Amazon due to my illness , as i have in a medical emergency leave , So request you to kindly look in to this , please exchange my headphone or else never recommend anyone to purchase or believe in amazon, 1200 rupees is not a small amount for a headphone i think. 0.1 star rating im giving this product.. Unexpected.

name: Nitin Powar
title: Excellent Product By Boult
content: This is one of the best product which I have bought in wireless headphones. Its sound quality is the best while comparing with other products. Easy to wear and less weight are added quality so it's become more useful. Bass quality is decent. A most important quality is Noise Cancellation. It's Bluetooth wireless range around 10-15 Mtr.. Its battery backup is approximately 10-12 hr.. So I suggest you guys buy this product if you want the best wireless headphone. Last week, one of my friends bought this product after I suggest him to buy.

name: Deepa John
title: Please don't buy....
content: I purchased it on May 30th 2020.Hardly used it for 1 month.. then the same showed issue with connection and stopped working completely. Contacted the support and send the product for rectification, now on August 20th 2020 received it back and the same is having problem with the mic... contacted the support people... no reply from them..... lost my 1299/- I bought just bcoz of the reviews.... but this is what happened to me. Totally disappointed.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a good decision
content: Not upto the mark, i was not expecting this poor quality, boult is a good brand but this particular model is not at all good, low base, nk surround sound, low volume, but material is good. Better is to go with boult s06 cheaper and awesome surround and base far far better than this model and under low price. Don't expect much with this product plus the price is too high. Rest is your decision your money...

name: Prasanna srinivasan
title: very cheap and plzz don't waste your money...
content: pros:. : its very lite weight easy to carrying. : very fast connection its content automatically when device is on within 0.5-1 sec. : easily fits in ear. : its support 2 devices connection. : massive battery backup long lasting more than 12 hrs. : 0% audio lags during gameplay like pubg. cons. : very very cheap sound quality. : worst bass...i can't feel a 1% bass in this earphone. : vocals are really worst. : you can't feel any music or bass u only hear vocals and that's also very worst in this earphone. : bluetooth connectivity is not working properly.. when puts on phone in pant while walking or jogging or cycling bluetooth range is little lagging

name: Amazon Customer
title: Genuine review after using for a month
content: The sound quality which boult offers at this price range is amazing. The battery lasts for a pretty long time. I didn't find any issues even after listening for 6-7 hrs. The earbuds are so crafted to give good noise cancellation. Bass is fine but as I am not a bass lover it works for me. The option of multiple pairing comes very handy for me. I would say the build quality could be improved as of now the plastic feels slightly on the cheaper side. Overall a great wireless neckband at this price range.

name: Mangesh B.
title: Excellent
content: Latest feedback:. 1stly, it looks cheap n best. But it isn't.. 1. sound quality is ok, not that great.. 2. Coating around the wires got worn out and it is not durable.. After this, I logged the complaint on Boult Audio website and they kept their promise by replacing the product itself. But the catch is the replaced product stopped working within 1 week. This is company in India works. They enjoy cheating the customer or outwitting them by playing with words.

name: Kalendrakumar
title: received fake one. no noise cancellation. no vibration, and sound quality bad.
content: I am big fan of boult neckband and this was my 2nd buy after first one but the seller shipped me the fake/copied item which no where sounds close to original boult neckband.. Proof of fakeness:. 1.Apart from worst sound quality it can be seen in attached image of packaging box that its not the genuine one and this from the instant of opening package i knew i received fake one. 2. Fake warranty card provided in box.. 3. No vibration feedback feature which is present in original one.. I can't believe this kind of service from amazon.. the colour of the box is in white and blue colour. but everyone is having black colour

name: harsh bhoi
title: Best Value for money at this range.
content: The built quality and overall esthetic of the product is nice.. Sound quality and details in audio is really awesome. You can get the sound of each instrument clearly. Bass quality is alst wonderful.. Voice quality while call is perfect. The battery backup is the think I liked the most. I charge it once in 2 days with 100% charge and it goes on. Don't even feel the requirement of any secondary wired earphone for backup.. Overall good value for money.

name: vishnunath
title: Dealer is not a pro
content: Delivered package is not up to mark.. Seal is not broken at first sight but actually it was. I have no choice so I decided to use this because I can't wait another day to use my new phone, which is not supporting 3.5 mm audio jack. Sound quality is good I don't know about the product because I believe it was previously used but now it's fine. Amazone need to verify this dealer for good reason. The delivery time and delivery boy done a good job.

name: Nitish Khanna
title: Dont buy for music (reviewed after using for 2 months)
content: Poor build quality.. Poor Sound quality.. Poor connectivity.. Poor fitting.. Noise cancellation doesnt work properly.. Overpriced. It should be priced between 300 & 400.. Good battery back up.. Good for calling.. Dont buy it for music.

name: Srikant Kumar Dash
title: Connection issues even while walking....and in crowded place no connection..
content: Product quality is good.sound is also good bass and mids are ok...but there are connectivity issues ...if u r in crowded place it will lose connections and sound on every sec...and u will not here sing beat even phone is in ur pocket doesn't matter....connections is not good...that is the main reason.....u should not go for it......even while walking u can have some glitch in sounds.......always go for CSR compatible earphones.......

name: Manajit Roy
title: Superb product from superb brand
content: Superb quality, fits as expected. Sound quality with noise cancellation tech is amazing , clear sound and having great conversation.. And above all, its battery last for whole day with extreme use. More over u can check remaining power on the phone screen and never gets disconnected due to low battery in between my important conversation.. It satisfied me completely. Thanks Boult Audio

name: Zafer Jamil
title: Qualitative and Quantitative Product.
content: Excellent Product, worth to buy Qualitative and Quantitative both Ways Good. Best Sound Quality Soft Button. Nice Charging port (though old Fashioned Type-B) best Battery Backup and Quick Battery Recharge. Noise Cancellation good Low Price and Extremely soft on Ears.. Perfectly Compatible with what they Claim.. *Only One Thing that I hated about it is When it Turns on It Has Annoying Welcome Tune "Power On" and "Connected" (which is irritating and Loud on Ears). I want that disabled I hope there is some option.

name: PRADIV D. PATEL
title: Worst experience
content: Worst experience. Ordered product which was not getting on and not working at all, replacement got for same product which gets on but unable to get connected with any of my mobiles at home. Tried several times by turning of and on both mobile and Boult blutooth.

name: Sandip gupta
title: REVIEWING AFTER USING IT FOR ,ABOVE 20 DAYS.
content: BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT ON SALE AT RS.999/-.. QUALITY OF PRODUCT: QUALITY OF PRODUCT IS NOT THAT GREAT BUT AT THIS PRICE RANGE IT WAS ACCEPTABLE.. BATTERY BACKUP: UPTO 8 TO 9 HRS .. SOUND: IT WAS NOT EXPECTED, BUT SOUND QUALITY IS ACTUALLY GOOD AT THIS PRICE RANGE.. OVERALL IT IS A GOOD PRODUCT AT THIS PRICE RAGE.

name: Jawahar
title: Excellent quality earphone
content: I have been using this for more than a week and the sound quality is excellent which i never expected. Overall build quality is also very good. Overall no complaints. Excellent charge. I have been using this for official calls and talk for at least 5-6 hrs. I am charging the band only once in 2 days. You can buy this product with your eyes closed.

name: Truthfully Unbiased
title: May work or may not work for long...if willing to take the risk...then can go ahead
content: Brought on 27th Oct 2020 and stopped working on 28th Nov 2020...call customer care and if you select 1 for complaints the call just drops...but for option 3 it's bulk orders and if you select 3 the call gets connected. Once connected all that the person says is that we need to write to a mail id given and someone will contact within 48 hours...waiting for the call..........

name: Kaushal
title: Pls.. read my content before buying Boult curve I am very disappointed
content: First thing is no user guide is included.. Last call auto redirect when pressing two time power button is missing.. Bass is good on previous models of Boult curves.. This unit is wasteless because vibration is also missing.. And battery lasting is only 3/4 hours continue music playing on midium volume.. Noise cancellation is just okay not good.. Buttons are also very hard to press.. I mentioned main thing is bass that missing advertising deep bass is fake.. Sound quality is good but not so good.. So pls.. buy if you agree with my content.. I am but four different versions of Boult and I see ,this version of earphone is very poor others rest of the version.

name: Decosta stage
title: go for it......
content: battery backup.... looks.... comfort.... functioning.... connectivity....price..... all things are great...:P..... just missing the vibration in this new version.. the vibration use to eat battery but was really needed... u can use it while doing anything..... I use it really roughly.. and believe me this thing is still doing great when most gadgets i use just die when i use'em like that.. i literally sleep while this amazing neckband is around my neck and when i wake up in the morning i find songs still playing in my ears..... love'em....

name: Dishant
title: Overall Decent Earphones
content: product review based on 2 weeks of usage -. 1. battery gets charged quickly and last for 2 days with normal usage of calls n songs.. 2. pairing is quick and efficient switching over multiple connected device (tried with max of 2 at a time).. 3. Sound quality including bass is fairly decent.. 4. buds are not very much comfortable while using during bed time.

name: M.K SHARMA
title: 100% truth (pros n cons.)
content: I am MANIKANT from Patna got the product yesterday and its vibration alert is not working so i placed a replacement order because it won't have a refundüò†üò†üò†üò†üò†. üßê1. Without vibration it gave me the backup of 15 hours in a full charge (3pm to 5am ..in which 6 pm to 5 am nonstop music played) i will cut 2 hours for the vibration alerts..so approximately it will last for 12-13 hours... üòí2. The bass is just ok..u need an application to tune the volumes of base & all to make it better. üôÑ3. It is very light that u can't feel anything on your neck... BUT because of this it will be a problem to manage it while riding on bike... üòç4. If I talk about comfort and Bluetooth connectivity then yes i will give 5 stars.. ü•∞5.calling quality is also very good.. the mic and the speaker work very good.. ü§î6. while playing a song Sometimes i faced some connection lags for a 1-2 seconds... ü§©7. The built quality is good and the extra wire just hide inside the band which makes it easier to wear.. üò≥8.the charging time is approximately 3 4 hours( it lights blue when it fully charged but if again put the charging pin then again it indicates charging.. ü§≠9. The all three buttons are made in a same plastic plate which some ways confuses me between volume buttons n power button.. ( it is not a problem u will be familiar with this after using some days). üòñ10. The main problem is that it gave a replacement offer not a refund. That the worst thing.. the replacement took me next 4 days to receive and the replacement time is under 10 days... and if the new one will again defected then again it took 4 days to replace... Well played üò†üò†üò°üò°üò°üò°

name: Rk Anand
title: Quality n material of product is not much satisfactory compared to its cost.
content: The delivery was 2 days earlier then expected, I appreciate that.. Connectivity is fast n good... Comfort with band, hooks & buds are good.. Sound Quality is okay for calls.. But to enjoy the music, quality is not upto mark.. Bass & treble are hard to find .. Volume is low at its high level. Material of neckband is not as good as seen in ads.And also not bad too.. Overall Iam just satisfied with the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: These are BEST!!
content: Have been using it since 2 weeks now and I must tell the sound quality is just great!!. The bass is outstanding considering Bluetooth at this price.. Battery backup is also very good.. The battery percentage is not shown in REAL TIME while connected to phone and thats one major issue.. Some connectivity issues while connecting to laptop mi8 be because of my sound driver but OVERALL ITS A BEST BUY!!!

name: Karishma
title: Best sound quality Boult Bluetooth headset
content: Hello all I have heard it for the first time the brand boult and I must tell youthat the sound quality and the bass quality is so good I cannot even hear outside noise when I put it on... the range of the Bluetooth is so good in my big hall also it covers the range connected... it's pure value of money ..you should buy it. the sound quality is so crisp and clear. The headset are so flexible and equality of headset is too good... charge it for 2 hours and it will play for around 12 to 13 hours continuously ...I am in love with this product these days

name: Amazon Customer
title: Product not worth at this price....useless  ..... dead in just 2 weeks....
content: This Product is not worth & durable at this price. Also replaement service or policy of the manufacturer is not customer friendly. So would suggest not to go for this product. I am facing difficulties to deal with manufacturers, asked to send product at their address with our expenses, once they inspect, then they will do the needful either repair or replace.. Amazon should take care of such product & service to customer on their portal.

name: Chinnu
title: Happy customer
content: I was bt afraid of getting the right product features mentioned in the description... But the packing and the product was perfect and the quality is also excellent.value for money.. Also the service part was also appreciated... Right on the next day of registering the warrenty I got a call from boult to enquire about the product quality and all... Which I never experienced in online buying... Warrenty registration was also easy... Hope everything will go well further too... Happy customer

name: Arun
title: Techno Smart
content: Ordered it in the early hour of the day and received it on same day. Grt collaboration in delivery of the product. Vibration is a plus on this product and had to pay extra for it but it really works well. Embossed design on functional buttons helps your touch sense to handle the device at your own comfort. Comfortable material to wear. Colour,design & overall performance is good. I will add more comments after using for some more days.

name: Shradhanjali Prusty
title: An outstanding product
content: Best product to choose for headset with satisfying price and such a good brand.Got impressed by the quality of the product.. Battery stands longer. Earplugs and the product is much comfortable to wear.Shocked by the connectivity technology by which it remains connected for a max radius of almost 25metres with no audio defect.. Delivery was on time with proper safety packaging.. Amazon sticks to his words.. Thanks the company for the product and the seller to sell it to usüòäüòäüòä

name: Sandeep Nagurla
title: Not worth of Rs.999
content: I bought 2,. Not worth for money. Took it for Rs. 1000. 1.you could only talk but could not make a call through BT. 2.It won't warn u before the battery drains/off. 3.Bass is not al satisfactory. 4.No customer care at all, they neverrrr take your calls and neverrrr reply to your mails. 5.there are no many service centers

name: Vivek
title: A good product at this price but battery life is very less
content: Boult Audio ProBass CurvePro Neckband is really a nice product. The sound is pretty cool and there is a reasonable amount of mic noise cancellation also, which I liked a lot. Since I will be using it mainly for conferencing purposes, this is very useful. The music quality is also very good. But the battery life is really bad. Boult should improve the battery.

name: ManiVel M.
title: Average product ,,worth for cost
content: Actually I bought this product on march 21st 2019 the advantages is. 1. The sound quality is very good the opponent can hear our voice clearly and properly. 2. It can be pared with two device at a time. 3. The ear buds fit with our ear properly.it will not often come out during workouts or walking. 4. Worth for price of rupees 1399. Disadvantages. 1. The battery stays only for 4 to 5 hours of continuous use. 2. The volume button is not properly fitted and it's getting shaken. 3. In average , Bluetooth connectivity workout only for distance of 4 to 5 metres

name: krishna
title: powerful mic , excellent bass, 12 hr battery.
content: it is a best product at this price.. sound quality and mic are excellent... mic is vry powerful clear sound can be heard even the band put inside the tshirt... battery lasting for 12 hr... and buy red color..it look awesome than other 2

name: Shweta Suvarna
title: Duplicate products
content: Is Amazon doing competition with flipkart that who can sale more duplicate products?. I ordered boult Bluetooth headphones for my brother which were really nice. Then I again ordered 2 boult headphones IN GREAT INDIAN SALE, which came into different kind of box and every thing is duplicate. Because there is huge difference in sound quality as well as product quality. 1 headphone is already not working within 1 month.. SHAME ON AMAZON FOR SELLING DUPLICATE PRODUCTS.

name: Ravi Kumar
title: Okey for price but not for music lovers
content: I have been using these neckband for more than a week now. My honest review is that it's okey for the price but does not meet the expectations.. The earbuds are comfortable and the band is very light. The sound quality is not up to the mark and definitely a no for music lovers. Bass is not as expected nor is the highs... I'm not against the product but my expectations were quite high I guess. There are connectivity issues and the battery lasts for close to 6 hours on 80 percent volume. I'm planning to go for the truefive true wireless earphones. Hopefully the performance is better.. For the price of INR 999 maybe ok but it would be well worthwhile to invest on something else...

name: Badri
title: Good purchase
content: 1. Sound quality is good. I started using this for my meetings and I see that people are hearing my voice better than before.. 2. Its flexible around the neck and at the same time stable.. 3. The thing that I liked most is that the voice communication about the status of the earphone (like saying "power on", "pairing", "connected", "disconnected", "power off". My other brand earphone just beeps differently for different actions, which is sometimes difficult to understand.

name: Amazon user
title: Good product
content: After 2 month,. Read very carefully its help ( dhyan se padhna),. Dosto acha earphone h. Battery backup bhi thik h. Connectivity bhi achi h.. Per 100%-80% 2hr se 3hr hi battry chalti h, 60% me karib 4hr se 5hr chal jati h. Fir 40% me approx 30 min or 20%me battery chalti hi ni h, turant band ho jata h. To battery percentage partition sahi nahi h, jiske wajha se bhot jagha aapko problem ho jati h. Or aap is problem se bachna chahte h to 60% khtam hone se phle charge kar le. Qk travel me 60% complete hone ke baad aapka sath kabhi bhi chhod sakta h. Jo iska sabse bada weak point h.. Sound quality awesome,. Noise cancellation is also awesome,. Bass quality is also 5 out 5,. Battery back up is also very good 8 to 9 hrs. BUT BATTERY PARTITION NEED TO IMPROVEMENT. ITS A HUGE MISTAKE OF BRAND.. Over all 4.5 out of 5.

name: Raju P
title: NOT USEFULL PHONE CALLS
content: got the product two times, original n replacement.. Luckily I've get to know the issues in few days.. It's ok for 899/- but normal price like 1199/-. * mic is not working properly,. Diallers unable to talk with me for long,. they keep complaining that my voice not. audible to them. * When I get the second productin. replacement, I felt the control was like. cheap Chinese toy along with above problem. Finally I thank that they accept refund atleast.

name: Sahil Chawla
title: Cheap built quality.
content: Sound quality and the bass is absolutely brilliant, but the built quality is too cheap, it worked well for first 3 months, but after that it's power button started causing problems. Though sound quality was good at that time as well, but as now after 9 months, it completely stopped working with the power button kind of broken or what, I don't know. Maybe this is a fake product. Don't know, wasn't able to claim warranty as well, as the QR code of the warranty card doesn't works.

name: Robin
title: Finally a satisfying product.
content: The built quality of the product is excellent... The smooth matt finish makes product look more premium.. Sound is amazing at 30% level. It‚Äôs comfortable at 30% volume.. Then it gets higher n higher... Battery is great.. Earbuds r comfortable wearing under helmet or in regular use.. Buttons haptic feedback is great.. Viberation works perfectly fine.. Everything about this product is loved.. This is 3rd neckband and this is the only one I liked.

name: Vikas Agrawal
title: . It is a stress buster, mood lifter, and overall, it is felt in the form of a beat.
content: The best part about this product was the ease it brought in my life. I literally wore it entire day and even during workout as it settles down around the neck quite easily.. The battery backup has been good so far in 3 months of usage. 12+ hours of usage in one full charge. Looks decent, not very premium but sturdy and is comfortable to wear. Fits snugly in the ear. The sound quality is clear and crisp.. About the cons, it is not really for an audiophile as it has hardly any bass. Noise cancellation could have been better but it is still decent. As many have mentioned, the connection gets distorted in a crowd or when I move 10+ feet away from the phone.

name: NITESH YADAV
title: Smashing blue tooth Earphone neckbend
content: Sound quality is superb, noise cancellation is quite good, need improvement in bass quality. Earphone expansion though 2 clips is just amazing. Charging is fast and can last upto 6-8 hours. Good to buy one. Neck bend is very smooth and light.

name: sivabalan
title: Somebody confirm me it's not a copy
content: The packing is different from the mentioned picture.... The warranty card also didn't apply as the site is down... The box says it's manufactured in China... I have my doubts of it being a copy...you guys also make sure it's not a copy after purchase.... But the headset looks perfect couldn't find any flaw with it..... I have been using using boatrockers 510 for 2 years..... Compared to it i found bass little low in boult as well as low range... But at this price point the bulit quality and sound quality is amazing....

name: ebad arif
title: I would like to say if someone wants this product dont think twice just grab it.
content: I had purchased this product, as by seeing the features it has got in it, and i am happy to say that this is a genuine product according to its features and also in cost. I use to wear it during bike riding so as to attend my calls, the noise cancellation features works so perfectly that other person can't even get to know that whether i am sitting in a quite place or i am riding a bike.. Bass quality is also pretty good and also the battry backup. I use to charge it once in 2 days .

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality Earphones.
content: Received this earphone yesterday evening.. Sound quality is perfect. Good combination of Bass and treble. Can feel every beat.. Connectivity is quick. Detects and connects easily.. Battery life is good. Stayed around 10-11 hrs.As I received this yesterday evening. Have been playing since then. So it's just the first-day review. But performance is good.. Earphones look solid. Build quality is good. The magnates are really helpful to hold the earphones.. One thing I observed during my 10 hours playtime that the music stopped playing itself in the middle. Not sure it gets disconnected or there is some technical problem.. But the overall performance was nice. Good experience.

name: Maheshwaran
title: Not worthy
content: Please choose some other brands, previously I used zebronics headphone and it was good, now I bought this Boult headphone and I disappointed. No good sound, when we get the call while using this headphone it's not saying caller phone number and simply ringing in headphone.

name: Om
title: JUST GO FOR IT
content: Boult audio curve pro bass. Is the best bluetooth in this prize range. I bought in Amazon sell so it's worth for me. Boult audio curve pro bass. Audio quality -better. Connectivity -better. Its main part it is fully charged charge in almost half an hour. & It works in ur whole day.. Neckband quality is best quality materials are use.. So overall my experience is. JUST GO FOR IT. it's value for money.

name: Arun
title: Best performance and stylish neckband
content: Before buying this earphones I bought Sony, JBL wireless earphones which I was not satisfied with its performance and thought I wasted money. However I returned them and got Boult with which I am extremely happy the way it is performing.. Awesome quality and good sound effect with good battery backup. The neck band fits aptly and easy to remove as well. Adding to this, the call quality is good and every music lover would like this neckband.. I would suggest to buy this neckband for daily use.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not satisfied
content: 1. Looks different from the image they showing above. 2. Bass is not good. 3. Sound quality is average. 4. Delivery is good. 5. Boult Curve pro looks like boult curve..there is no difference in the product to differentiate ( price of both is different ..Boult curve is cheaper)

name: Divyansh Prasad
title: Best in battery and sound but very delicate... Not for rough use
content: I have given it four stars it.... Is a very good product the only con is it is very delicate you have to take care of it... It is not for rough use. If you wear and tear and use it roughly like during sleeping or bed time... Probably it will break. But after all it's a very good product sound quality and battery backup is very good. Battery backup is too good... If you want to use it during travelling times it is best in budget earphones.

name: Viren
title: Facing headaches while using it
content: Sound is ok, battery is ok, no technical issues as such however I stopped using it because since I started using it, headache started and sometimes it was not tolerable. I recommend to use it only when it required for a call for a short period of time pls don't use it to watch movies or to listen to music if facing any headache.

name: Hanumanth Godase
title: Finally reaching customer care  ms Mukti he said me to charge the device to 2 hour and then try
content: I can charge the üíØ % and go to use after 1/2 hour he automatically stop then I am coneected charge but there are no response. He is dead. He doesn't respond. Really ambarsing. Finally reaching customer care (12 Jan 2021) ms Mukti he said me, to charge the device to 2 hour and then try to it's turning on but this is not perfect way because this time he is dead I am üíØ sure it is fully charge let's I can try to extra charge.. Now a day 14 March 2021 he is not working. Truly worst üò°. Dont buy a any Boult item

name: Latha
title: Stopped working within 5months of time.
content: The product got delivered to me on 2nd October 2019 and suddenly it stopped working on 17th February 2020.. Its battery back up is not responding once removed from charging port.. Wasn't expecting this kind of problem so early on that I might have used it only for about 2 months in the mentioned time period. Dissatisfied Disappointed.. Edit : After giving it for repair they fixed the issue, still giving 4 star as their employee told to charge it through portable battery or desktop /laptop and not through adapter as it may burn the circuit which I feel is a drawback.

name: Sojesh
title: Awesome headset
content: Awesome headset. Mainly bought so I can listen to songs and attend calls when I'm riding by bike. Sounds quality is outstanding. I was not expecting this kinda bass quality from a simple headset like this. It snugs within helmet without any disturbance. It also reduces unwanted ambient sounds and so if you're looking for a good noice cancellation headset, this is the right one to choose.

name: Siddarth siddy
title: No compromising on Music....!!!!!!!!!!
content: Pros :1) light weight and stylish. 2) connection between the device is faster.. 3) battery pack up just awesome so 2 ratings.. Cons : 1) bass is worst.. 2) noise clearance rated to 2 .5 as per other devices comapred.. 3) lot of disturbance. 4) music played has distrubance and not clear.. Dont dive into some conclusion that the prices are low they have reduced the prices as per the quality.. this is gud to the people who just normal enjoy music and forgt it.. but i love listing to hard drums and raps and this is not the right one for me.

name: Abhishek Shaw
title: Received a fake one..
content: Recived a fake product.. after requesting replacement.. received the real one.. (full story below). Seller is quite sketchy.. but product is good... Here goes the story :. I have seen a friend using this product and I quite liked it.. so bought this one... And the seal was already broken of the product which i received... And one of the earpiece was broke too.. so I called customer service of Amazon.. they were really polite and offered me the replacement... For the time being i was using the broken thinking its original with a defect... But no no no.. i was wrong... The moment i started using it.. man it was bad.. even the ubon wired headphones which i bought for rs100.. was better sounding than this one... And the replacement i received.. sounds so damm good too.. but the product i received at the first place by the seller was a fake.. and i really hate it..

name: Sampath vinay
title: Cheap product fancied as great with a free movie ticket
content: Well I thought I was going to buy a product that‚Äôs worth the price seeing all the positive reviews. It‚Äôs not until I experienced it on my own. I see that all the positive reviews come for the free movie ticket they provide.. Sound quality:. The sound quality is just okay, not great compared to my Apple earphones I used previously.. Connectivity:. This is good. It connects to two devices simultaneously. I‚Äôve had no issues here.. Battery:. The battery is also great. For my medium usage, it lasted for three days.. Issues:. The major issue I have is that there‚Äôs some tapping sound that comes randomly during usage and it never stops till you restart the device. Also, a loud beep sound appears sometimes during usage or calls. This really sucks.. I had these issues when I first purchased it, I thought the product was defective. But after a replacement, the new device worked good initially, but the same problem repeats. So now I‚Äôm going to return this product also for a refund.. I was surprised to see how this product got huge amount of positive reviews despite its performance. This is when I saw the 1 star ratings a few people gave. They had the same problems. Majority of the people here are only rating this product well for the free movie ticket they provide.. So i suggest not to buy this product if you value your 1500

name: Toton Naskar
title: Very bad product..want money back or replacement
content: It is very disappointed for me that this product was not working just after 20 days of buying. So I have sent this to the company for claiming the warranty.They sent back the product but the product still not working.Now it's Bluetooth is not working.So it is very disappointed for me. I believe on the company but it was my mistake. I wasted my money twice,first buyying and second for courier. So I think it is just wastage of money don't buy this product . Sorry to say servicing department of this company is very very bad.

name: arun
title: Awesome product mind blowing.
content: I bought only 999/-. Battery 12+ hours, awesome backup. Bass good in 70% sound. Noise cancellation working very well. Google assistant works well. No connection issues. Light weight,. 100% satisfied with this product. One and only problem,. Vibrating mode not good. Irritating sound.

name: Ayan
title: Good product
content: The product is a very good in repect to its price. I have facing a problem with that is media is disconnecting within a interval of 15 minutes and i have to reconnect it again and again after 15 minutes. But there is no issue with continuous connection of phone calls and its sound. Another problem is it can able to catch every little sound from other side and hence if a person is calling from a gathering then his sound is not clear.

name: MANU B
title: Mic not suitable to take online classes, but headset is best for music.
content: Doesn't fit to my purpose. I am a tutor and looked for a headset with a good mic which can also serve as a music piece. This double purpose is not served. My old normal headset does more work with it's mic than this. I don't recommend this to teachers, while it is good for music. I am not sure whether it has return option, only replacement option is seen in amazon

name: Steffi D'Almeida
title: Met the expectation
content: Good product. It has range only till 4 to 5 metres and then the connectivity issue begins . If I talk regarding quality of sound there is a slight disturbance. Also there's a Google assistance which would be useful. No problems in attending the calls but there's vibration, only beep. Overall till now I liked the product. Therefore I suggest to go for this product and in case you receive a defective product then you can return the same.

name: Ratansinh
title: Boult Audio ProBass - Totally unexpected  good quality.
content: Boult Audio ProBass Bluetooth Wireless Earphones (Black). The earphones look very good and elegant feels very light in hands.. & yes The light yet sturdy, neckband drapes across the neck with supreme comfort.. Product quality is good sound quality is also good a deep thumping bass,. The compact, Flexible Headset, durable and affordable, with Long Battery Life.. Awesome Totally unexpected good quality.

name: Madhan P.
title: I got what I wanted
content: I was looking for a wireless headphone which is. 1. Comfortable inside a helmet. 2. Good battery life. 3. Easy to store. 4. Decent sound. 5. Comfortable to use when I am lying down in bed. Boult curve was flexible , easy to store and ear buds are super cool very comfortable to wear inside helmet and you can go to sleep without even noticing it. It's light weight. I just love the sound , simply wow. Go for it , you won't disappointed. Not sure about the connectivity as I mostly keep my phone within 2 meters . Kudos to Boult .

name: DIVYANSH JAIN ( INDORI EXPLORER)
title: Best for movies and musicüòç
content: Trebles : clean and crisp. Bass : punchy and heavy. Noise cancellation : fine not the best. Good for music and movies yes u can attend callss with it but it is not the best and cancelling noise in background.

name: Satish Singh
title: Please don't buy this product
content: please don't buy this product if you leaving in mumbai or outside Delhi, because if your product stop working you need to courier this product to delhi and courier charges paid by customer.. I'm also very disappointed üòû by Amazon they also not helping me

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review after 1 years usage
content: It stopped working completely even before the completion of 1 year of buying. One side stopped working almost 4 months ago and there is no voice. It is connecting with the phone but there is no voice audible in the earphones. Last time when one of it stopped working, they had asked me to ship it which is again pain for the user staying without it for few days, and for someone like me who needs to be on call most of the day it is difficult. Honestly not recommended. Better to spend extra bucks and buy things from a good company.

name: Abhishek Gupta
title: Not a good or reliable item
content: After few days of usage got fed up with it... Connection has issues sometimes with the mobile , with laptop its even more troublesome.. Battery is horribly draining like anything, cant use it for proper duration as intended, is not average to be clear.. Earbud magnets are now useless after few days.. Charging cable was pathetic, broken within few days.. Overall nothing to rely on this item to be a good headphones running through your day.

name: Aninko Acharjee
title: Value for money.
content: This product is excellent value for the bucks you pay.. I regularly undertake overnight journeys by bus. This is the only headphone which lasts the entire night and almost half a day. Sound quality is good, bass is good. If you are looking for a bt headphone that won't trouble you with charging issue and sound quality, go for this one. You won't regret.. However, during exercises (running) I have seen some connectivity issues. Otherwise for regular day to day used like music, movies, calling this ticks all the boxes.

name: Humorous Doc
title: Not worth the cash...
content: The sound is good s the previous one had recurrent disconnection I asked for a replace ...they replaced me with the new one ...but the new one does not have any features as promised no vibration when call comes..nothing just ucan hear the music ...I am not a paid reviwer go for NOISE OR BOATS WIRELESS..

name: abhi
title: Excellent product..
content: Excellent product.. At that time i came to know. They dont have any service centre. On their website they are having 2 mail ids and a contact no. but they are not replying for any of your mail and mobile is on auto voice mail. By which they send me 1 sms with a link to submit my complaint. After submitting the complaint they ask me to courier the whole product along with the original box to check the problem and if there would be problem than they will send new product. So just to repair the product 1 has to spend extra money to courier it. And after that also i dont think so there woulb be proper solution to your complaint as one is there there to send you any reply.. Total waste of money and time. Pathetic product with pathetic service. Dont buy this.

title: Excellent product...

"Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great...it will last upto 6-7hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 40mins. Connectivity is fine within 15ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested go for it without wasting time... thumbs up Boult curve üëåüëåüëç

I used it for a couple of calls and other party doesn't had any complaints. The only concern I had is the the seal of headset box was opened. But there was no compliant with the item inside.

name: Gaurav Deb
title: Bluetooth is not 5.0 !!
content: Got this product at Rs. 999 on 8.8.19.. Considering the price the product is decent.. Pros: Good battery life and low charging time, budget friendly, decent sound quality, can connect to multiple devices simultaneously.. Cons: Plastic used is cheap, bass could be more clear, the speaker placement is not perfect as it makes some chirping sound when pressure is applied, listening music on a volume above average leads to minor head ache.

name: Ankur B.
title: Boult Curve Earphones with Neckband
content: Very nice product with lots of features like; sound quality is very good, magnetic earbuds, TTS engine for the device on/off, speak caller-id, etc. Value for money. I don't find any other product with all such features and built quality. Very light-weight neckband that is not at all irritating during the workout. Battery backup is also very good (8-10 hrs of listening time). The feature I like the most is its vibration in the neckband on any incoming call. It notifies you with the vibration when an incoming call comes and your magnetic earbuds are tied up in the neck.. Overall its a very good deal in this price range.

name: Sathwik R
title: Worth the buy.
content: Sound quality is good, it gives you a good listening experience. Battery life is really good, lasts you 12-13 hours easily on a single charge. Noise cancellation is also decent.. The only drawback I have find is, the material to make the band ends feels like cheap plastic, which isn't clear to see on the photos, but the heads are good quality metal.. Also, the Bluetooth connectivity dips a bit at times, but not very often.. Overall I am happy with this product!

name: SGS
title: These headphones are designed to annoy you... buy something else.
content: Let's face it: these are cheap headphones meant to used for exercising, commuting, etc. If you're an audiophile, you aren't getting these to really hear the vocal range of your favorite Mozart opera. The audio is fine for listening to a podcast or talking on the phone on your way to work. But compared to similarly cheap Skullcandy headphones I have had in the past, these headphones feel like they were designed to annoy you. First, the bluetooth connection drops pretty easily. Even if the distance from headphone to your phone is from your head to your pocket. Second, the battery life is pretty bad too. It will start giving you an annoying voiced warning saying battery life is low even when there is 40% left; and it will die within 2 or 3 mins from when the warning starts. Finally - and this is the worst - there is a vibration 'feature' that is truly awful. If the head phones get out of range of the connected device, it doesn't just gracefully let you know and disconnect. No. It just keeps buzzing/vibrating and drives you to distraction. Suppose you are connected to your laptop and phone. Then you get a phone call and walk away from your laptop to receive it. Well guess what, the headphones start buzzing/vibrating in the middle of your call because they are now out of range of the laptop. Jeez. Just miserable! It even does this buzzing when you turn it on and off. In the end, and even at the cost of losing the money I paid for these headphones, it was worth it to just smash these headphones with a hammer and be rid of them and that horrible buzzing. Do yourself a favor and buy something else.

name: G Rao
title: Bad buy
content: When something sells cheap, there's a reason, but then I seem to fall for the tactic every time. Poor sound quality. One ear piece came open revealing the wires inside. I threw the box away, so unable to return. One of my all time bad buys. I'd probably go for samsung next time..

name: Abhishek Sharma
title: Very avg quality product
content: Received it few hours before. Will write detailed review after using it more.. Not so good - the initial impression is the sound quality is very average the build quality is very average do not get a field that will last long in terms of its durability.. Ok - seems that gets connected well and able to pick calls and other person or the caller is able to hear you that part seems to be ok as of now.

name: AVS RAMANUJAN
title: Not good for phone calls and discussions. May be ok for listening to music or lectures offline.
content: Package was damaged when it was delivered first, so reordered same product. Looks wise good, comfortable etc. But, voice gets jumbled during phone calls or even during zoom calls even when the phone is in your hand. Quite irritating as you can't hear the other person properly during a discussion or phone conversation. Had to return it finally after a few days' usage.

name: Raj Demetra
title: Don't buy it waste of money
content: After after receiving the product I have received a WhatsApp message saying that please write a positive feedback so that you will get hundred hundred rupees cash back... For first five days the product worked properly... so I give a positive feedback.. But i didnt recieved the cashback...from the 8th day the sound quality decreased...and the mic is not working properly ...battery is draining too fast ..its only giving 4 -6hours battery....totally not satisfied waste of money....I suggest you to go for boat or any other brand,but not bout....

name: dhirajp
title: Average..
content: Not worth for 1499 certainly..you can give a try if you are getting it for little less..i got it for 999 in prime sale.. Sound and bass quality is not so good..if you are fond of music,bass you will not like it.. Build quality is very bad..plastic used for production of headset feels like road side plastic.Not durable..can get easily damage if not used carefully.. About Bluetooth- was able to connect my op 5T with it. Bluetooth range is good upto 10-15 feet if not obstacles are in between ..range gets affect accross room.. Battery- dropped from 100 to 80% for usage of 1-2 hrs

name: Srishti
title: Deep sound & great bass.
content: I ordered this product on 16th july and it came within 2 days. I am really happy to use this product it has great sound clearity and bass. It has deep sound so i don't have to listen at high volumes. The neckband is light weighted so doesn't gets in the way, very flexible & easily bendable, so handle with care. It has got awesome battery backup and charging is also fast. I have been using this product from 8 days. According to its cost it is a very great product. I am a regular user and a music lover & i listen to all types of music bolly, holly, trance etc. As a music enthusiast i loved this neckband. I have tested it for running & jogging is good and also comfortable while laid back. The only thing that bothered me is its range its very less, cant go away from the connection for like more than 5 metres otherwise sound breaks very easily other than that it is a great product indeed sound quality is good, noise cancellation is also good as sound is crisp and clean & bass quality is awesome. I am satisfied for now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good bluetooth headphone at affordable price
content: Boult audio probass is a pretty decent bluetooth headphone. Good sound quality, battery backup, bass, great microphone - the other person can hear you very well. I'm able to connect it to 2 devices at same time - phone and computer.. Boult should improve the range. The range is max 15 feet, voice starts crackling after 10 feet.. Overall, a good bluetooth headphone with an affordable price range.

name: Shabaaz
title: Boult curve (mic not working)
content: I had bought this product on 24 june 2020, same received on 29 june 2020. It was working fine untill 10-12 days after using all of sudden mic was not working and i tried several times changing the another phone but the mic is not working the speakers are good but mic is totally not working.. Hence i request the supplier to repair or else replace the product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Read this before you buy
content: Pros. Good design and build with flexible neckband. Easy to pair and easy to use for calling. Good battery life (mine standby was 6+ hrs). Budget friendly under 1k. Now let's sound. Sound level is a bit on lower side. Bass is average. Noise cancellation is below average. One touch remote pad is not very friendly in switching music. Bluetooth disconnects frequently when in range of multiple devices. If you have some more money to put go for jbl else this one is good to settle with at this price tag.

name: Aakash
title: You must buy it once
content: Hi guys. Im having this boult curve for last almost 1 year, but before this latest version i had older version which had vibrate feature as well, and that was tooo gud yaar also i have refered to my three friend and they are still using, but you have the kind of wire holder on the neck side and because of that i got damaged previous version, then i bougth latest version 5.0 Bluetooth version but im having a bit issues like- voice Fleakering, connection problem during hearing songs, so u must upgrade that features and im using 5.0 Bluetooth version phone

name: Deepakkk
title: Superb sound quality...juts go for it
content: I just ordered this product two days ago...and after using it making this review..i juts wanna tell u that this wireless neckband is perfect in terms of design , looks and sounds...just loved it... Sound quality is more than superb.very crispy and clear..u can feel each of highs, lows even that particular instruments beats.sound is loud..bass is good..fits perfectly in the neck... I BOUGHT IT WITH BOAT 255F but returned the boat... Blindly go for it... Thank u Amazon.

name: DINESH KR SHARMA
title: Very bad
content: On the basis of reviews I purchased this but my experience was so bad as just after use of around 1 month i start facing problems such as switch on this device takes time nd sumtime not connected noise cancellation is so poor voice quality is also ok ok üëé

name: Palika Shetty
title: Not worth buying
content: I am totally disappointed with this product. Call quality was very poor. I was not able to hear other person's voice when i was on call. You will have to keep high volume to hear properly. Especially if you are travelling, you can not hear anything due to traffic noise. Noise cancellation is not at all good.. Volume was very low in left side of earbud. Not suitable to even listening to music or video. If you want better results, you will have to sit in a calm and silent place and keep volume high, then only you will be able to hear properly.. I have returned this product. I have used boat rockers 255. That is much better than this. Issue with boat rockers 255 is service is pathetic

name: Amazan
title: Worth the money I spent
content: Seal was open but had all the pieces inside, with 80% charge, bass quality is nice, audio is like hearing in a big hall due to Dolby Atmos settings in dynamic, if kept in none volume is optimal, with half the volume I get nice hearing sound full sound gives too much sound that none can't hear, ear fitting is quite a quality, need to check battery backup within a month, product comes with one-year warranty. (Will update if any changes)

name: R S KAMATH
title: WORST product
content: Within 2 months Bluetooth is defective. Usless please don't buy WORST product and only one service center in India that is. In Delhi. Very difficult to contact. I have given to Delhi service center but they do not reply. My headphones not returned by service center. Please don't buy these headphones

name: Hossain
title: Bad experience from Bolte
content: I buy this on 16th March 2020 and now the head set Mike not working this product one year warranty When I claim for service they asked me to send in Delhi they don't have service center in Kolkata and they not mention when they returned back so my experience please don't buy this product

name: Gunjit
title: Consider viewing another brand as well
content: I dont usually review products but this is necessary.The audio Quality is good bass is good, but if you are looking to wear something for a long time then its not the one. After half n hour or one hour. Your ear will start hurting.its been a week i am using it. And there is some issue with my piecw i think that automatically the sound gets off even if it is connected to the bluetooth. After trying few time then it works properly. So i would suggest.. Do consider another bluettoh earphone as well and watch utube unboxing as well. They help.

name: Sri Vignan Technologies
title: Good
content: When I make call on conference. Device disconnects my call. First I thought it was mobile/network issue. Later I found its Bluetooth issue.. The only problem I got with this headset. Rest other things are just wonderful

name: gitanjali k.
title: Average product
content: I got product yesterday. Everything was there except user manual. Due to which I found difficulty to operate it. But then i review some you tube vedios then operate it. I charged it for 2 hours. Its voice quality is fine. Easy to use and connect. light weighted .I am fine with my product.. Although Buttons give a cheap look but fine in working.. Anybody who do not want to spend more may go for this product.

name: AshwinBharadwaj
title: Worth the money
content: I have been using the device since a week for now, overall experience is excellent for what I have paid (999 INR).. Didn't feel the noise cancellation to the highest extent. Haven't measured the battery backup completely though, however its fitting into my daily needs and no regrets. Not getting a good experience with Google assistant. Not a good choice if you use multiple bluetooth devices and wants a smart switch between them.

name: vik69
title: You purchase this item.
content: Sound Quality was amazing, bass not best but good as want, overall all bits are listen clearly even in riding on bike,. battery life two days after full recharge and emergency you charge only twenty minits and get upto 2 hours music nonstop normal volume not full volume. i am satisfied to purchase this Neckband. in box extra buds not found even include in box contents

name: Shane Fernandez
title: Not bad, but comparitively falls short in quality
content: I have both Boult audio and Oneplus bullets and i find that the quality difference is very evident. It is good only if you are absolutely not willing to pay the differential price for better quality

name: Niranjan
title: The product was awesome and good quality I loved it üòä
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great...it will last upto 6-7hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 40mins. Connectivity is fine within 15ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested go for it without wasting time... thumbs up Boult curve üëåüëåüëç

name: Shijas
title: Best earphone in this price range.
content: Am using this earphone for about 10 months now and i loved this earphone. I have checked other brands earphones in this price range brands like Boat Noise but they all disappointed me. This earphone have best sound quality than any other brands. Good bass and comfortable to use.. Good bluetooth connection.. Only disadvantage is build quality but still it satisfies me. Best earphone for workout.

name: Ameeruddin Syed
title: Go for it if you don't care of your auditory health...
content: I can't give any rating to this coz I got earpain on one day of use. The other features may be good but what of their use if we can't hear without peace. The bass is generated and noise cancellation is due to entirely closed ear which may give little thrill at beginning to have long term issue of ear problems. These extremel in ear canal earphones cause great damage to ears on long term use...

name: Anupam
title: Very Impressive overall sound
content: Overall sound is very good. Bass is soft and comfortable, not that extra punchy bass. Vocals are good. Overall instruments separation is very impressive. One thing is more important that every song is very comfortable when i listen with this earphone. And everytime I m Enjoying each kind of music. It is note for those who wants toomuch skull crushing bass . But who wants to enjoy the music it is for those. Go blindly. Voice quality is impressive. Vibration is too good. I did not expect this kind of vibration. üòäüòäüòä I am so impressed. üëçüëçüëç

name: Harsh Prakash
title: Value for money
content: Great product. Purchased black colour one about a month ago and using it since then.i am very satisfied with the product.. 1.Build quality is really nice.no sign of wear and tear even after a month of daily usage.. 2. Great battery life,I charge it on alternate days. I listen to music at medium volume for 3-4 hours daily and even after 2 days it has some charge.. 3. Sound quality is good.better than almost every wired earphone in 500 to 1000 range.. 4. Comfortable to wear. It's very light so u don't get any discomfort.. 5. Range is about 10-15 feet depending on obstacles in between. Also depends on device connected to.(my laptop gives better range than my phone). 6. You can use it for calling it is as good as my phone when calling. noise cancellation works just not that great.

name: rama
title: Sm pieces are not reliable
content: I got this product for the first time two years bk... still it's working perfectly...after that I ordered again as a gift for my father...I received as defective product...do I requested for replacement..I received the new product...but within next 3 months it's not working now...trying to contact seller...unable to proceed

name: Krantikumar
title: Buy at your own risk
content: Simple review in short:. A budget earphone with just a decent sound but not so amazing or satisfactory.. Build Quality is not upto expectation.. Packing is good.. The boult audio website says it has vibration alert but the product sold on Amazon doesn't have the same. So product genuineness if it is really a boult Audio product is doubtful. Can't expect much. Try out other options before going for this. Boat could be a better option this brand.

name: RAJU SIRIVELLA
title: Bad in service
content: Pls don't buy this product received brand new bluethooth earphones with in 1 weak gone faulty and again received new one this new one gone faulty with in 6 months. Now iam tried to service center not available in major cities. Only available in new Delhi. They said pls courir our product. For warranty pls don't expect. I recommend to by mi product because service center available near by our location.. Pls pls pls don't buy this product no service center....

name: Vimaladevi Rajkumar
title: Best ever headphones
content: The best wireless headphones is boult audio probass curve at the good budget it is not good for online gaming because it has little latency issues if you want to play online games with headphones I rather prefer you wired headphones so it does not have latency issues but Bluetooth headphones if it's even Bluetooth 5.o has latency issues you can use it for workouts and listening music etc... over all the best quality is too good and noise cancellation is awesome a good headphone and stylish......

name: Amazing Abhi in Amazon
title: Good product in comparison to the Cost, value for money
content: The product for the price is doing great, the ear plugs fit perfectly, noise cancelling is good. Sound quality and build quality is quite good. Have been using it for more than a month no problems till now. Battery could have been bit better but till now it's good. Overall a good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: For starters in this range its nice... Read whole review..... To know
content: After reading so many reviews finally bought... Acc to me sound is loud enough at full volume, can listen at 70% volume on walking on roads also, at full vol sound distorts a little bit, neck band made of rubberized material, persionalliy i felt that wire material is not very good, its ok, and yaa Bluetooth range is less, while talking and keeping phone in room and going to the next door just 90 degree to my room the connection distorts and the voice cuts a bit, git it un 899/- sale. On hanging it on neck u won't feel very much becoz of light weight, mic is also good other person can hear Ur voice.... Overall nice product .....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Nice Product
content: I bought 2 earphones and both are working as expected.. They have good Bluetooth connectivity and is sweat proof.. The good thing about connectivity is that as soon as you power on it gets connected to your phone or laptop without any delay.. Sound quality is really very nice and you don't even get tired of earbuds even if you wear it for the whole day.. And it has superb battery backup. I charge it once a day and I use it for the whole day for meetings and songs etc.. Thanks!

name: Dhanraj
title: Good product for heavy use on budget
content: Well thought product interms of wire entanglement and battery duration. I used this product for 9 months without any problem. Last month my headphones stopped working. I raised ticket with <support@boultaudio.com>. Their response was timely and replaced the headphone with working one. I have been using this for call, music, playing games. Its worth for every penny spent on this. After their friendly support on replacing the faulty one i am writing this review with the extra appreciation and confidence on the brand.

name: Vani
title: Go for it
content: I have used for 1 month and this product is very good. Im couldn't able to find any issues till date.. Pros:. Voice quality is superb. Battery backup is very good and useful for long hour users.. Best product for this price.. Cons:. I couldn't find any. Go for this.

name: Dileep
title: Defective piece is what we were given
content: Just after using for a week, the buttons aren't working, seems like they've sent a defect piece and bluffed us.. Worst product and don't buy from this sender. Sender is using Amazon to sell the defective pieces with nice packaging. And after 7days we can't return which is why they choose Amazon to sell the defective pieces.. Just after a week, it is completely useless for us. üòê

name: Jaya Pillai
title: Too pricey for the not so great sound quality
content: I have been using the neckband for 2 weeks:. Pros:. 1) the neckband sits snug on your neck and doesnt feel like its there. 2) The battery on one time charging, stays for 5 hours on continous use and on standby it stayed for me around 3-4 days( i power it off when not in use). 3) It has a voice assistant.. 4) bluetooth range is good covers one large room. Cons. 1). 2) On first time connecting, my mobile(redmi note 5 pro) was unable to detect the device i had to restarted the headphone and mobile multiple times before atlast it got detected.. 3) on normal wind too sound faints a lot.. 4) Sometimes no sound come through. I would have to switchoff and on again and again until the sound starts to come through again.

name: SACHIN ARORA
title: Overall A Good Bluetooth Earphones, True Value for Money!!
content: I loved the Boult Curve Neckband Earphones, sound quality, build quality, light weight, very comfortable to wear. Yiu can wear for many hours in a row, and u won't find any sort of difficulty as u will feel that u r hardly wearing anything. The only concern I faced was with the BT range, It hardly goes beyond 2 mtrs. If ur phone is in ur pocket or ur laptop is in front of u, then it works fine otherwise the connection stars to drop.

name: Arindam
title: Seriously superb
content: Unexpectedly superb headphone.i was thinking before ordering it as it's a new brand.then i took a try.and bang.. 1.its stylish.. 2.sound quality and bass outstanding. 3.build quality superb. 4.mic quality fantastic.. 5.battery back up is unbelievable.its seriously of 2 days non stop battery backup.. 6.packing and everything looks fine.. And finally. 7.i got it in 1300 in a sale.and it seriously deserves to be more costly.. So go for it without having any doubt.

name: Sudheer
title: Value for money product under 1500 rupees
