content: Totally value for the money product under 1000 bucks.. Pros:. Sound bass. Battery backup- appox. 8 hours. Build quality in price range (don't compare this with high end neckbands).. Cons:. Noise cancellation of voice calls are not good in traffic. (Other person can hear lot of noises other than ur voice). Ears are feeling heavy after keeping the buds for some time (hope ear comfort is different to every person). Over all, if u r within the budget, this would be the best wireless band under 1500 rupees.

name: KP
title: Misleading specs, Don‚Äôt buy
content: Let me start with the conclusion, These headphones just plain suck. This is a complete waste of money. These don‚Äôt have Bluetooth 5.0 like the page says, their packaging says it has Bluetooth 4.2. The packaging is horrible, the ‚Äúlogo‚Äù on the ear pieces is basically a poorly centered sticker that can come off with minimal effort. The sound quality is remarkably poor for this price. Low bass output and tinny treble. Overall pretty false advertising. The icing on the cake is the way they‚Äôve managed to package the extra ear buds into a ziplock bag. This poor quality is unacceptable if you‚Äôre claiming an MRP of around 5k INR. Disappointing.

name: Shreya jain
title: Just go for it blindly
content: I swear go for this one blindly I was a little hesitant before buying but now that I have received and have been using it for quite some time I can say that this is literally the BEST purchase I‚Äôve made so far. Don‚Äôt get confused it‚Äôs honestly amazing the sound quality the battery everything I may sound like I am getting paid for writing this review but I am not TRUST ME. With the price point of view it‚Äôs a steal just grab this you won‚Äôt regret it <3 hope I helped some of y‚Äôall

name: Pratik chikane
title: Excellent Product
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great...it will last upto 6-7hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 40mins. Connectivity is fine within 15ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested go for it without wasting time... thumbs up Boult curve üëåüëåüëç

name: N Joy
title: very bad experience
content: Received in one day. Product build seems to ok for the price. Connectivity 3-4 meters good after that distortion happens. and if you are using old version of Bluetooth, lot of connectivity issues especially laptops with lower versions. Sounds is ok but not up to the mark as mentioned.. After usage of two months, Bluetooth is not working. not turning on

name: Saket
title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. DISAPPOINTING PRODUCT.
content: I am writing this review after using this product for the last 2.5 months. The Bluetooth connectivity is below average. It doesn't work for me, when I keep my phone even in my back pocket, so you can judge the range. It takes forever to connect and sometimes I end up trying again and again, before it finally connects. This happens to be my worst device choice in the last 5 years.

name: Mahesh reddy
title: Never Purchase these Boult audio Pro Bass Curve
content: there was lot of disturbances with the bluetooth connection it will automatically disconnect. as a sports player u cannot use this it will discoonect and connnect by its own but its lot of time when u are playing outside games noise cancellation works fine upto some extinct. and the earbuds are very loose the ear buds stick into your ears when u removed the buds after a game or driving. and its been 6th month the wire has been broken

name: Yashvi
title: Very very disappointing product
content: This product is either duplicate or it's of a substandard quality. At first when I received it stopped working in two days. Then Amazon replaced it and it worked hardly for two months and suddenly stopped working and or charging. Total waste of money. Am going to file a complaint in consumer court since Boult company who has given one year warranty is not giving any reply to my complaint. Amazon also is responsible for this. It's my advice not to buy this product at all.

name: Abhinav
title: The best budget wireless earphones.
content: Boult curve probass is the best earphones in the segment hands down.Everything from build quality, sound quality to connectivity is excellent.. I ve been using these for a week now and my experience with them is excellent.. It comes with warranty card and registering for warranty is very easy, just scan the qr code and fill the online form.. Since i have to make multiple calls during the day,the built in mic helps a lot. All in All great product from Boult audio. I would recommend these 10/10

name: Yogesh yadav
title: Good for music, call and movie. Bad for gaming
content: The boult curve neckband is a great deal to have. The sound quality and the bass is fabulous. The product feels premium, and it has a secure fit to wear and travel. I have very satisfied with the outcome of this neck-band, the battery life is extremely efficient. It last as long as the company has promised. The only thing where im disappointed is while Gaming. To be honest its definitely not a gaming accessory. The audio gets delay comparing the real time streaming. So excluding that i would suggest this to everyone.

name: Raj ghaswala
title: Must have
content: Earlier i had use zoosk headphone and comparing to price and everything i feel this one is superior in everything.. Sound and bass is good and also there is noise cancellation.. Also battery life is long and wire is short so it dont tend to break.. If you are planing to buy a bluetooth headphone il will recommend you this one.

name: Ishaan
title: STRICTLY DON'T BUY- NO NOISE CANCELLATION /BAD BATTERY BACK UP
content: First order:. 1. Battery back up not adequate. 2. Listener getting other noises more than my voice - NO NOISE CANCELLATION. 3. Can't listen when other person talking in low voice. AFTER REPLACEMENT :. Got damaged product, Not starting after 100% charge (I think its also returned product). So Simply don't buy, give them time to improve their product.. Try any other INDIAN BRAND üáÆüá≥. Thanks

name: Ashutosh
title: Best in the budget.
content: It's been near to 1 week and I am totally satisfied by the quality provided.. Here's my score for the product.... Build quality - 5/5. Noise cancellation - 5/5. Bass - 4/5; I believe there are much more. improvements to be made as the. treble and bass are imbalanced at. high volume.. Flexibility - 5/5. Weight - 5/5. Ease to the ears - 5/5. Overall, budget and the quality index both are balanced for this particular product.

name: Kishore Kumar
title: When Price Low The Quality Also Low
content: When I first open the Seal was broken. I bought it in offer price Rs. 999. Even though I don't mind and open 1 earphone bud missing. But small pair is there so not much to worry. Sound quality is average. But the volume is much enough.

name: hasan
title: Smart service but product is not upto the mark
content: As told the headphone is not waterproof or sewat resistant because one day i was very sweaty while my work out. That was my last day i used. The next the headphone was not turning on and not charging etc.. Then i claim for a replacement as it is covering 1 year warranty.. Than i got another earphone which was good but i think its a used one. Np but atleast they have provide a working headphone.. Thanks Boult team!!

name: Ravi
title: Baterry problem not solved with replacement
content: Purchased it on 26-09-2020. After two months baterry problem started, the baterry was draining just after 2hours. Registered a complaint and as per their suggestion, returned the product to Delhi for replacement during January 2021. Still waiting for the product. The response was not at all appreciable. I had purchased three such items and this one had battery problem. Since, they did not respond in time, buying a new one with a hope of getting replacement very soon.

name: Pradeepkumarhotta
title: The product is nice but wires are week.
content: I like the product very much and delighted to use since 2019 but now the outer wires are torn away. I tried to replace the wires at customer paying the cost he refuses saying your warranty is over.

name: binoy
title: Good one
content: Have been using this product for past 4 months , working without any problem , loved the vibrator feature as you will never miss any call even though if you forget to put ear piece , i would suggest everyone to give a try , you will not regret

name: Prime Customer
title: Pretty Good earphones..
content: Sound Quality is pretty good.. the battery backup is also good... the best part is the wires are from behind and they do not interrupt in between.. I hope the after sales are good too..

name: Deep Ganguly
title: Very very POOR QUALITY!!!
content: Very Very Poor quality. The earphone stop working within 3 days of purchase, I got replacement within 3 days but the new one having battery back up for only 30 minutes after full charging.. Please do not buy it!!!!!!!!!

name: Akanksh  Singh
title: Best budget earphones...
content: I bought this product a few 2 months ago for Rs 899. Ill say its a pretty good deal for that price. I use it for listening to music during workout and jogging. One feature which sets this product apart is its noise cancelation. I can hardly hear anyone speak on medium volume. The quality and bass are good for the price. So far so good. I ll have to see hiw long it lasts, so say whether it was worth it.

name: Karunamoorthy
title: Light weight and durable
content: The Boult probass curve has extraordinary sound quality and its a light weight product, so that you can't feel extra weight on your üëÇ. Service center also be quick response. My earphone was get soaked in water due to rain, and its not working properly. I contact service center they fix the problem within a week. service is amazing.. Quality of sound is good. Buttons are good.

name: Karthick
title: After 20 days not working this product
content: I order this product 18th September this product not good worthless quality super earring quality then how to say recent 20 days this this product not working just to feed difference this is not connect properly bluetooth device Bluetooth device connectivity problem noise cancellation is in low noise cancellation waste product I buy 1399/-I don't how to replace product just use 20 days only not working very very very bird poor quality build quality superb earring supported best quality but battery battery nice product up to 10 hours use this product no problem please don't buy better than boat rockerz 225

name: Pekhan sarmah
title: Built quality is very nice
content: Built quality is very good. Battery backup is also very good. Since I got it yesterday, I am continuously using it for 4.5 hours (approx), still 60% of battery exists. So very nice battery backup.. I could not activate the vibration mode on ringing in the neckband as claimed by many. I don't know why.. The sound quality is very good. Not very high bass, but the acoustic sound you'll get. The lows and highs are nicely adjusted.. Thanks boult

name: Amazon Customer
title: VERY PATHETIC PRODUCT
content: VERY PATHETIC PRODUCT. I GOT A DEFECTED PIECE TWICE. 1ST PIECE STOPPED WORKING IN 3 DAYS, 2ND PIECE CAME WITH VIBRATION NOT WORKING. I STRONGLY RECOMMEND NOT BUYING THIS DEVICE AND GOING FOR A MORE KNOWN BRAND LIKE SAMSUNG ITFIT OR REALME BUDS OR MI NECK BAND. EVEN THE REFUND PROCESS IS EXTREMELY SLOW. GOT MY 1ST REPLACEMENT AFTER A MONTH.

name: Gaurav Kondvilkar
title: Budget Wireless Earphone @999rs
content: Best Quality wireless Headset in Budget. Pros-. 1. v5.0. 2. Deep Bass. 3. Neckband headset east to wear. 4. Good cable Management. 5. perfect fit for in-ears headset. 6. superb Mic quantity. Cons-. 1. Vibration alert have been discontinued from company. 2. Sound is not pure at 100% Volume. 3. Major Bluetooth drops when travelling. 4. 10m Bluetooth range

name: Udayakiran Koppaka
title: Worst Sound Quality and Supplier Delivered a product which someone had already returned.
content: Product sound quality is WORST and supplier had dispatched the product which was already returned by someone itseems. Seal of the External box is confirming that.. Supplier shouldn't do this.. So, made replacement order and got another product. But, new product got damaged (one ear phone not working) with in a month of usage.

name: Nijaz
title: Decent in the Price Range
content: I have used one for almost 1 year and it started having problems. But considering the budget, I felt okay and ordered again. The one feature which made me order again was the multiple connectivity. You can connect it with 2 devices simultaneously.

name: Kushagra
title: Best wireless earphones bellow 1500
content: Before buying , this Neckband i checked a lot of reviews on YouTube, Amazon etc. And i finnally ordered it... My experience is Amazing üòç Seriously, in this rate you will not get anything better.. It completely fulfills my purpose, Listening Music , Workout, and Surprised with it's Call Quality... üëåüèªüëåüèª it's Mic is So... good that , you can whisper üòâ and other person can listen you easily .

name: Darshan K.
title: Product is Best but Careful You have Not any Defective One
content: Best Sound Quality with Bass and Good battery Life Too.. I think Bluetooth Range of device is Not Enough and if any Obstacles between Device and Mobile/ PC it can Create Disturbance and Some time It's Disconnected.. Also Make Sure you Receive Right Product Means Product don't have and Demage or Any Manufacturing Defect and seal is Not Broken.. I Ordered this product 3 Times and 2 Times I replaced it, I have received 2 Times Defective Product one time Used Product and all Three times seal was Broken.

name: sreeranj
title: Good one
content: I was skeptical about making the shift from wired to bluetooth earphones. But purchasing the probass audio curve has been a very good choice. Got at a discounted price. The sound quality is good, be it playing media or attending calls. And the best part is its battery backup. It takes over 2 hours for a full charge, but gives you more than a day worth of backup. Would recommend to anyone looking for bluetooth earphones!

name: Rahul Jaiswal
title: Awesome products.
content: I am giving 5 stars for this product because I like this Bluetooth very much.. I purchased 3rd boult audio bluetooth in it.. Because of Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. Sound quality was very impressive and clear. Bass is great. it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume.. Battery Life it's really great...it will last upto 10-12hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 20mins. Connectivity is fine within 15ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested go for it without wasting time..... Thanks for Boult Audio curve Proüëå

name: Saurabh Adeeb
title: Great for calls, disappointing for music playback
content: While these headphones are great for phone calls, I am very disappointed with the quality of music playback on these. I use these on my bicycle rides, and the music playback severely lacks quality. However, the call sound quality is great and the other person can hear you loud and clear so I guess it does that job really well.. Also, the earbuds don't fit too well (I've tried different sizes). Maybe I'm inserting them wrong but they just didn't work well for me.

name: Saurabh
title: Cheap product, feel like cheated. WASTE OF MONEY.
content: Wish i could give it a negative rating but I'm forced to get single start rating. Don't get fooled by the offer and pictures shown. In reality the earphones look so cheap, made of low quality plastic, can be easily broken. One of the earplugs falls so easily and not comfortable to wear. Sound quality is ok ok type, battery backup is not good.. Wish i could get refunded/replaced. The product stopped working from one side of in less than 10 days.. @Boult - Are you listening to customers?. Please stop cheating customers and give products worth the price we are paying for it.

name: AJMAL SHAJUDEEN
title: Classy runner headset!
content: The quality of the headphones are superb. Riding while wearing this is not recommended at all but yeah, running with this is cool as the headphones doesn't drop off. Yeah of course, a pouch for the headphones would have been great. And the best thing I find is the gap in the neck band to tuck in the long wire with the speakers.. Hope this review helps out someone in making a selection for headphone.. Yours. Ajmal Shajudeen

name: Arup Kumar Ghosh
title: Awesome product
content: Awesome product. Very user friendly. Easy to charge and easy to connect. The LED indicator really helps to recognize charging, on/off, connected conditions!. Very comfortable to hang around the neck and the earpods are also comfortable.. The sound quality and noise cancellation are biggest plus of this product.. Feeling good to own such a nice product!. Thanks Boult!

name: amit
title: No user guide was available with this headphone.
content: User guide was missed . And sound is not so good at high volume. I had used this boult bluetooth earphone some months ago but that was much better than this. I think this one is a defective piece bcj sound starts scattering as the volume goes up......... jist got replacement of my previous boult audio curve probass. And as expected it is also a defected piece. Battery side is not properly closed. I think amazon has made up its mind not to deliver ok products. Very much disappointed by amazon.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor quality
content: Never buy this products. My switches are gone with in 2 months. Any how I have fixed that with cello tape. Instead of spring operated costly switches very cheap quality metal foils are used. Which are stick to the board with plastic tape type material. My on off switch was not working. After opening the board I have fixed that metal foil with tape.

name: Piyush Kumar
title: Warranty Problem
content: To Claim warranty, You have to send your headset to Delhi. It's been more than 10 days, I sent for repair to service centre; not yet received the product and customer care is also not reachable. sent more than 5 emails, didn't get response till now.. Opt for boat company as they pickup and replace your headset if any any problem occurs(I got new one after replacement). In one year time, battery wears out and vibration feature is not working.

name: Parampreet Kaur
title: WORST PRODUCT EVER
content: Worst product ever.. I bought it in june and it stopped working in August. Not charging at alll, the earphones aren't even switching on. I tried for replacement and went through the whole process of warranty but they keep asking me to parcel it to them.. Why on earth should i spend one more penny on this product for courier when i have already paid ‚Çπ1000.. My experience is so bad with these earphones and i am still hoping i can get a replacement or atleast my money back.

name: Kiran N
title: Boult Products are üëç at their pricing
content: I have purchased this product during Sale and the sound quality for the Price is good.. Battery lasts long (gives me for 3 to 4 movies with around 60% of volume) and battery standby is more than i expected.. Overall if you are not an audiophile, then you can purchase products from boult. Seems they are price effective for daily usage.

name: swathi k
title: Great product with reasonable price
content: The sound quality is really awesome of Boult Audio Curve Neckband. Sound Quality is very much nice with great Bass Quality and this is exactly same what I was looking for. Battery backup is great within 30-45 mins it will get fully charged and with one charge it will go on with all day. Overall this Product is great and in future I would love to buy another products of Boult Audio.

name: Taniya Debnath
title: A decent product
content: This is a decent product that you can get alternative to boats 255.. this has better sound stage than boats and a more balanced sound signature compared to the boats.. boats are bass heavy that muffles other sounds... Contrary this doesn't have a lot of bass despite their claim to have micro woofers... so if you are a bass beast then go for the boats... Battery life is quite good it lasts me the entire day from 10 o clock in the morning to 8 in the evening... Connectivity is quite good... Taking calls also works well... I never liked the sound signature of boats so i went for these instead and I am quite happy.. build quality is good too... Couple tips.. let the earphones burn in, that is play some songs for a couple of hours or the whole night then listen to them they will sound a lot better and use the eartips that will give a complete seal in your ears... For this i am using the largest tip provided in the box.. and get the red one if you can it looks the bestüòÜüòÜ

name: Murali
title: Cheap Product with bad Sound quality
content: Regretting for choosing this product, it is made of cheap plastic, does not give confidence for casual handling. Audio quality is very average and no bass. Only consolation is long battery life nothing else. Previously I was using Boat rockerz 600 and this Boult probass curve is nowhere near in sound or build quality. Audio quality for call is OK but if you intend to use for music listening then look somewhere else.

name: KUNAL J.
title: Vibration feedback notification not available on this
content: Got the duplicate product..check out the Boult font on this vs available on Myntra vibration notification is not available on this product. Same product I ordered last year from Myntra and it has vibration. Neck band without vibration feedback notification is worthless. After one week the one side of headphones is stopped working. Raised the ticket not sure how much time it will take.

name: shekhar
title: Really good and durable.
content: Really good and durable.. i bought it for Rs.999.. Sound quality is really good.. You can connect 2 devices at a time.I connect laptop and mobile both.when listening muaic on Lappy, if u get a call, it switches to mobile,this switch between device is not good but again in this price its awesome.. Battery stand by is 12 hours for me, and i have used it continously for 9 hours in one go. So Battery life is pretty awesome.. Comfortable on ear.

name: RAJIV BEDI
title: Customers grievance aspect.
content: Though the product was not upto the mark but doesn't matter as approach to go through customers grievance was excellent..The product is in process of replacement and I wish to place on record my appreciations for customer care executive AMAN; who's handling to customer query was proactive to customers satisfaction.In fact I was delighted to see his approach for taking my querry and grievance to logical conclusion which shows his sincerity towards his organization. Please pass on my sentiments to him and expect from him to carry on his spirits in days to come.. I wish him best of luck in his all future ventures.. To me quality of product is important but more important is servicing aspects of vendor attached to Amazon.. Congrats to vendor also.Good product in this price range.

name: AVINASH BV
title: Worth for the money I recommend it don't think go blindly
content: Worth for the money I got it for 999 in summer sale sound quality is amazing battery backup is also good somewhere I got around 8 to 9hrs for 1hr 40 mins of full charge Bass is well balanced I feel, use Poweramp music player for best results in android mobile...better than Boat Bluetooth headset

name: Mohit
title: Best at this price.
content: Very cool product at this price.. Super battery backup.. Quite descent sound quality.. Noise cancellation as well as sweat proof.. Very light and good quality body.. Bluetooth range is too good as mentioned.. Yes, they are snug fit which are best for running,gym etc. At first i was worried about the quality before ordering but now i got satisfaction.. This product is really good.. Order it even without worrying.

name: subrata Chakraborty
title: VERY VERY BAD SERVICE. AVERAGE PRODUCT :(
content: Product basic. But service is really really BAD . My product started malfunctioning within 3 months of purchase. Their call center gives only automated voice. When you write email to them they write back asking you courier the stuff at your own cost..... they say it will take week....and their technicians will test and decide. Now for a low end bluetooth headphone ...is it worth to go through so much? Even after that you are not sure if they will replace or repair? Their mail was generic & non committal. Bad SERVICE INTERFACE. Will never buy them again

name: himanshu singh
title: Could have been better.
content: Overall performance is good. However, the build quality specially the wires which have been used could have been better. Just because of thin cylindrical wires product looks cheap. They can replace cylindrical wires with flat one. The best thing is its fitting into the ear.

name: Rzz
title: my bad experience
content: i was using different products of boult for long. but this product, one side stopped working just after 1 week. so i calmed Warranty and send the product, after approximately 14 days . it was all good from there and after two week the other side got problem too. also while i send it for service an executive texted me and asked me to give this 5 stars and i will win a prize, i don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs ethical . making others to give fake reviews kinda seems like false Advertising.

name: Abhishek Tiwari
title: Best in class
content: I have been using this earphone since apar 2 days. and i have to say i am pretty impressed by its quality .. Whether u talk about its connectivity, bass, sound clarity all are top notch.. Even the vibration feature of the neck band works pretty well.. For better understanding of how it looks i have added some pictures as u can clearly see its so small and handy that it fits perfectly.

name: Arbind
title: Unbeatable price and unmatchable quality
content: This is one of the best headphones I have bought. The sound quality is crystal clear. I feel lost in the music. Bass is also very good.. Product is so light that you feel you not wearing it. I feel.it would be durable being it so flexible it won't break.. Above all the customer support is awesome. I got huge discount on this product bagged with a movie ticket and 1 year warranty.

name: Manish
title: sound quality is pathetic
content: Sound quality is pathetic. It feels like a cheap Rs 150 headphone. Nothing like an amazing bass as mentioned. Overall built quality and Bluetooth connection etc are seamless though. But headphone are for sound than anything else. Btw I‚Äôm a iPhone user and probably iPhone headphones are compared with this one.. The angled design also makes it difficult to use for long time..u have to actually push them in and it hurts the ear after 30 mins.

name: ANUBHAB BHATTACHARYYA
title: A good buy
content: User experience is good. I got it for 999 rupees, during sale...so no issues on that front. This is my first time with a Bluetooth earphones set and overall the impression is good.. Sound gets quite loud and is clear to listen.. Range is decent and perfectly suited for use in home. Battery life isnt bad either at 3-4 hrs average. Controls are easy enough to use.. It is light and comfortable to wear and. I have been using this for almost an year and performance is as good as new.. Definitely a good buy in budget restraints and if getting on sale.

name: Prashant
title: Don't buy
content: Don't buy. All parts come off when u use it. Right ear sound issue. Waste of time n money! U can't return so need to live with defective unwanted product. BOAT might b better.. Truly China!!

name: Aditya Naik
title: Sasti Masti üòé Gym Beast ü§ò
content: I love this earphones man. I use it every damn day in the gym. It sounds great, bass is good, noice cancellation is good. Main thing it is sweat proof & I sweat alot. 100% recommended go for it.

name: Shilpa R.
title: Good battery Life
content: Good Packaging. Built Quality is Ok,very good quality Neckband, but wires look cheap. Bought this because of its tilt fit, but doesn't give the perfect fit for my ears. Sound quality is good but on high volume I experience a lot of noise. And the most surprising feature is the battery backup,it has amazing battery (atleast for the first few days for what I hv used till now). Pro:. Battery. Premium Neckband

name: Hansel
title: Awesome product and price 5star
content: Just purchased curve pro, the product looks good with a good built quality and a sporty design as compared to the curve, the vibrating alert is also a great feature. Coming to the sound quality, the sound is good nonscreeching on loud tones on higher volumes noise cancellation performs well, put ot through test while traveling. Bass is good nice and deep. Overall a great product and a great deal during sale 1099rs and fast delivery .

name: MOHAIDEEN AJHAR
title: Impressive
content: Pros:. 1. More than 10hrs battery backup. 2. More comfortable neckband. 3. Better audio quality. 4. Good bass. 5. Thumbs up to vibration alert. 6. Large control button used in night times. 7. Quick auto bluethooth connectivity. 8. Perfect noise cancellation. Cons:. 1. Provide thin wire from band to earphone. 2. During sweating oneside earphone automattically. Pulledout from the ear. 3. Price. 4. ‚ÄúOne free movie ticket come with this package‚Äù - i scan that barcode it shows always claimed. 5. Warrenty register - always it get some information from me like phone number , email , Name but don‚Äôt send any confirmation email or messages. 6. Package don‚Äôt come with poughs

name: Suyash H Jagtap
title: Music Clarity-Awesome, Bass & Microphone- Okay & these are not worth 1-1.5k
content: So, If ur want earphone within range of 1k then these are sutably not the best. The sound clarity on this one is awesome & i mean it. But if ur use is for longer duration & u like to hear at max volume then u would get easily irritated. And also the bass quality on this one is okay & same goes with microphone. I would refer u guys to buy boat rockerzz at same price point with better everything

name: Vinod M
title: Good sound but worst quality device
content: While sound quality is great, the device stopped getting ON and Connecting to paired devices after 1 month. Pathetic quality.....Pls go for better brand, even if it means getting getting them at a higher level.

name: SAHIL JAIN
title: Loved the build quality
content: 1. Very nice product for music lover. 2. Bass quality for headphones are too good. 3. Fully comfortable for ears. 4. Bulit quality of headphones are the best.. 5. Sound quality is super.. 6. Minimum 5to 6 hrs battery backup.. Loved the product the product for sound quality.

name: Pankaj Gundecha
title: 3/4 Times got a faulty product.
content: As such i dont have much problem with the product, But I received a faulty product at start which got replaced. The replaced product was nice and performing well. Hence i recommended it to a colleague of mine. But on ordering the next time i received a faulty piece which never started despite 2-3 attempts after charging. I replaced this piece and got a new one today as a replacement. But to my surprise even the new replacement is faulty. The vibration doesn't work on the headphone. A product with some good potential has been ruined with Faulty manufacturing. Please hire some quality managers to check your products.

name: Mr. Balaji
title: Sound Quality & Battery performanceüëåüëåüëå üòçüòçüòç
content: I use other brands a long ago, But this Boult Audio ProBass Curve is on a different level really... That Sound Quality is superb and the bass quality is also good and also noise cancellationüëå. Really I mostly like from this üëâSound and Battery Performance. Amazing yaar.üëçüëå. I said genuinely...I used heavily but battery performance is fantastic... Maximum 24Hrs for heavy users... I think miracleüòç...Overall Boult performance is too toooo good yaar.üëåüëåüëå

name: Mal 19
title: Great sound and value for money
content: They are very good earphones, light and comfortable and aesthetically designed without excesses. Most important the sound quality is very good however I would have personally desired a bit more punch in the bass not that it is lacking. I would also have liked even more control with the buttons. But overall, a great pair of earphones.

name: Nibir C.
title: The power button broke within 2 weeks of light use!
content: This product is not worth it at all. I have been using it since two weeks and right two days after the return window, the power button is now broken and I'm left with a pair of dead headsets that have burnt a hole of Rs.1400 in my pocket. I'm just so pissed right now. By the way, the sound quality wasn't such exceptional either when it did work and it always face connectivity issues and range problems. I mean I was having interference while roaming in the same room where the source was!

name: Pragadeesh
title: Experience the unexpected performance
content: Writing this review after one month usage... And so far my overall experience was awesome... Sound quality is acceptable for this price... Like you won't regret.... Built quality is cool and sturdy....... Battery life is just awesome.... I get 2 days of usage... Where its connected to my mobile from morning to night.... And around 3 hrs of music play and also extra youtube insta usage..... And about connectivity.... More than expected.... I can switch to other room and still bring connected... I've read other customers bad experience... But mine was opposite to them... May br i got lucky ü§ì go for it

name: Harjinder Singh
title: Quality
content: Worst product seen ever in my life. Yesterday I was using it and suddenly it turned off and i tried to alot but it didn't turned on again turned off at 80 percent battery without battery... I tried to charge it but i didn't charged.... When i contacted to care they said currier it to us why should i pay currier charges i have warranty of this product.... Please don't purchase this product in future when your product got damaged you will need to pay currier charges.

name: vp jadli
title: Loss of money
content: I bought it in 25 May 2020 and after 1 and half months it stopped working. It was sent to Boult Service Centre New Delhi in July 2020 and after 8 days they sent back with minor repair. One side is still not working, battery is not working properly and getting noise. So keeping all this incidents in mind My suggestion is please do not purchase this product at all other wise you will repent.

name: deepak
title: Satisfactory according to its price.
content: Sound quality is good but its too loud but they are good if u r traveller as coz of its loudlyness you can hear easily whatever you are listening. Noise cancellation is also good. Bass is not upto the mark but if you see the price then bass is good. The best part of this headphone is that it's battery is awesome. Guy like me who travel a lot or for sports person this thing is awesome. Without using our standby this product battery remains till 3-4 days.

name: Srivalliraju
title: Boult is the best
content: No need to have a second thought guys, Straight away. Buy it. Awesome experience in this version.. Especially the mentioned 3d acoustics was really impeccable.you can get cinematic sound experience undoubtedly.. I searched for atleast one flaw in this headset, and I found very minor issue and that is also the connectivity issue a little bit for a few milli seconds.thats it.. Great product crafted by the team BOULT.

name: renganathan k
title: Just about ok.
content: The product was bought on great indian sale for 89o. I would say build quality is not so impressive feels very cheap and plasticky. The sound is adequate with good bass. 3 stars . Dont pay anything more than 90p for this. For this money its ok i would say.

name: Aashish Kumar Sinha
title: Loud sound, Low Base and decent battery life
content: Sound: is loud and clear, lacks base. Battery: works for around 10 hours but goes down from 100% to 80% and 40% to 20% very fast and after 20% it shuts off.. Call Quality: OK. Bluetooth Connectivity: although range is 10 m but only if you test in a straight line without any obstacle in between, disconnects and reconnects sometimes. But @1299(Lightning deal) I feel this is a good deal.

name: Devesh Dutt Mathur
title: Pathetic After Sales Response/Service
content: Product is good but in case you receive a defective piece and you raise issue with company... Then they won‚Äôt respond... After 15 days of use.. my piece stopped responding and not getting started... I raised complain to their customer care and Over mail also but till now after 20-25 days I have received any response from them... It just they sold the product and their responsibility is over... Pathetic after sales experience..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Buy for the price point!
content: This is my second Boult curve within a year... this is a gud product for the price that I bought it for.. Serves the purpose of hands free talking.. The issue I had with the previous curve was, it was not sweat resistent, so it claimed. Taking my chance with new curve!. Buy it if you don't plan to wear it while working out n sweating it out!

name: Brijesh Trehan
title: Earphone worth the money and quality product
content: Decent product for listening music, attending calls hands free.. Good quality product, works and shows exactly as per description.. Easy to carry, worth the money.. Once charged 100% easily goes one full day even if continously on a working mode.

name: SS
title: Good item as per range
content: Color : Red. This headphone is overall a balanced product - Good sound quality, good battery backup, stylish looks, easy and handy for regular use.. It would have been awesome if the bass is more. But in this price range it serves the purpose.. Good sound quality. Really good battery backup. Premium look. Can be used with 2 device. Auto connecting once switched on. Easy and comfortable to use. Does not cause ear pain. Color options available

name: Krish
title: A very cmfortable and efficient product at an affordable price.
content: The Sound quality of the product is excellent. It adds thrill in movies and videos as each and every drop of penny is made audible. A clear sound is always preferable. I also love Boult Audio Probass Curve for its bass quality. Noise cancellation is average, but the best thing about it is that it fits perfectly and is very comfortable. It is sweatproof so for running and cycling, this is perfect for me. Thank you Boult for such an amazing experience.

name: Rahul Bhowal
title: Review of boult audio probass curve.
content: Awesome product, it supports AAC codec due to which high quality sound is delivered and it has nice base too. The call quality was also nice as there was no disturbance like other bluetooth devices.The overall build quality is nice üëå.. The packaging was also great.. The inbox contents are a micro USB cable ,the extra ear tips, warranty card.. Overall the best product you will find in 1200.

name: Bharati c.
title: Not recommended
content: I am unable to connect to phone calls / media even though it shows that earphone is connected.. Worst thing is i have lost all its packing cover , I can't even return it. It was ok for 1 day only. Totally wasted my money.

name: Abhishek Agrawal
title: Value for Money
content: Till the moment I didn't buy it I was not sure if this was the right product.. Once it arrived I was just too eager to unwrap it and just test it out.. Overall great packaging. The box contained a headset, the power cable, earbuds to fit ears and a user guide.. What I like the best about the product was that it is better than all the previous ones I've bought. Gives a better battery backup than any other earpiece and the best part it just fits there in my ears and never comes out till I don't want to.

name: Ritwick Halder
title: Excellent headphone for the price : superb clarity and bass
content: This is my second boult product purchase and i must say that the clarity of the headphones is superb. The product is also very good value for money given the quality of the headphones. Bass and treble and extremely well balanced just the way i wanted. Highly recommended.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Test well before releasing the product to market. People are spending money on it.
content: There is lot of issues While connecting to two devices at a time like it is delayed while switching between devices. When connected to laptop with w10 it is not showing battery indicator and video is not getting paused when we tap on middle button when it is connected to laptop this issue is faced with laptops. Very poor in noice cancellation while taking a call. Lot of disturbance is faced by person who is talking to you in call. Battery indicator of earphones which is shown when earphones are connected to phone suddenly drops from 60 to below 10%. These many issues I faced with in 4days of using this device. Really disappointed

name: NRI-shopper
title: FAILED IN 20 DAYS
content: IT failed to work within 20 days. A tech told us that the switch ON OFF is bad, which is nowhere available. Not repairable. I request seller to replace or refund us the money please. e spent over Rs. 1200 already but are without Blue tooth now :(

name: Jasika sahu
title: mixed experienced.
content: i won't say it's a bad product...product is nice but i don't hav had a good experienced first tym when i ordered i used it for a week.All of a sudden it stop working so i make a replacement complaint battery backup is nice...it can used for 4-5 days after a full charge. after replacement i used it for 4-5 days...again 1 earphone stopped working...nd after 5 mins all seems ok....now i placed it for refund‚òπÔ∏è the experienced was mixed.but i really missed my boult earphones...i got it jst for Rs1,199.

name: Sella Kumar
title: Think twice before you buy
content: im using this product for past 20days. huge disappointment. after reading so much of reviews i bought this product. this is my 6th Bluetooth headset brand. i used jabra, wecool, envent and many other brands. this one not even come closer to bass of wecool and envent.. pros. 1. light weight. u cannot feel its weight. 2. looks good and stylish. cons. 1. light weight. u cant use while riding bike. it flew away.. 2. bass is too low. not suitable for music lover. 3. connectivity issues. some time it takes too much time to connect or it wont connect. i have to unpair and pair again.. 4. last 50% of battery drains faster. within 20mis of usage.. my strong recommendation. think before u choose.

name: Parth Bhatt
title: SUPERB QUALITY AND GOOD SOUND EXPERIENCE
content: Build Quality is good. Bluetooth. Connectivity is much faster. Connect with 2 or more devices at a time. Sound is very clear and perfect bass and treble.. Its auto power off once mobile or any device is disconnected.. Battery life is too good . As compare to other Bluetooth in same price range.. Ovaerall superB experience with boult Curve Audio.. Next i will going to buy Boult Audio AirBass Twinpods

name: Harsh Patel
title: Best Bluetooth with stylist look
content: Best deal inarket, battery backup is good almost around 10hrs, bass and sound quality is unbelievable and 3D music is excellent... Call quality is very good with noise isolation.. Thank you Boult Audio for the wonderful experience.. Hope if any kinds of issues their within warranty, it will be taken care with top priority.

name: Sudip Bandyopadhyay
title: Poor built quality
content: The switches are really bad. It was having some problem at the beginning. Then it worked. After 6-7 months with a very limited usage the switches are not working now. During charge red light is turning into blue. That's it. Nothing happening after that.. Although the sound quality, and mic is very good, but because if the poor built quality I wouldn't recommend this product for a long term usage.

name: muhammad musthafa
title: Good
content: I bought it on last day and I feel it was very simple and flexible, sound quality and clarity is best in segment.. Besides I feel it was very comfortable and sure there is no an equal product with this price too

name: Vimal Sharma
title: Great product under this price range, little problem in mic and Bluetooth range
content: I am using this product for more than a year. Pros. 1. Good sound. 2. Bass is also good. 3. Good Build quality and comes with a nice packaging. 4. Reasonable Price. 5. Good Battery Backup. 5. Magnets tip working great till now. 6. Connected automatically with the paired device quickly.. Cons. 1. Mic quality is not that much great. 2. Bluetooth range is also not that much good.

name: Prateek Upadhyay
title: Best Buy
content: Best bluetooth neckband in reasonable price. Just got it at 899 and using for almost one year and working smoothly.. The sound quality is good with an average bass, low sound latency for gaming.. The beat thing would be price which is less than other brands and still delivering a good product.. Another feature would be that we cam adjust the wire length which is not available in other brands. Happy with it and will buy only boult sound products from now on.

name: Rajesh Shah
title: Value for money.. Dont think twice.. Just go for it.
content: Well i bought my first headset on 11 th of August 2020 and immediately after 4 days u placed the order for the second one... Just because the product is superb and its a value for money guys... So don't think twice.. Just go for it... I have already compared it with other brands like realme buds, boat etc.... But the pricing, the sound quality and the battery back up is the best compared to all the other available in the market...

name: Pushti
title: No regrets!
content: Bought this as a gift for my father's birthday who travels daily in the local train and likes listening to music. Very efficient and light weight to carry, no hassle of losing it in a crowded area and magnetic earbuds are the best. Strap is adjustable, charges quickly and lasts good amount of time. Pleasure listening to music in it. The box includes the pair of earphones, two additional pairs of silicone earbuds and a charging cable. Came with a user manual, warranty card and a free movie ticket all of which can be scanned and redeemed.

name: Lokendra Raja
title: Worst after sales service. Dont buy u will regret.
content: Worst after sales service. Dont ever purchase boult product you will regret like I do. I have given my boult earphone for repair it's been 45 days they have not returned my earphone. When I call customer care, each time they keep saying, wait for next 3-4days. I feel like helpless customer. So dont waste ur time and money at all. Zero rating wud have been better option for them.

name: Vas H.
title: Nice one üëç
content: I liked the earphones design and it is functionally effective. I mainly need it for online calls and sessions, and it serves the purpose. Sound is clear and microphone also works well. The bluetooth range is good, so can move around without any hassles. Only problem I see is the charger pin - does not seem to be a perfect fit. Else all good.

name: Amarnath
title: Bass beast
content: I cannot count the number of different brands and models of earphones I have used so far. But this model stand out as my go-to budget earphones. After listening to these for the first time I was hooked by the perfectly balanced sound they provide which closely compete with costlier earphones from reputed brands. The lows, mids, and highs are all perfectly balanced which makes them great for rock and alternative genres which I mostly listen to. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for a good pair of wireless earphones below 1000 rupees.

name: sai deshmukh
title: Dont buy
content: Quality is not good as compared to the price. This packaging's and product box is doent feel it is expensive. normally this earphones is at 1499 rs but I got at 800 rs. Dont buy this earphones above 1000 rs , because boult audio probass space is many times better than this one, bass is also not more, sound is also not best. And for doing register warranty online, their website isn't open.

name: R S.
title: A value for money product
content: A value for money product, a decent and clear sound profile with the subtle bass.... Good call quality though but haven't check the range yet, in about 2, 3metres it was adequately good.... Will check that fully and update.... The one minor thing which I didn't like is the package was not wrapped with plastic cover and user manual is missing in the package.... Note: When compared with my Nexus 6p, the songs and call quality fom my wife's Mi A3 was quite good, so keep in mind those who owns older phones with older Bluetooth versions before buying any Bluetooth headsets

name: SHIVAJI K. MOITRA
title: Average product that does not function as instructed. The earphones do not fit properly to ear holes
content: The product does not operate as per instruction given. The red light does not go off when fully charged as stated but turns blue instead. The volume switch often puts the product off. Sound quality average and the earphones do not fit properly to the ear holes. The wires too are short.

name: Suraj rawat
title: Dont get misguided by the good reviews
content: Dont go for the good reviews battery not charging after 2months of usage. They trick you by calling that you have to post a good comment with the photograph of there product to win a gift voucher. I have send numerous emails to boults email id they only generate a ticket number and no action is taken on till now.. Very disappointed by there cunning marketing strategy. Wish can give 0 stars but that's not in the option horrible experience

name: Amazon Customer
title: You'll love it!
content: I use this for my gym, never thought I would like a neckband style earphones for workouts but surprisingly the fit of this is so secure doesn't fall off your ears whatsoever! Though the battery life could be better my earphones stops working after 30% battery and its pretty annoying.. Audio quality is good for the price and it does have an ample amount of base to it. I returned my previous one as it kept getting disconnected and the battery life of that one was little less than the current one as well. Overall its a solid product especially during sale you can't go wrong!

name: Parth Nagar
title: Average earphones with poor support team!!
content: The build and feel is decent. The bluetooth connection is stable but streaming wobbles when you get a call - things start to lag then. Boult needs to really fix this as it is a serious problem. The audio quality is decent but the noise cancellation, highs and bass are just average. The warranty setup was a pain as I never got a confirmation when I registered for it. Boult I still have not received confirmation!!!! All in all not for under ‚Çπ1500...

name: Kindle Customer
title: Never buy this
content: This device is good at this price.. however it is not sweat proof. They are claiming but it is not.. i have been using this product from last 6 months, and it stopped working automatically .. they claimed replacement with 7 days of delivery.. do u really think that you will get any issue withon 7 days.. i sent this product back on 14th sep 2020 still i didnt get any replacement or repaird one.. so dont trust this one..

name: Arka
title: A real value for money product!
content: A true value for money product, been using this on a regular basis for the past 6 months. The neckband and its style aesthetics look terrific. Coming to the sound aspect of it, it meets all your daily needs, i primarily use it at the gym and during my jogs and while commuting, the sound is punchy and well rounded. The only piece i had to swap were the silicone ear buds which kept falling off, changed them with my AKGs now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: I Love Boult Inner Card Yoga girl, i Love that girl üòçüòçüòúüòú
content: I Don't love Boult Product. But I love Boult Inner Card Yoga Girlüòçüòçü•∞ü•∞üòòüòò. Sound is good, Battery is very good, bass is average.. But build quality is average. For build quality i rating it for 2 out of 5. It is worth price ‚Çπ1299. Overall good performance.

name: Tejas Kale
title: Good product
content: Been 3 months and I am completely Happy with the performance of the product. Great sound quality, good base, easily lasts 8hrs with single charge. However I've noticed one problem. At time it doesn't switches on. I have to put it on charge even if it's for mere 5 seconds. Don't know why this occurs. Except this, the product is simply awesome.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good
content: Product quality is good. No noise, easy connectivity and good battery life. First when i recieved I had connectivity issues, ordered for Replacement and it was immediately replaced. Works perfectly fine now. Thanks Amazon for the quick service

name: gokulkrishna
title: not worth
content: sound quality is good and noise cancellation is also good but product quality is not good .. Amazon shows high rate to the product (with out offer) when compare to other app and outer shops . With offer it is same as the other app and less than shop .. The shop rate is 2k but amazon shows 4k somthing and from that the offer price to 899 but this produt is not worth for 4k ......

name: ashish bhagat
title: Good battery life
content: Battery life is very good...easily goes upto 3 days with moderate use...only drawback is earphones a bit odd shaped due to which it slips frequently form ear.could have made a better product out of it...

name: shashikiran
title: Please don't buy it
content: Absolutely unsatisfied experience. Within one &half month of purchase, this neckband stopped working. Contacted Amezon, they guided to contact the company. When raised complaint with Boult company, they are asking to send the neckband to some Delhi address (I am in Pune). I asked them to arrange for pickup as it is under warranty, no response from the company. Absolute waste of money.

name: vinod sharma
title: Not best but ok
content: The connectivity is good and connects with the devices very soon but got some connection issues while driving and listening at the same time. Noise cancellation is great but the bass put it on the low side the sound quality is not the best you may disappoint in the quality of sound but it is quite loud. Overall I can say that the the headphone is not at all best but you can consider if you are not bass lover.

name: shruthi
title: Worth the price.
content: Great music output quality. The band is lightweight and tangle free. Bass is decent. So heavy bass lovers may not love it. But for me, it's fine and not a deal breaker.. Now for the bad part: voice calls are bad. While you can hear the other person well, he cannot hear you well. I tried replacing mine with another Boult BT earphones (because refund was not possible), but same thing. The opposite person cannot hear you well. @boult: if you're reading this, please fix this issue. I tried using different phones as well. Same problem.

name: Sandeep
title: don't expect too much it is a very average
content: my expectation was very high with this product when I purchase it 1199 rupees after coming package in home I test it first time it sounds not much that as compared to other products like mivi thunder beats and boat 225 Pro in compare with this the boult is very weak bass as per my side it is not highly recommended

name: Mayur Kachare
title: Really PRO BASS
content: As mentioned in the product name, it is actually a PRO BASS. Yet, it doesn't overpower the rest of the music. Fits into ear perfectly. Battery backup is decent! At this price range, it's practically impossible to find another product with such a lovely music quality!!! By the way, this is my third purchase of Boult audio.....

name: Deepak Sawant
title: Boult is best experience
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volumeüëçüòä

name: Ronny
title: Great buy!
content: Earbud fits great.. Connects to two cellphones simultaneously.. Long battery life.. Quick charge.. Comfortable to wear all day.. What else could be offered for such an affordable price? I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs great!

name: Navyasheel
title: Very good earphones in this price range
content: The product was delivered before time, thank you Amazon for a speedy delivery. The product is really good, it has loud sound and the quality is also fine. I purchased the product mostly for my conference calls and use it with my laptop. The call quality is good, the other person doesn't hear any background noise and it meets my expectation. Overall a good product in this price range.

name: Rahul Bhagore
title: best under 900 for battery lover balanced sound person
content: Earphone was nice best suited for people wear tshirt or can say no coller clothes, coller interfere with neckband . its jot too loud kind earphone but have balanced kind sound which is good as i like that also i got less then 899 so at low price its perfect big point it's battery very nice last 4 days for basic user . quality wise its ok not much issue

name: vyom agrawal
title: Superb Product
content: I have tried several Bluetooth devices but none came close (some had pairing issues, some had charging issues and some simply didn't switch on). Boult Curve simply powered on, connected with both my laptop as well as my phone and switches between the 2 seamlessly. The battery lasts easily for about 10 hours of active use but much more on standby. Very comfortable and stylish. Highly recommended.

name: ashutosh
title: DONT BUY ANY BOULT PRODUCTS
content: Well better don't buy it , it was bad deal to buy such small company product , after it gave noise and connection issues , I had to call and send it to them for which I only had to pay , in return they repair it and send it back after 2-3 weeks , overall not nice experience as I paid 350 for courier so product cost increases by the time , unbelievable .. Never ever I will buy Boult product again.

name: harish tayade
title: Excellent product.
content: This is definitely excellent product. Sound quality, Call connection, Noise reduction is more than expected but only problem is in Dolby sound music. When I am listening high quality, Dolby recorded songs some pieces of music got missing, part of music, singer's voice recorded in one side speakers nowadays and same I am missing here due to technical error in this.. Would be more happy if Boult can solve this.. Else this is mind blowing product in this price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Boult audio rocks. As always
content: Just had these delivered today..!! Amazing sound.. I already am using the boult audio curve Wireless neckband since their launch and was sceptical about the boult audio curve pro.. So, as soon as these were launched, I ordered them from Amazon and was not at all disappointed.. The mids and highs are crystal clear.. The bass is just right.. I highly recommend these for those who are looking for value for money headphones.

name: Akshay kumar
title: Amazon doesn't even care about product quality
content: The bolt audio pro bass product what I got it doesn't even working,it is not even switching on the power also. first I thought there would be no charging in it I charged it for 2hours after that also no response from the product it is not switching on.npt even vibrating.totally it is not working.this is veryy bad experience with amazon I didn't expected this you guys are not even checking the product also whether it is working or not you just simply blindly send the product to us that's it.iam very very upset....!this is the 4th time am facing the problem whenever I buyed I faced the problem.and the boult is not as like it is showing in the advertisement.dont buy it.

name: Deepu PM
title: Boult Audio üòé
content: #Awesome. New boult audio curve wireless neckband magnetic earphone with mic #unplugwithboult @boultaudio @amazon. Fall in love with this stylish, convenient, lightweight. Your journey may have pit stops, but your music shouldn‚Äôt.. #UnplugWithBoult #BoultAudio #BoultCurve #Earphone. .. .. .. #PassiveNoiseCancellation. #DurableFlexiBand. #DeepBass. #Magnets. #Vibration. #IPX5Waterproof. #earphones #wirelessmusic #music #sound #beats #bass #rhythm. #wireless #wirelessearphones #wirelessheadphones #bluetoothheadphones #headphones #beats #gameon #levelup #audiophile #musicgram #loveformusic #music

name: Rahul Gilhotra
title: Boult curve headphone real review
content: It's a genuine opinion from my side. Hope it will help you in making decision.. Pros- Battery backup üîã is realy awesum. You will get 6 - 8 Hrs backup at 70% of sound level.. Easy pairing.. Neckbend design is good and looks nice and trendy.. Noise cancellation is descent, not good not bad.. Magnetic ear tips.. Charging indication via Led .. Vibration feature when incoming call. Its really helpful when your phone is placed far.. Bass is good, not bad. Vocal are clear.. Cons.- Bluetooth 4.2 version but unfortunately some time it looses its strength, not so good. Big con.

name: Ashwini Kumar
title: Review For My New Boult Audio ProBass Curve
content: Received my Boult Neckband a week ago. It has the best sound quality, 10 out of 10 or best in its price segment. Coming to comfort, till now no complaints even for using 3 continuous hours so 10 out of 10 again. Bass is little bit low, still 9 out of 10 will be justified for it. Noise cancellation is pretty good too. Built quality is perfect and no less than JBL in-ear wireless earphones which costs two or three times of this one. Battery life is 7to9 hours on full charge, full charging takes 2.5hours which is decent. Bluetooth connectivity is simply superb, range of bluetooth is somewhat 8-10 metres. So, in my opinion just go for it. You'll not regret. A happy and satisfied Boult Customer! ;)

name: Vaibhav
title: Love this product
content: It's good not a wasre of money at all... Bass is also good and shows its excellent performance...

name: Shabbir Kapasi
title: Disappointed
content: This earphone got spoilt in 15 days.. It did not turn on. On filing a complain, we have to spend money to courier it to Delhi.. On receiving the replacement product, i got a damaged earphone. Though the replacement product works, but the buttons are lose, there are dirt marks on the earphone which shows that it is used, the usb slot cover does not close properly. Got an old used product in the price of a new one.. Very disappointed.

name: Jilu D Kumar
title: Nice sound quality but average build quality.
content: Sound quality is very good. It carries it's superb quality from mid Freq to high freq very smoothly and doesn't distort at very high notes. Bass is average. Noise cancellation is very nice but you have to crank the volume up high. Overall build could be better but it's very durable and flexible for casual use. I would not recommend this for rough use. The wires of actual ear units are thin and feel cheap but can withstand some degree of tension.

name: Chef Singh
title: dont buy!!!
content: everything is good for first 4 5 days then it stops charginf when i exchange it anf the new one comes it dosent connect with any of the smartphone. such a pathetic device. dont buy.

name: Aniruddha
title: Mind-blowing Bass & Music Effects
content: Review after 15 days of use....Music & Bass Sound Quality is really awesome @ this price range..... Design - 4.5/5. Call Quality - 3/5 (Bcoz call audio gets jumped up n down..don't know why..). Music Effects - 4/5. Bass Effect - 4.5/5. Battery Backup - 3.5/5 (averagely satisfied). No vibration on incoming call (then why manufacturer shows).. But really It's a good choice...Go for it...

name: Siddhant Dhanuk
title: good sound with base & good battery life. Go for it. Purchased it during sale for 999. .
content: Sound quality is very impressive and BASS is punchy but battery life lasts upto 3 days on normal uses (daily 5 hrs.) . Magnetic buds are FABULOUS and have a metallic texture and Shiny also. I ordered BLUE one and Body is plastic and have MATT appearance, Wire is also good . It takes minimum 2 hours to completely charge. It also has 1 yr. Warranty card. Go for it .. One bad thing is BATTERY should be long lasting and charging cable a bit Long.

name: Hemant Raj
title: Worse item boult product
content: It's very worse product. I had received this product of 16th June it's my big fault. Wasting of money. Every time it's not working. It's looks like local product. So please don't buy this product. My experience was very bad from boult company. I have complained in boult company but they're not providing my new boult curve Bluetooth. I am feeling very bad after purchased of Boult curve audio Bluetooth

name: Anand
title: Value for money
content: Definitely not the best in sound quality but is value for money. Will work for around 6 hours after full charge. Call connection is pretty poor and people on other side cannot hear me most of the time. But listening to song and you tube works fine.

name: arth p singh
title: Best earphones but needs some minor in improvements to make it more better
content: It's the best Bluetooth earphones with neckband and if you compare it with any other item with same cost I surely say that. Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband would be the better out of it.One thing I could say that it's button in neckband to control voice and other things should be more fixed to the neckband else everything is perfect in this...I would suggest in to buy. Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband if anyone wants to buy a earphones in the same range of cost

name: Raiyan Haque
title: After using for a month
content: The product is good. There are some pretty nice features in the product. Which is generally not available at this price range.. Like:. Wire lengths is adjustable.. Battery back up is awesome.. Doesn't takes much time in charging.. The only thing low in it, is weight.. But that should not be much of a problem for many a user's at this price. You get much more that you can neglected it.. Overall the product is worth giving a try.

name: Jayant Kumar Das
title: Best ever earphone untill 2021.
content: Original sound quality.. balanced bass and trebel.. mostly battery take just 1 hr to charge,i had not thought of ever,just excellent.. after using 5 days non stop,i found at full charge it gives 11-12 hr of music at 90% volume or non stop call of 10 hrs.. i have not found any other brand with all these funtion and quality at this price range. you just search othr brand once,i gurentee you all have to accept this as best.

name: AS
title: I bought this at a deal price of 1399 after reading positive reviews
content: This earpiece is fair enough as I have used it pretty less till date, I got it day before yesterday and till now I could only manage to listen to 4-5 songs, but in that span of time I felt these are the areas of improvements -. 1. Bass quality is not upto the level. It lacks the proper jazz and timbre.. 2. At a high volume, it gives a cracking noise which can be felt easily.. 3. Noise cancellation is okay, not much an issue as the earpiece sits snugly in your ear.. 4. Build quality looks premium and very light weight so easy for travel purpose.

name: Moses
title: Superb performance
content: Supeb bass, you can play pubg without late sounding. Absolutely good for gaming too wonderful bass

name: Nikhil P.
title: Ok
content: There is an issue with vibration. The product box shown in videos or images is different so might be fake product

name: Manju Patil
title: Not recommendable
content: I bought this product few months ago and shortly after buying i found some issues.. Product is good in sound, bass, and design aspects. But noise cancellation and disturbance on call is prominent issue here. I would recommend only if you want to buy reasonable earphones. But newly updated earphones are available in the market now which will be worth the money.. And waranty claiming is a long process company won't be supportive.

name: Nischay M
title: Average device.
content: The device is good when compared to that price range but it looks like made of very cheap material. sound quality is average,have to wait to know the durability of device.I guess users are giving good ratings due to the movie voucher for positive reviews.

name: prashanth
title: It's not up to the expectation
content: I bought this with so much excitement and ended up being miserable.The left earphone stopped working after 2 days of usage and it is working intermittent like it vl work for some time and stops working for some time and when u keep ur mobile in pocket and if u r walking in crowd then definitely there will be Bluetooth connection issue and u vl hear the music intermittenly and only One good thing is battery backup is very good at this price range.

name: Amit Dilip khandediya
title: Ipx 7 or 5 sweat proof water resistant feature in not mentioned on the box and product manual
content: When I placed the order it was mentioned on the website that this headphone is ipx 7 rated but when I received the product nowhere on the box or in product manual it is mentioned that it is even rated ipx 5 , there is not mentioned any of the ipx rating on it . Be careful while buying it

name: Nismy
title: Good but not great
content: Sound quality is good. Affordable. Good looking. User friendly. For this price it's good. But after using it I would get ear pain because of the magnet. Noise cancellation could be better. Overall good product

name: Mohd Shahenshah
title: Handy in use..!!!
content: Received last evening. The seal of the packet was already broken.. This is my first product of boult audio after Boat and Philips. Till now good experience and hope it will at the same level in future also.. Battery life is yet to be checked.!. Pro: Noise cancellation is best part. Sound quality and bass quality is also good .. Con: Charging cable is too short and it socket is too tight, making it fragile to be broken.

name: Anthony Nair
title: Ultimate flop
content: Guys !!! Super......basssssss. M damn music addicted man, based on Suraj sunny reviews would like to inform you product is duplicated, it's not original Boult. It's replica sound is poor, bass just waste only this,. Buy

name: Sourabh Mayekar
title: Stopped working within 3 weeks
content: Firstly, the person on the other side of the line isn't able to hear you properly. I had to keep disconnecting then and talk using the phone itslef.. Bought on 11-08 stopped working suddenly in 05-09. Return window is closed. Amazon, pls helpe get this faulty thing returned.

name: rajesh Kumar G
title: Best one in Work From Home for office and personal use
content: Best one for work from home.I am using for teams and zoom calls for my office purpose.. It is fitted for laptop and mobile calls.. Nice one music lovers. Good battey back up.. I brought it for Rs.899. At a time connect with laptop and mobile.. Auto shut off in case of not in use or an ideal case

name: Alok Verma
title: Issue with connectivity(audio drop) while walking.
content: Overall this product is okay but i have major issue of audio drop while listening music and walking. The audio drop around 5-6 times in a minute while you're walking and listening song. I'm not refunding this item because it takes a lot of mess but really disappointed with its connectivity.. It is around of 1400 INR. but connectivity is unexpected like 300-400 rupees of earphones. Think before you buy. Apart from that boult should fix this issue.

name: Ram
title: Nice headphones with BLEv5
content: I've been using this product since a week now.. Pros:. 1. Decent battery backup of 8-10 hrs straight.. 2. Sound quality and bass is good.. 3.Magnets are nice and strong compared to few other headphones I'm using.. 4. Runs on Bluetooth version 5, many are still using version 4.1/4.2.. 5. If you're lucky, you would get two movie tickets.üòâ. Cons:. 1. There is a bit problem at higher volume for treble.. All n all good to purchase at given cost.

name: Abhishek
title: Must launch Boult app for all devices...
content: Product is good but needed few updates, like sometimes Bluetooth connectivity losses automatically, device get paired with two devices at once.. I think Boult must introduce their own app which provides minor updates to its device.. Overall it is good at a price bracket of ‚Çπ899 (during offers) and ‚Çπ1499. Never felt like something is there on your neck. Best in class and probably with a good decent sound quality (not prefer high volume). Good for exercise , running and whole day activities.. Battery backup is also good .

name: Rakesh
title: Go for it
content: Writing review after 2-3 weeks.. 1. sounds quality is good,. 2. vibrate less which is a good thing as compared to boult other products,. 3. no issues with the calls,. 4. yes bass is not upto the mark like weird headphones but perfect for this price rang.

name: AMARNATH THIRUMENI
title: Poor quality not worth for money buy some other good product
content: First it‚Äôs good but after a month it‚Äôs not working at all very worst product not worth for money not even switching on bad product. Not worth for money. Worst product. Don‚Äôt get cheated. Dont buy

name: Shantanu Shivaji indalkar
title: Hell no ! Don't purchase.
content: I have purchased this product twice!. At first purchase - product was in damaged condition. It was clearly identifiable that someone has used glue to stick d broken parts. Earbuds were dirty too !. At second purchase - product box was unsealed by someone. When I asked d delivery guy why so he just started arguing with me.. There is no hell chance to purchase Boult's product agn.. It's sound quality is ok! Noise cancellation is much better. But hell nohh !!!!

name: nupur phatarpekar
title: DO NOT BUY
content: Pathetic..very very disappointed. Only after 3 months of purchase, my earphones hav stopped working. Just like that. They stopped charging.. Worst part is their customer support asks me to courier the product to there New Delhi office. So now I have to bear extra courier charges for shipping them the defective product. The courier guy says he will charge Rs. 250 for shipping coz its an electronic item worth more than Rs. 1000, or else it is risky that it will reach the required person or not.. Is it my fault that the earphones are defective?. Do not buy.

name: amrish
title: Wrost product and wrost services,useless product
content: Please please don't purchase this product, because it is use and throw product , when I was purchased this product 1year warranty they provided me,but after 1 year they headphone not run properly and after several call they said they doesn't provided any service in fact I said I will paid for the same but they refused.

name: Dr.P. Bhattacharya
title: Just one bad issue otherwise Sound quality can be compared with sony or JBL
content: When the device is connected with mobile the connection gets interrupted while walking, even at extremely slow walking. Otherwise it's good.. This issue is only with phone when connected with laptop it works perfectly.. manufacturer should take a look in this error and rectify it.

name: Pradeep
title: Wrong product, don't waste your money and time
content: Worst Quality. I purchased this product on 8 august 2019 but after 28 august 2019 earphone stopped working. When I try to contact on support ..number not working no support. When I complain via email then he replied you need to courier product on the manufacturing address. Why I will spend my more money on this worst if you don't have any support why you are selling this product. Amazon also have request to ban this type of supplier from his website to selling product.

name: ANKIT KUMAR
title: Questions,problems,experience
content: "POWER AND VOLUME BUTTONS" are not reliable, the product was defective the first time.. Second thing they don't mention anything about the charger rating and battery ratings.. They replaced it and I got a new one.. Believe me everything is good with this earphone.. I mean sound quality,noise cancellation,bass all good.. Connectivity issues which many customers mentioned in their review ,I didn't face any. It remains connected till mentioned distance till now.. Hope they fix the above issues ,the buttons and ratings.

name: Mahi Balan
title: Worth the dime. Good product
content: Have been using since Oct 2019. Update as of March 2020. Very good product. Though the wires look delicate and the casting looks sub premium plastic, product is good for normal use. If you are careful with it, it can easily last you 1.5-2 years. Also connects with 2 devices at a time. Worth the dime

name: Nim
title: Fake useless product
content: The product stopped working within 2.5 months of its purchase. The customer support is not responsive and you will get So frustrated Trying to contact them that buying a new headphone would seem an easier option. It‚Äôs a fake useless product.

name: Venkat
title: Sound quality is not as expected.
content: Please go ahead with boat rockers.. Boult Sound quality and bass is not good as expected. I didn't check about the noise cancellation. I had an experienced on using BR's which was perfect.

name: aditya goenka
title: Omg they are superb.... BUY WITHOUT HESITATION
content: BEST earphones... Superb bass, very nice battery, clear sound, soild mic, sweat proof, very comfortable for anybody with any size of neck, accurate left right channels, it's a very nice deal at 999... You will not get these at 1500 also from other brands.. Its amazing.

name: Akash
title: Cheating with me
content: I purchased it for the vibration facility that is clearly mention when I order the product on Prime day sale this year, but the product has no vibration which I received and Boult says that this facility currently removed from the device. Socked, so why you not mention this on product description page in the Prime day sale.

name: Pavan Kumar
title: Product was pretty good, need some more quality and features.
