content: - Sound and Quality was pretty good. - Batter backup is good as well for me. - Noise cancellation should be more productive. - Better buttons should be more recognisable, because it is taking more time to recognise volume up and down while driving. - Neck band also should be more flexible that should be fit in side pocket of trouser. - More noise while vibrating after few days of purchased. - Better available in more colours. - Vibrate variant is more productive than non-vibrate variant

name: FAIZAN AKRAM
title: Amazing product
content: Will try to provide a honest review about the Bluetooth.. 1. Bluetooth connectivity is very good.. 2. Bass sound is very good.. 3. Battery capacity is excellent. Before purchasing the I was worried about battery capacity but it surprised me. Charge less use more. 4. Good build quality it also has a premium look.. 5. Easy to carry. 6. An excellent service by the Boult audio team. 7. A very good product in less price.

name: Nisharabid
title: Build quality is poor, but rest is fine.
content: The build quality is unreliable, very shaky, not at all firm, low quality plastic and extremely light weight. Doesn‚Äôt fit the ears properly even with the different sized ear rubbers provided. I‚Äôve used the same product before but it was quite firm and strong with great quality plastic so had a little weight. The overall product quality has degraded a lot. Sound quality is ok, noise cancellation is fine and bass is also ok ok.

name: Ramji
title: Worst experience
content: First i got this product with some quality issues like left side ear piece sound are low.. but i returned..but this time i received used. product...100% its a used product..pls don't cheat customers

name: Varun
title: Good product for the price !
content: I have been using Boult audio ProBass CurvePro for 3+ months :. 1. Audio quality is very good with decent bass.. 2. Microphone is also decent.. 3. Battery definitely lasts more than 12+ hours.. 4. Charges pretty fast too : 10 to 15 minutes gives hours of usage.

name: Pavan
title: great sound quality but poor bluetooth range
content: Product has a great sound and call quality and deep bass for the price but has a very poor bluetooth range. I began experiencing distortions , drops and lags from as short a distance as my pant's back pocket. The same thing happened when I kept my phone only 5-6 mtrs away. I did not test it for durability or battery life

name: Shreya Sharma
title: Not recommended AT ALL
content: One of my worst buys ever.. The reviews are extremely misleading and I believe they are for some sort of cashback.. It hasn't been one year since the purchase and they started malfunctioning within a 2 months and have now completely stopped working.. Not recommended at all.

name: dreamer2k
title: Not retaining the charge, after two months of use
content: Initially it worked fine, though it had loose ear fitting. Now it is not retaining the charge for more than two days, even if the power is off during that period.d. Getting warranty is not a simple process. I am unhappy with their support.

name: Jt Observing Life
title: Very Good At This Price Point.
content: First thing i noticed... Very comfortable to wear and looks stylish, no hassle. Now about the sound quality... It's good, noise cancelation is average and bass quality is on the lower side. Battery backup is awesome. Overall a great product at this price point. I'd say... Go for it.

name: amit
title: Either a defective piece elae just not worth it.
content: Well didnt quite make it to the rview phase. These headphones stopped working with first week of purchase.. I already have a samsung wireless earphone. Bought this one specifically for running. It always seemed to have bluetooth connection problems. Also i do believe this is not water/sweat proof.. I think due to sweat it has started malfunctioning. It starts vibrating randomly even when it has been switched off and disconnect from phone.. And now cant even return the product to amazon.

name: Muthusamy Subramanian
title: Average quality. Poor customer service.
content: Not a great product. It will work fine if you are lucky. It gets disconnected frequently. Though you get 1 year warranty, Boult customer service is very poor. They won't replace your product.. If you are least bothered about spending ‚Çπ1200 and take a risk and if you are really lucky.. you can go for this product.

name: Aakash verma
title: Good neckband but its  rubber earbuds is not so safe while driving.
content: Boult neckband is very good sound and bass and it is also comfortable in ear guys!!It has briliant battery quality But I am facing one problem in this neckband, it's rubber earbuds is not safe while we are driving or going on a bike, cars and bus .its rubber earbuds is loose and it can be fallen from the neckband .it is not safe while driving ...there is a risk of losing rubber earbuds .I have lost 2 rubber after using 1 month.

name: Siddhi
title: Using this for 10 months! Amazing Product!!
content: I am writing this review after using these earphones for almost 10 months. It is working as good as it was the day I got the delivery. The neck band is very flexible and comfortable, can wear it all day round. The sound quality is amazing and does not deteriorate with time. The battery life even after 10 months of daily use is still 6-7 hrs playback. Initially it was 10-11 hours.

name: C.N.Kumar
title: Stoped working 24hrs
content: Bought it by seeing so many good reviews, but Stoped working with in 24hrs of use,. Not even getting charged, kept for replacement have to see how it goes, very disappointing.. Got the replacement 2day, have to see how long it is going to play.. Will update soon..

name: upendra
title: Awesome product.....!üëå
content: Excellent product....! Below 3000 rupees price Boult curve is the good Bluetooth earphones. On looking its very premium and light when you wear it.. Neck band material is ABSPC and earpods material are ALUMINIUM finishing. These earphones are connect automatically to your phone.. Sound quality is too good and clear, bass quality is also awesome...... Battery life will give 7-9 hours While using at 60-85% of volume level and charging time is around 1 hour 20 minutes.. Distance of connectivity is to good within 12-16 feet... If your are interesting to buy Bluetooth earphones better to buy Boult curve.....üëåüëåüëå

name: Ritesh Umare
title: This is the Best Headphone Bluetooth
content: 1. Great sound, yes these are extra bass but only if you have good seal; when i use silicon large silicone tips from another pair of earbuds and the seal is good .. the bass is definitely there! Just be sure to use the largest silicon tips your ears can handle for good seal. (most sound issues will be due to poor seal). 2. Good battery life. 3. No connection issues, so far.. 4. Design is fine, not an issue for me. 5. Weight and wires are good; i often forget i have them on

name: Sanjay
title: Pro neckband earphones be like.
content: Overall product is excellent. The bass is bit less , treble is superb.Battery is perfect and long lasting. Sound quality is best.. Magnetic earphone back is strong connects quality .Bluetooth connectivity is fast. Neck band is soo much flexible and feels comfortable .While video recording from the earphones it catches too much of background noise. While on Call it's perfect to communicate with low background noise interference.. Rating : 4.8/5

name: Hari
title: Product is as described.
content: Left ear speaker is not working after few months from purchase, After sales service is pathetic. No resolutiom provided since last 3months,instead they advised me to courier the product back to me, which means i miss music from both the speakers eventually.. Felt like bought a chineese or non-warranty product now.

name: Jaideep sharma
title: Tech Savvy user perspective
content: Perfect for its price.. Bass is not too much and treble is not too bad at higher volume. Doesn't muffle, stays in place, good battery life and good quality mic.. Only Con: plastic quality is cheap and a lot of rattling with the buttons on the neck band.. Absolute steal deal!

name: Kassy
title: Good buy for a economy headphone.
content: Comfortable to wear as compared to Realme buds. I own Realme buds 2 and now I have purchased this boult headphone.. This headfone is good for beginners. Also battery back-up for average daily use this is best. Bass thump is good. And best feature is it can connect 2 audio devices at the same time.. Overall satisfied with the purchase.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worth the price
content: Its a poor product. Not worth the price. Decent sound quality but the battery life is very bad. It works for hardly 3 hours on medium usage. The indicator light & buttons stopped working within 3 months. Had to send the product to Delhi office in the middle of lockdown. Still after 1 month they sent a used replacement product which has stopped working in 1 month. Really dissappointed in the customer service üòë

name: Rajnish Sharma
title: At around Rs.1400, not bad choice. Poor noise cancellation.
content: Using it for more than 2 months now. Bought it for around Rs.1400, at this price range this product is too better.. Main issue is there is no or say reverse noise cancellation in it i.e. the listener on the other end of call listen's all voices other than the one with whom s/he is talking. It cancel your noise instead of the outdoor noises.. In areas like metro, bus etc when there is too much rush and the cell is in your pocket then it loses signal's and you will not be able to hear the songs properly, forget talking on call.. Other than that at less crowded areas it works great.

name: Vipin T.
title: Not worth wasting your time and money
content: Firstly, this product has only replacement policy, no return and refund. The product package seal was broken, plastic holder tray was bent indicating it had been taken out multiple times. Very poor package condition. Happened to me 3 times even on replacement. The earphones itself are just about fine, has decent treble giving clear sound when on calls, mic is good with decent noise reduction, but no bass.

name: Vivek V.
title: Good designs. Pathetic after sales service
content: Quite unfortunate that my first feedback has to be a negative one. I bought the product in Feb. Their design team has done a good job. Product Worked for a month. Then battery conked off. Sent it for service in June after courier services resumed. Its September and I havent received the serviced product yet. Pathetic customer service / support.. Would have given a - rating if it was available

name: jatin
title: Sound not cleared
content: Very bad services from boult. Service center not in city, we have to courier it but after courier they don‚Äôt sens any msg or mail regarding this and also not getting any conformation.. I courier the damage product which is not switch on and now i dont know about courier reached or what happen with my products and they replace it or repair don‚Äôt know.. Customer care number not connected which i tried daily for 10 to 15 times.. No revert on mail.After connect with tv, sounds was not cleared and getting cutting sound.. Not cleared sound in tv.

name: Ashish Sett
title: Amazing Product with a very competitive price
content: Have been using the product from last 15 days. It is an amazing product with superb built quality, modern design and great sound quality. The neck band is feather light and you dont feel that there is anything around your neck. I went for the red black colour and the look n feel is supreme. I paired it with my Samsung tab and the sound quality great for watching content. Overall a steal for the price it was offered on amazon

name: Aravind
title: Neat Design
content: Using it for more than a month.. 1) neat Design, good battery backup, slept several time with headset in neck no damages still now. Build quality is good. 2) bass is not as expected. Low bass. Audio stucks when you move away from mobile/laptop which it is connected. BLE Range is poor.

name: Vinidhi Kaushik
title: Worst product, with worst after sale service.
content: The power button is not working, when you continue pressing it, it is working, when you stop pressing the button, the bluetooth turns off, disconnected automatically.. Hardly 10 days of purchase, and no grievance redressal forum, no customer representative base.. Boult audio worst products.

name: Debajyoti Das
title: Totally unreliable BLUETOOTH headphone
content: The Bluetooth connection absolutely sucks. It gets disconnected randomly. Doesn‚Äôt want to connect back wven after multiple restarts. While connected, at times it will output an irritating continuous series of beeps. Will need to restart it then. Range is also very poor, max 2m. Overall the entire issue is with the ‚Äòwireless‚Äô part.

name: Ramavatar Ray
title: Excellent produnt
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great.... Connectivity is fine. Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested go for it without wasting time... thumbs up Boult curve üëåüëåüëç

name: Sid
title: Pathetic product
content: One of the worst product .. did not like it a bit.. Either this was a fake one, or it was a poor product.. I need cancelation, but amazon will first send reppacement and then probably cancel. That's hoti them, they can save money on shipping second peice, by directly cancelling it.

name: Philip John
title: Returning of a Boult probass curve which is not in proper working order.
content: This product was ordered in March but delivered on May 18th 2020 due to the shutdown from covid19. The blue tooth connectivity on this set does not work well as a result outdoor activities cannot be carried out for which it was purchased.. The return option closed as of 30th of March 2020.. Kindly advise as to what is to be done.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Warranty seems to be myth no response in case of defective product
content: Within 3 months head phone stopped working. I wrote to customer care of brand but no response. Customer care Phone number does not get connected.Amazon should help here in getting same covered in warranty or remove the claim that it's under warranty

name: SUBRATA BHAR
title: Awesome product.
content: Value for money. Very good product as the price range. Battery capacity is upto the mark.wifi range is really awesome. Light weight. Easy to use and easy to carry.this is my second buy. I am using the first one for last a few months. Totally satisfied with its performance. Lengh of the cord is adjustable. I would like to suggest that you may go for it. The bass could have been better. But it's all right at this price range.

name: Khalid Baig
title: Excellent Bluetooth headset.
content: Awesome Bluetooth headset that i ever use in my life, sound quality is nice and i am happy to use it. very good quality product,clear voice And bass so good.Superb sound quality and bass, sturdy, superb battery backup and that too at such a price.Very comfortable to wear Worth for money. Must buy.. Even i would highly recommended this product to my friends,it provides a great sound quality and when on call you can hear the voice very clearly.

name: PRAVEEN T
title: NICE Connectivity but only for 6 month
content: I am using this product for 6 months good connectivity, but now i am facing problem in battery and connectivity.. Since it has 1 year warranty, I request you to replace this product with new one as committed,. Regards. PRAVEEN T. 9176612337

name: Junsa
title: Boult audio
content: I was first hesitated to buy neckband earphone. But this one is very nice, light and battery backup is long lasting I don't have to charge my neckband for 2 days. Very nice product.

name: Melvin
title: Do not buy!!
content: Worst neckband I have used till date. Connection issues everyday. Auto disconnects multiple times in a day. Disconnects between calls, watching videos etc... It's very annoying that they have only one service center in Delhi. My product is in warranty but will have to take the to courier the band to Delhi with no assurity that the product will be repaired or replaced. Also, will have to wait for 10 to 15 days to get the same repaired.. There are many alternate products available in same price range with good quality.

name: Ark
title: Quality is ok for the money.
content: Quality is upto the money. So, you shall use it, but I can't say you can enjoy in using it. Had some issues when I tried around multiple BT devices near me. This device couldn't let you to connect with the another device. Untill you switch off this, the issue don't go off. Final words. If you want a BT headset, you shall buy this. If you want BT headset to enjoy music you shall go for someother. This device is ok for calls

name: Sameer
title: Recommended with no doubts
content: This the first time I am writing a review for a product,This product is really up to the mark in regards to everything which is on description.acoustics is really awesome ,you can listen to a clear crisp music . As compare to boat 225 the bass is bit low ,but honestly sometimes I feel in boat 255 the bass is everywhere,even when it's not required and Thumbs up from my side!

name: Rinku
title: very good headphone and value for money.
content: okey I am gonna clarify this controversial reviews. Actually some piece of this model headphones are defective. In those headphones left and right channel not working properly and call quality and sound quality is also very poor.. I faced this problem so I replaced and got new one, in which sound quality is awesome and left, right channel working very good and call quality is also good.. so if you are facing above problems then you received defective one. Replace it.. Overall very good headphone and value for money

name: Bhupender Singh Chauhan
title: Go for it if you are a bass lover .
content: Well , these are the best wireless earphones I have used so far . Sound quality is just too good with extra bass . Battery backup is also very good , for me , it lasts 2-3 days after a single charge . The only thing I am a bit concerned about is that the product is too delicate , although the matterial is rubbery but still .

name: Gnana Prakash A
title: Quality is Good but Have battery Backup issue after a month of use
content: I have been using more than a month now started getting battery backup issue, battery drains fast from 100% in 4-5 hours even if we not using. Especially during night time I keep it in off but when I see in the morning and try to power on but it doesn't on. Then I need to charge again. It started happening from the 5th week of purchase. Otherwise I would be happy to give 5 start rating to "Boult Audio"

name: Rahul B Gadadavar
title: Best Bluetooth earphone at Cheaper price
content: The Boult Audio Probass is better earphone at price range of 1100-1500. Usually it is 1500. But wait for lower price I brought it for 1100. Comfortable light weight. Good bass good sound quality. At 100 per sound is not clear. It is good at 80 percent sound. Good bass good sound quality. Noise cancellation is good. Build quality good. Battery is also good 12-16 hrs

name: Kishore
title: Excellent ear phone.
content: This is a very excellent Blue tooth ear phone. It has a very good sound quality, very sturdy and gives a very good performance. If the charge could last me more than the given 10 hours then it would have been a very good ear phone set.

name: Ankush pandey
title: Nice earphones
content: Nice light weighted earphones, easy to handle.. Earbuds provided are comfertable and slip easily into the ears cancelling notice upto some level.. The bas quality is nice, but not as good as that compared to some headphones whicg are basically for bass.. It has a nice range of 6-7 metres.. It's best one can avail for such less price considering the quality provided.

name: Anoop
title: useless procuct no service
content: this product was delivered on 26.10.2020 on 08.11.2020 it stopped working . now no charging being started. product is faulty , how it be replaced/ repair .Pl don't buy this type of product from on line. these are Chinese.

name: Shamshudden
title: Disconnecting regularly
content: It worked good for 15days and later it is not working properly. Whenever I start a video or a song, sound is disconnected for 3secs and started playing for 2-3 mins, later again sound disconnected for 3-5secs. It's happening regularly. Got irritated with fault. Already I have done exchange for the product due to same reason. And now I experiencing the same. Now I'm unable to return or refund on this product..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Grab a pair if you're looking for BT Earphones under 2K
content: Sound quality is awesome for the price point, the bass, the treble, the Lows and mids are all on point with this products, Boult got the build quality jusr right, although the quality of buttons on the neckband could've been better, but can't complain in this price point. Initial impressions only, will update on durability, but feels pretty sturdy also no issues with Bluetooth connectivity and range. Got it for 960 rs. Good day!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Headset stopped working
content: Pathetic product, it has stopped working in 2 months and there is no customer service for this. You have to fillup a Google form and then you will receive auto email.. But till date there is reply from Boult Customer service about the Complaint raised.

name: CHINTALA DEEPAK
title: 1 St product got audio problem..so ordered for replacement...
content: I actually like my brother Boult curve so I ordered it too.. My brothers one was 1 year old.... But the product I received has a lot audio interruptions even while walking!!!!.... So I placed a replacement for it...it's 27 may 2020 when I asked for replacement and I will be getting the new one on 29 th may 2020.... Hope the new replacement will be good... Stay tuned for updates..if the problem continues ...if will ask for refund..

name: NIKHIL HINGU
title: Not worth buying this product
content: I received the box with the seal already open. It seems to be used by some other costumer and return back and now delivered to me .Really disappointed üòû with the quality. Sound is ok not as expected from boult company.. Noice cancellation is also not up to mark.. Bass is also ok.. Really disappointed to buy this earphones at such a price. My 100rs wired earphones I purchased from Andhari station has a better sound and bass as compared to boult . Really not worth buying this earphones.

name: Sriram
title: Amazing battery life on single charge and Bass quality excellent!!
content: Amazing sound quality for the price band! My first Pro-bass Curve long lasted so good that I ordered one more for spouse. Tested first one for 6 months and then when satisfied I ordered second one. Long lasting batter, clear voice on phone calls, great bass support for multimedia audio!. Overall I am very happy with this product

name: Amazon Customer
title: ISSUES with Bluetooth Connectivity and Battery Life
content: Looks good, but not such a great quality product.. There is whole lot of connectivity issue when it comes this product. It's a wireless earphones it should have the best connectivity. It sounds really good, bass is good, it is comfortable. But if you are on call with someone it can loose connection anytime. Battery life is not that good I hardly use for an hour it didn't even lasted 3 days. When the battery was at 20% it was loosing the connection like hell. There is some serious issue with the battery life and the connectivity, company should address this issue ASAP if they don't want to loose their customer or else they will move to the competitors. Reviewing all the positive feedback thought it will be great purchase but it didn't met my expectations fully. I would rate it 3/5.. I hope it help you (future buyer) out.

name: Aditya
title: Value for money and great bass and sound.
content: I was initially very confused on which bluetooth earphone to buy but I think I made the right choice by selecting Boult audio curve.. Pros:. 1. Nice bass.. 2. Good music sound.. 3. Magnet connection between earphones so that they don't get tangled.. 4. Battery is very good- I charged for 2-3 hours and it lasted for nearly 2 days of regular listening.. I will definitely recommend this.

name: Dhaivat Vora
title: Wireless Earphone with an excellent Sound quality!!
content: I bought this Earphone in the month of Sept'19 so now I am in a position to write a review about this product. Let me start writing one line - EXCELLENT DURABLE PRODUCT at this price. I have had an experience of using various other brand's earphones earlier but this earphone in terms of sound quality, noise cancellation is above par. I am very happy with Amazon service as well since I received it on time without any issues.. MUST BUY for durability, portability, quality!!

name: Haman
title: Value for money
content: Best headphone under 1300. Overall experience is really good. Value for money. Pros:. 1) Bluetooth connectivity is good even after 10 meters. 2) Bass is really good. 3) Connecting simultaneously phone and laptop. 4) Noise cancellation is ok. Cons:. 1) Wire is thin in size. 2) Led indicator is not much visible. Need to search whether it is on (or) not. 3) Sometime unexpectedly device is getting off

name: saurabh n.
title: What a richness!!!!!
content: I've used cx180,jblc200si,jblc150si,jblt110,sonyex150plus.but this is just a beast.c200si and c150si has bass but there is no proper bass and treble balance in them.in clarity and details no one above beats cx180.its king in clarity.but cx 180 builds quality is bad.. This BOULT audio probass is best in class .i would prefer boult over boat.this earphone has truly deep bass which doesnt feels annoying.Just go for it.i got it 750Rs.thanks amazon.

name: Mohammed Asif
title: Satisfied!!!!
content: Sound quality is superb!. Mic quality is also good, opponent can able to hear clearly, comfortable to wear and mainly battery back up is very excellent.. Compatible with Skype calls in laptop!!! Just go for it without any second thought!!

name: Sreenath.R
title: Boult Curve
content: Boult pro bass curve is light and good headset for regular use. Call and sound quality is good for the price range but not effective with noise cancellation. The product which I received initially got damaged within a use of two weeks but got good assistance from their support team and the above was rectified promptly. If looking out for a regular use product at reasonable price then this can be considered in your cart.

name: mandeep
title: Poor quality
content: It strated giving trouble with charging from day one.. I could not return the product as accidently had thrown the packaging.. Now within four months it's stopped charging all together

name: akash
title: Bluetooth drops a lot in crowded area. I am unable to use even in library.
content: Don't buy this headphone. Reason is that you can't use it in a crowded area. The Bluetooth drops a lot and you can't enjoy the music. Spend some more money and buy a quality headphones. This one is really bad. Sound is good but not upto the mark.. Verdict; spend Rs 500 more and buy something which has a good quality

name: Subham Moharana
title: Value for money product
content: Overall the product is okay. The wires to the earpieces could have been longer. Easy connectivity but sometimes the music plays on phone speaker despite showing that Bluetooth connection is intact. That problem however resolves after reconnecting the device. Noise cancellation is good but volume and sound quality could have been better. A value for money product. I got it @950/- . So , I'm satisfied.

name: JamesM
title: Go for it
content: I got this in October 2019. I've used it almost daily since and it's still very good. I do not have to look at buying any new one yet. The sound quality is very good and have had not faced any issue in the last 8 months. Definitely recommend it.

name: Linda Nongbet
title: Good Product
content: I have never use Boult product before . This is the first time. And the product is beyond my expectations. Because I'm actually scare to buy electronic stuffs from online store. This is an exception which comes in good packaging. With a perfect seal, and inside taped to the plastic board so that it indicates the product has not been opened by anyone. Which is a good thing. The earphones is magnetic.

name: Samson
title: If you love bass but kanjus -- do a blind checkout
content: If someone (like me) used Sony XB50BS, telling you to buy it blindly, I believe you don't need to go check back 50 more reviews here. You cant get good bass wireless thing for this cheap. Definitely not like XB50BS (that comes for 4k+) but see I've just compared it with Sony! This is damn good, just a cheap looking wires but for this price this is a good decision.

name: Vikram
title: Vibration does not work.
content: The product which says vibration works when ur phone is away it's wrong news and I request buyers to be aware the vibration Does not work and the company says they have stop providing this feature in new batchs. This is unfair Amazon either u are cheating the product by not verifying the consumer selling right product or not , kindly Amazon fix this

name: Nikhil Raj
title: Some will work beyond expectations and some wont.
content: The product failed to meet the promises rite after 1month of usage. Even Boult service centre said online Boult has quality issues and said that they won't even try to check what's the issue. Lost money in this product.

name: Md Rustam
title: very Annoying not usefull..plz dont buy
content: very bad experience with this one....mic is not worning properly and its not getting connect some time..very frustrating so i through it down in anger and its broken now..do i wont suggest anyone to buy this annoying headphones.

name: Rafik Mansuri
title: Sound quality Ok, Battery issue in 6 months, Awaiting warranty replacement.
content: I like the quality of product, however it stopped working (battery issue) within 6 months of purchase. The sound quality is not great, the bass is not deep, battery was good for 6-8 hours but not et gets discharged within 10 minutes. Purchased it for 1399 and currently offer available at 899. I had sent the product to Boult Audio' Delhi for replacement under warranty by paying courier charges, awaiting their response.

name: Ajay
title: Product not original
content: Ordered this during offer period.. Product is really good with Quality bass & sound as compared to other brands. but I filed replacement since the seal of box was broken. When the replacement arrived,again the seal was broken which I showed to the delivery person. Might return this product since there were differences in both the items. I think they are not selling Originals that's why price is low in offer

name: yogesh
title: Abou
content: Audio sound was ok for music, but not great... I retured it coz i couod not able to talk effortlessly during calls.... The mic creates problem... Sometime supports, sometime doest.... Also... If you make lots of video call nd planning to use it.... Dont buy... Its not for video conference type quality.... Lag time comes

name: thanveer
title: Not getting responses
content: I bought this headset 1st time I faced sound issues and battery issues then I exchanged through warranty but they send me a broken headset after that they didn't respond my mail. Still I didn't receive any response from their side 1st time they serve me very well because of that I recommended this Boult to my friends also but now I facing this issue let's see after this they'll solve my problems I'll rewrite my review

name: Parth Sarthi
title: good set of earphones,‚ò∫
content: overall its a very nice quality wireless earphones the treble ,bass is just so good the only problem i faced is that i was suffering a bit of distortion while calling rrst it is a very good earphone under this priceband i got this for 1000 in sale and at this does not matter if there are few technical issues..

name: Ravi
title: Not worth the price even amazon service did not give a good response
content: After the good reviews ordered it, received 1st order with Bluetooth issue, received second product with mic issue.. The worst part was that the Amazon team was not helpful in case of second earphones, they said they are not able to understand the issue, call back from a crowded area and then we will see think what can be done.. Saw that it gets positive review due to a free movie ticket offer.

name: Veeresh D. Maste
title: Great product with pretty cool noise cancellation on mic!
content: Pros:. 1. Great Noice cancellation on the mic. 2. Vibration feature on the headset seems really helpful.. 3. If the headset gets disconnected from the phone the headset starts vibrating which is another helpful feature.. Cons.:. 1. Build quality seems to be not that great. But at the given price range it does fair justice.

name: Akshay Beniwal
title: Normal product at 999 INR
content: Sound quality is good, bass is good, battery backup is more than expected, last for 6 7 hours.. Build quality and connectivity is too low.. Voice fluctuates too much.. In 4 months, magnet dislocate and stop atttcting both buds,. And finally one side bud opens up and wires were in my hand,. Though I fix it with feviquick and working fine, but now both are not attracting ecah other.

name: Sarvesh G.
title: Don't think just buy it
content: It is very good product from boult... As per price it gives many more features.... Good Battery back up to 6-8 hrs... Fast charging experience.... Good Basss with Good Sound Quality. Noise cancellation is Descent Good. Light in weight and flexible tooo..... It is very Good product.

name: Hemant
title: Good value for money‚¨áÔ∏è
content: Happy with the product. Noise cancellation is good, so is the bass quality. However I did notice neglegible static for phone calls when comparing it to wired earphones. I still think that this is a good product and definitely worth the price tag.

name: Harsh mishra
title: This one is worth buying
content: I have been using this for more than a week now and the best part is that the *Battery life is just wao specially for this price as I have hardly Charged it 3 4 time from the day I bought it.. *And same goes for the sound quality.. *Its so comfy like you dont even feel like there is something hanging on your neck.. If you wanna have a headset which is cool comfy with great sound quality and damn good battery life go for it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst ever product on Amazon
content: Product is not good as expected, one side not working after 2 day's only.. I received a call from BOULT audio company, they asked to write a good review and they committed to providing a Paytm rewards, and guy name is Farhan.. Don't get fool, I am writing this to avoid frauds.. Amazon should not enclosed customer number to the seller and they should take action against them.

name: Sathwik pinninti
title: Not at all suitable for gaming
content: I would really like boult to take up this review . There are few things which i didnot like with this device. I also like to suggest that boult could lanch an application in google play store so that the application would be able to optimise sound for gaming .. The only things i like with these Bluetooth earphones are. 1.quality of music is excellent. 2.bass is also really good. 3.battery backup upto 6-8hrs and full charges at 2 hrs. The thing i really hate is that it sucks at gaming it lags sound in games .Sometimes sound breaks with some games.. It sucks at gaming

name: Saichasur
title: Review Boult Bluetooth Earphones
content: Got this product in Amazon sale for 999/-. First impression of this product is good. The sound quality is very good, bass quality is over the top, noise cancellation is good too. Battery is too good. There is charge still left in it even though I used it for 10 + hrs each day for the last two days.. Only thing that stopped me from giving five stars is the connectivity. Its the only con in this product. If there an obstruction it can hardly connect over a distance of 4-5 ft. Even though with obstruction it ranges upto 10 ft. But its still not half of what they promised in the product description. Overall considering the fact that its only 999/- and coming with 1 year warranty along with good sound quality makes it worth buying.

name: Sumantha
title: Boult Design, Sound is awesome. Under warranty were to replaced or repaired.
content: The Quality of Sound, noise, bass is excellent. Even the design of boult wireless compare to other brand is very decent. But this product was purchased by me in March 2020. Yesterday dated 21.10.20, Suddenly the wireless earphone phone got switched off and now i am unable to on even after charging.. Since it is under warranty, i would like to know were i can replace or repaired this product. Kindly advice.

name: John Sam Daniel
title: Seal is broken, amazon pasted new seal on broken seal. "FAKE Product
content: When I receive delivery the seal is already broken. First time I have received this type of product from amazon, iam very disappointed because I think previously they sell genuine products. Don't waste money during this offer period u can regret like me.

name: rohit g.
title: Don't buy it
content: Worst product please do not buy it , waste of money... Specially if you are buying it for workout purpose... My experience in this product is worse , I bought it , used it 3 4 days and it stopped working then I said amazon to return my product they said we and replace it but can't return and refund . Then I applied for replacement and got the new one then again used it for few days carefully but once I used it in gym again it stopped working . From my experience the product can't even bear one drop of water also.... And now there is no response from Amazon regarding my complaint.. so please don't buy this product...

name: Rajat Srivastav
title: Best wireless neckband ever üëå
content: No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery .Sound quality is really good.. You can connect 2 devices at a time.I connect laptop and mobile.Its Awesome... Good sound quality & 8-9 hrs battery life... Just waww look... üòâIts sound quality is adorable. overall it's good with strong magnetic lock. Thank you very much ‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: Mahesh golve
title: Bluetooth reception worst during calls
content: I've using since two days band quality is good.. Battery: is good it will get continues 7hrs play back max. Charge time: 1hr45min. Audio output: not up to mark bass is too low quality is no so good. Voice from left to right is switched. Bluetooth: they mentioned 10meters but not able to catch 1meter distance too much disturbance during call doesn't even work when placed in pocket. No need to speak about noicecancelation its worst

name: Samuel
title: Very good.
content: I really like this headphones, because of many good features. Audio quality and bass is just amazing, weightless and flexible well suited for gym or jogging. Noise cancellation was good during media play but not very good while asnwering voice calls or video calls. It just hurts the ears after long hours of usage but that is just expected in any in ear earphones.

name: lucky notani
title: worst bluetooth
content: plzzz dont purchase this worst bluetooth ever as there is only written warranty of 1 year but they repair it and it work for 3 4 days and the same problem i am facing again and again i have sended it 3 times but the all three times i was facing same problem and my broblem was that my bluetooth was not starting and not charging and even light indicator was also not working plzzz dont purchase ittttttttttttttttttttt.

name: Gokulnath
title: Poor product... Not worth for the money
content: Returned within 2 days of buying... Not worth the money u spend.... Couldn't use it for calls... Noise cancelation is zero and sobperson on othet side cannot hear anything... Music sound is also not that great... Battery is another flaw... It doesn't withstand for a day...

name: Sriraghava
title: Disappointed
content: Not working volume - button. Irritating sound. How to replace. Pls tel show to replace this product. Product was not working

name: Vimal Kumar A
title: Best Quality Wireless Neckband
content: Totally satisfied with the Wireless Neckband. The product comes as it is shown in the picture and descriptions. Package is very well. Delivery is very fast. About the product . Connection is very fast, sound quality in music and call reception is also very good. For this price point this is the best earphone.. I personally recommend this product.

name: Prafulla B.
title: Nice product but Chaina Made
content: Very nice. Sound quality is 95% achieved but it depends on your mobile and network quality. Though it is Chaina made, built quality is good. Those who have ear problem it will be not recommended as per my opinion, slightly differ as compared to wired earphones. Overall product is good. Easy to connect with all competable devices.

name: Priyanka
title: Worst quality nd company policy
content: Very bad quality nd worst product i got this nd after one week it's got dead. Battery issue occurs. When I put on charging it's working but whn i remove from charging it's dead. I don't recommend this to any one if there are negative rating then I will give this product -10 rating. And company policy are also disgusting. They said send this damaged product to their address and courier charges will be paid by customer. It's really pathetic.. So please don't but any product from this company. I have to give one rating to upload this review. Other wise I want to give this -10 star rating.

name: Arihant
title: Can't play pause the song
content: Can't play pause the songs I use Spotify ND each time I have to get my mobile to change or play pause the song... The speakers just get deattached automatically I mean the earpeice just open up automatically and one side of the earpeice fits properly but the other side just dsnt fit at all Batree is good overall quality is good..

name: Jagdish Chavan
title: Best Product at all
content: I have invested my Money in a wonderful product, I am using it past one and half year great sound quality of noise cancelling & bass such a fabulous experience.. I have faced issue with the left side earpiece I have sent to the warehouse within a 2 weeks my issue is resolved perfectly. I am using this product on daily bases such great response I am getting till today....

name: amit mishra
title: Great deal
content: Very amazing product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume. Battery life :- coming to battery it's really great...it will last upto 6-7hrs if you listen it with 60-70% volume... charging time is around 1hr 40mins. Connectivity is fine within 12ft distance... Finally it's really good "value for money" if you're interested.

name: Arun S
title: Nice one to get on for hands free
content: Continuously using from the time my friend laid her hand on it...awesome usage and very comfortable to use ...good sound quality and works fine inside house anywhere you go keeping your mobile at one place...call and speak through without any hassle and good indeed ..thanks for the product ..

name: Ketan Verma
title: not worth the brand and price
content: since i have taken this Bluetooth, i have changed 1 from another, however there are few problems. 1 - Connecting to the mobile is very pathetic. 2 - Automatically getting disconnected from mobile and than automatically getting connected. 3 - Sound other than phone call is very disturbing, it can harm your ear. 4 - overall NO NO

name: vijay
title: Connectivity and base problem is there but worth for this price
content: Battery is superb but connectivity not good as my expectation.. it's disconnecting even if you are going 10 feet far from mobile..base also not good.. It's ok for this price..I paid 820/- finally so ok for me... I ordered red initially but cable didn't get it so asked for replacement. No option for replacement so returned and purchased new item.

name: Punit Bhalodiya
title: Did not like sound quality and material of this product.
content: Product is good but sound quality is bakwas as compare to other earphones.. I have used one plus bullet z and oppo enco m1 both sound quality, bass and material is extremely good.. As compare with this product its notjing because personally i did not like material quality as well sound and bass.. So just little bit increase your budget and buy one plus or oppo enco m31 for good experience.. Thanks.

name: Vamshi
title: Disappointing
content: Reviewing this after 5 months and my product is already not working. One side of the earphones stopped functioning and I can't even claim the warranty cause there are very less stores or service centers for Boult and I can't find any near my place and I'm unable to claim it online. Bought Boat earphones around same time and they are pretty good compared to this. Overall a disappointing buy. Can skip this product

name: Sun üï∂
title: Pretty good for daily use.
content: Everything is pretty awesome.. Using this product more than a year.. I would like to ask you to work on the multiple device connectivity. Because I have been though a bad experience with multiple device connection. Like when I tried to connect with my laptop & mobile this device didn't work properly.. So just work on that... And if possible give a dedicated button to manual switch between devices.

name: Jesu
title: Ok to buy for deal price.
content: I got this in lightning deal at 999.. Very poor build quality. Vibration sound is absolutely pathetic. It let's whole world know that it is vibrating. No option to stop or control the vibration.. Sound quality is good for the given price. Bass is awesome for the given price.. My 1st earphone was replaced as left ear piece stop functioning. Got it replaced with another. It's been a month now, all in working condition. But never know when it will stop. No faith at all.. Final verdict:. Good to buy for sound quality.. Not at recommended for build quality, especially the vibration.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product
content: Its a very decent product at its price point. Audio is clear, mic works well. Only issue is bluetooth connection, sometimes it fails to find the phone or laptop and takes ages to connect. Once connects, works just fine.

name: Satish khajuria
title: 11 month usage, great product!!
content: Writing this review aftet almost 11 month of use. Great product,sound quality is great.Even after 11 month battery backup is like as it was new. A great product to really go for!!

name: naveen a v
title: Bass boost
content: Now words to outstanding performance and battery backup, bass is the power wooow, some peoples commenting no bass we should fit it properly and u can see tge different.

name: Navanit
title: Great for the price
content: Great for the price.. Music n call quality is good.. Battery life is really good, I just charge for one hour and get a day out of them.. Cons:. Build quality, the ear plug comes apart sometimes n you have to put it back.. So far i am able to do that.. Get it.

name: DaviD
title: Over rated Neckband
content: I bought this headphone @999 however got too many positive from amazon reviews. but after purchasing I first saw, Make Quality was extremely poor, Sound Qaulity is OKAY, noise cancellation is good, Buttons and navigation to next/previous are extreme worst. Overall I dont like this neckband at all. End of story :: if you need an average budget then youncan think

name: Ashutosh SHukla
title: Battery doesn‚Äôt last more than 1 hr
content: Writing this review after 3 months of usage.. The product battery is very poor, it drains after 1hr of usage. I use it for running and gaming, and all the time I go with a full battery and after half n hour battery shows low sign. Extremely disappointed.. When I purchased the product, I was happy with the bass quality but the battery back up is extremely poor. Now I have bought another headphones from Tagg

name: Ashish Rawat
title: Defective product delivered me
content: Amazon provide me a defective product. I am unhappy and very sad. I purchased many items through amazon. Amazon you are really disappointed me.. Guys Amazon replaced my item today. But my replacement items is allready used. I open the my product packaging,it is already open . And the product quality is very poor.. Amazon I don't wish from your side this.. I want new product.. So changey it

name: Jithu Raji
title: Good
content: It was really good. clear sound quality.atractive. long battery life more then 10 hours my own rating after 2 weeks (out of 5). Call Sound(voice clearense) -4.2. Music quality -4. Bass - 4.1. Battery -4.5. Design - 3.5. One small problem is this is not comfortable with my ears my ear was so small only big ears suitable and wire thickness was bad need good quality wires overall super

name: Vernon
title: Worth the price.
content: The sound quality is great, really liked it. Noise cancellation is fine, decent. The bass is great. There are 2 more silicon buds that you get, so you can use the one that suits you ear. Over it's a great deal and if your a dude that's likes listening to music most of the time. This is one good one that you should consider.

name: Kiran Singireddy
title: Worst Product
content: Utterly disappointed, the design of the product is very poor and within very few minutes of full charge, charge will fall to 90% even without any usage. As mentioned in specifications, this product doesn't give 8 hours backup, within 4 hours of usage the charge will reduce to 30% after which, once in 30 seconds it will keep reminding us that battery is low which means you cannot use it once the battery level reaches 30% which is disgusting.

name: MSD
title: Worth money, good quality, qualcom chip
content: Likes: Hybrid earbud, feather weight, adjustable, good sound quality e specially call, music also good but adjust phone equalizers for good bass with less chiller,price,Qualcom chip with Noise cancellation and input out out signal process , adjustable length of ear wire. Dislike : i m sent old imported product 9 months old, no battery level indicator while charging , chinese origin

name: Milind
title: Very poor quality
content: The product is extremely FLIMSY in appearance and NOT at all as it is advertised on the site.. After buying, I cannot even RETURN the item on the same day! You can only replace it with the same item.

name: Akash Bairagi
title: Stopped working in 6 months
content: I have purchased 3 boult curve earphone till now, all of them stopped working in 6 months, also the warranty process is time taking, we need to parcel the earphones to their centre in delhi by paying to post or other courier services as they do not have other service centres . Not at all impressed by the quality of earphones. Pay little extra and buy some good brands ehich wont stop working.

name: Anju Mahendra
title: Best customer service
content: I‚Äôm writing this review after using it for more than a year now . The quality of the product is very good and easy to use . The best part I loved about the product was customer service by boult , there was a small charging issue which happened within warranty period and I contacted the customer support and they asked me to courier the product they fixed it and re-couriered back . Thanks for the great service .

name: MUNEEB PERVEZ
title: Fair product
content: The product is overall good for 7-7.5 hrs usage continuously and standby time is about 2-2.5 days. Some voice lag during gaming but otherwise there is no voice lag. Battery backup is fine and sound quality is fair enough . Build quality is too good , very lightweight such that u can barely feel it on the shoulders. And the best part is u can sleep while earphones plugged in your ear without any problem

name: Krishi
title: Bass plastic sond quality
content: Using this earphone more then last 1 year but not facing any type of problem at all and most important the sound and bass give very good experience but bass is excellent and quality of earphone,wire,neckband plastic excellent.. If you are thinking to buy it then go for it. Worth buying

name: Vijay
title: Worth for 1000 rs.
content: Sound is good. comfortable in ear. Only problem sometimes connecing issues. After 50% battery down it comes to 0 very quick..... Normal use full charging works to use 4 - 5 hrs

name: Anuradha
title: Fake and Used. never buy from Appario Retail Pvt. Ltd.
content: I ordered this earphones because I genuinely liked this earphone. Used for nearly 1.5 years, before it stopped working so i ordered the same one. First, i received a fake one so I had replaced. The replaced earphone was a used one, with the outer box damaged, earbuds missing. This is absolutely disgusting. Also, never buy from Appario Retail Pvt. Ltd. They either send fake products or damaged or used products.

name: Nitin Mahajan
title: Many similar products available nothing special abt it.
content: Sound quality is great, Noice cancellation is good. Great bass.. Specification says that neckband vibrates when you get incoming call but that feature is not present in new product.. There is mobile number given for any complaints and queries about product but that seems to be not working.. I have registered this product online but no notification about same yet.

name: EPT
title: Charging problem got it replaced
content: Sound quality is good to my liking, noise cancelation is okay, bass quality is above average, lasted for two days(3 hours of music & calls per day,Bluetooth ragnge is not good, as you go to other room it gets disconnected within 5 mtrs also, and if you put your phone in your back pocket also there it get disturbance, was not getting charged after the battery got drained. Now got a replacement from Boult audio in 10 days time.

name: Soumalya 6
title: Good sound quality but.......connectivity issue!
content: Good quality for daily use. Battery backup is decent, Sound quality was actually good. But there was a problem while connecting with phone. Sometimes my device unable to detect the earphone, I tried changing the devices from different phone , laptop, but problem remained same. Finally after 10 months of usage the Bluetooth connection feature wasn't working.

name: Bhakchand
title: Quality not good wastage of money useless product
content: Battery back up too less and out of order within 4 months. For service request company asked us to send the product to New Delhi by post instead of arranging the return themselves. As suggested i have sent the product to company by my own experiences. The same product got Repaired and sent me back but battery back up is only half an hour I strongly recommend not to purchase the product. One speaker not working after 5 months of purchase Dr B v Tembhurne

name: Suman Dey
title: Best Battery performance and Sound quality in Rs.1000-1300
content: I have been using it for some days. So , I am writing a honest review -. Product quality - 4/5. Battery performance - 5/5. Bass - 3.5/5. Durability - 4.5/5. Sound quality - 4/5. Noise cancelation - 3.5/5. Don't think if your budget is Rs.1000-Rs.1300 .. It's quality is much better specially in "Battery Performance" that other renowned brand in the market. I had purchased it for 999/- only.

name: Brownin Kalikut
title: bargain best
content: pretty good for the price i paid. 899 bucks. decent sound quality. can get pretty loud. material quality is pretty cheap but i wasnt expecting aero grade for the price anyway. great for working out.. one thing that annoys the hell out of me: the sound the magnets on the buds make when they attach to each other.

name: Anirban Karfa
title: Good overall performance
content: The main purpose to buy this was clear calls where both ends are heard without call drops distortions or too much ambient noise.. Finally are buying a lot of Bluetooth earphones this one served the purpose, aside being an excellently good performer in audio and decent balanced deep bass as well.

name: bandaru B N RAO
title: FABULOUS BOULT BT NBC
content: Awful unbeatable battery backup observed.. Only one con,in the middle of call conversation sometimes some mysterious sound is heard.. In every aspect it is unmatched.. Superb deep bass.. I'm an audiophile,I'm 100% pleased with the device.. Durability is what one has to wait and see.

name: dhananjay
title: Best earphone in this price
content: super product I am using this on 1 week superb and 1) sound quality nice. 2)clean and clear sound. 3) neckband quality was superb adjusting flexible. 4) battery backup nice. 5) using normal sound battery coming 2 today's. 6) connecting easily to 3 seconds.. 7) pairing 2 bluetooth connecting .. using two mobiles. 8) in Flipkart delivery time. 9) small disturbance on your moving and bike reading

name: shaik chinna
title: A good product. Perfect bluetooth eanphones
content: Writing this review after months usage. Perfect product. Better than most of the rivals. Must buy. Perfect sound quality. Battery approx 1 day of moderate usage easily.

name: vivek
title: Value for money.
content: 1. The sound quality is good but not pleasing.. 2. Inverted Stereo sound where left track is playing in right ears and right track is playing in left ear.. 3. Bluetooth connection is dropping when walking or jogging.. 4. Buttons and OS support is really good.. I love this product .please purchase it..

name: NiK
title: Nice specs but sound quality is not satisfactory
content: Have csr 8635 chipset but sound quality is low.. Decent battery backup upto 7 hours.. Usability is good. (Good range, vibration indication, easy to use buttons etc). Only problem is since sound quality is not satisfactory it isn't optimal for music

name: sonu
title: Don't go to buy on it's lower price
content: This bluetooth has no longer capability to give the proper quality of sound.. After using >6 months its one side earbud's sound has been stopped. When i sent it on the address of Boult audio in the warranty period to fix the problem then, first they taken approximately 15 days to repair. second when i received the repaired product, i found another problem in that. There is very low quality of audio in the repaired earbud and also mike does not work when another bluetooth devices are available near my repaired Bluetooth.

name: Hasan..
title: Best in price range
content: Pros: best fit in ear, decent battery backup, light weight, design best for professional use, great sound quality in this price, comfortable to keep on your neck when not in use.. Cons: cannot connect 2 device simultaneously for audio and calls, little connectivity issue while switching phones

name: Anurag
title: Better than being Just Good
content: I think this is one of the best Bluetooth headphones in this range. It has a good music playback time of around 10 hours ( as it claims ). It is ultra flexible . Although the noise sometimes cut when you are walking on the road , but I also got a Pair of Boat Rockerzz and it happend in that too for which I think it happens in almost all the headphones of this price range .. Bass is more or less good . But what I liked the most is it's Noise cancellation feature , which makes it far better than other headphones. I got this at 999 in the Prime Days Sale and I must say I was lucky enough to have this at such low price

name: KRISHNAMOORTHY
title: Build quality not good
content: I bout this on 25th Oct and found the lid is not properly attached in the ear buds. Both the side ear buds are just linked with the ear clip which is the very thin rubber layer. The moment I unpacked ear buds and the head is getting separated I can see wires and circuit and afraid to fix as this is very minute and tiny. Applied for return and looking for good product.

name: Chandan
title: Budget Bluetooth earphone
content: Well, if you are looking to spend within your tight budget, this earphone is best. Built quality, Battery life, light weight, Magnetic eadbuds and looks are its best features. Noise cancellation, carrying in bag, hanging for charge will take extra effort from you. we can't be careful always to handle it. But requires extra care if you are using it daily basis. else they will chances of damaging the product in day to day activity.

name: SACHIN PATIL
title: Worst Headphone do not buy charging problem
content: Worst Headphone do buy charging problem . 2 times replaced facing same problem

name: Amazon Customer
title: Quality product
content: The neckband's shape and quality as well is totally amazing. The bass's quality is so good that you can literally hear the little beats in the music, which enhances your experience with it. The band is flexible and also you can wrap up the earphones' wire according to your needs. It doesn't creat any hurdles while you're doing something else.

name: Anand radhakrishnan
title: its good and worth the money,outside noise doesnt come.
content: Its very comfortable to use and worth the money.The neck holder keeps the earphone in one static position. Can use while travelling, connects to bluetooth easily. Base is not upto mark,but outside noise cancellation is smooth.. No instruction/procedure is mentioned for bluetooth connection, need to google search it.Otherwise its a good and affordable product.

name: Praveen Kumar M A
title: Replace my item. It's not working one of the dummy item
content: After one week one of the ear phone not working... Please do not buy this product . First time I purchased and it came with defect one. Then again I send it back and got replacement. Then with in one week one of the earphone not working.. It's really worst one..Made in chaina... Please do not go for this.. Do not spoil your hard earned money.

name: Ajay
title: Perfect in all departments
content: I was looking for a perfect neckband wireless where it fulfills my music and call quality to my surprise boult audio curve is the perfect in all departments.thank you boult for giving me what i need .guys go for it blindly without any second thoughts .

name: Amit Prakash
title: Cheap Chinese boult.
content: Initially i thought not to spend much on Bluetooth headset and purchased this.Later i regretted after 2 days of usage only.The sound quality was average and Voice call was also average.The battery last for 4 to 6 hrs.But the button quality is extremely poor.Most of times i struggle to switch on and switch off due to cheap quality of buttons.. Spend more and go for non Chinese headset.Chinese sells on crap.

name: Hardev Motors, Kalkaji
title: Terrible experience of this product üò™ üòî
content: I don't like the sound quality of this product. First I received defected and used product. After replacement the sound is not good , it feel.like , I am using very cheap.quality.product. I have requested for return but still no one comes from Amazon to pickup this product and I am.unable to.contact Amazon customer service personnel. Please help here if anyone can do.

name: Sahana Saji
title: The seal was open
content: The seal was open. First of all its very disappointing that none of the e-commerce sites have delivery to my place which is Bomdila 790001. So I had to order to a different place and from there my order was transported here which itself took 3 4 working days. Now if I have to return this it will again take few days and automatically my return days will get over. Hope for speedy reply.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Severe bluetooth issues everytime
content: I get bluetooth connectivity issues everyday like more than 10 times.. Important calls get missed as the Boult bluetooth head phones work randomly and most of the times they dont work.. I have never ever previously faced so many bluetooth issues even with older bluetooth version devices

name: Rajeshkumar Devaraj
title: VALUE FOR MONEY
content: I had an issue that I heard the ambience and my voice through my earpiece at the very first time connecting a call. After that it's been good one for the money paid. Sound quality is good. Automatic pairing with my mobile is good enough but doesn't pair with my android TV. The way it fits into the ear is perfect and it kinda serves as a passive noise canceling a bit.

name: Ashish Natu
title: Please think twice before purchasing this neckband
content: The Battery is faulty not getting charged. Sent the product to Boult Audio for replacement. It has been almost 20 days since the product was received by Boult Audio but I could not get the product replaced. Whenever contacted Bould Audio service center kept on promising that I will get my product but no action in reality. horrible experience.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Big claims.. But reality is not pretty
content: The first thing that surprised me was that there was no instruction booklet inside the product.. On first day use the bluetooth was getting disconnected fractionally.. For a sec after a min or so. I thought it could be my phone connection issue so I connected it with laptop but it was same there too.. The next day it bluetooth connection got even worse and keep on disconnecting and connecting again and again.. This is when I asked for refund after 1 day of use!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best value for money.
content: The sound output is really appreciable, that outranges the similar products in the category and the bass is also sufficient even though it is not remarkeable.. Battery life is a very important advantage of this one. It can handle 2-3 days with a single charge. No need to worry about the sound output, battery life and mic quality of the product; really satisfied with the purchase.

name: Pravin Gode
title: Product quantity was not upto the mark but the service is good
content: I bought 2 similar products out 1 was good and with 2nd one I had a issue. One side of the product stopped working but I contacted to the company regarding this they were helpful about this issue and contacted me, And going to replace this product as soon as possible

name: SaintPeter
title: Great product ! Highly recommended.
content: Fantastic product, great sound. Retains charge for almost 1.5 days on reasonable use throughout my workday. charging time is also less around 1.5 hrs for full charge.

name: Kamal Ratlani
title: Go for it..
content: One of the best deals on Amazon.. being a boult user and have already ordered curve once this one is the upgraded version and loved the quality of the product... Material used is good maked it look classy. Sound quality is much better when u buy somethin at this rate. It has noise cancellation and people could hear me even when i am riding at 60/kmph... Must buy product

name: VP
title: Do not buy this
content: Not a product to buy. Of the same category of wireless bluetooth earphones, this is probably the worst. It is the least durable of the lot. Used for hardly 2 months and that too irregular usage and it just refuses to charge and pair.

name: R‚àÜJ
title: Poor connectivity and error. Good sound quality
content: Sound quality is good. But connectivity is very poor. Also there's delay in connecting calls. Sometimes headset disconnects automatically without any notice. Also sometimes an error beep sound while using the headset.

name: User
title: Headphones are good but don't buy it from Amazon.
content: Got opened box of headphones twice and now there is charging issues with the device. Never buy electronics from Amazon, rather go and buy fresh item from shop. I have faced issues with electronics in the past as well so would suggest to not buy from amazon

name: Abhinav lal
title: Totally worth the price, buy it!!
content: Have been using this product for long time. Bought multiple times for family and friends! Dont keep too high expectations in comparison to headsets worth 5k+, at this oroce range this is the best, quality wise and sound wise!. I would definitely recommend it.

name: Jayesh
title: Bang for the buck
content: Supreme audio quality. Have not explored the product completely yet. But initial response is just WOW... Ps there is no vibration alert feature in this headset as mentioned in some reviews and also i am not getting a free movie ticket for writing this review as some people mentions.:)

name: Rajanikanta Sahoo
title: Good quality product and worth buying it.
content: I received this 2 days before and could able to connect with my cellphone, fire stick and laptop seamlessly. Sound quality and bass is very good. I used it for long phone call as well, there was no complaints like low voice so the voice quality was also very good. It is fast charging, takes only few minutes to full charge. Overall I am satisfied with this product.

name: Pawan yadav
title: Good product üòäü§ü
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear ...bass is great but not the best... it's very loud if you hear it with 100% volume...but for better experience use it 50-60% volume

name: gopal madireddy
title: Volume keys module
content: Sound quality and design is excellent but the volume keys I got is not stiff in that position something moves up and down and seal might some one already opened it.. They send me some used one for some days and then they send back to it which I got that used one.. Please check it for further orders from yours store.

name: Priyanka
title: Crackling sound while playing, worst at high volume as audio is heard out of the earphones
content: Received the product today. It all in good condition. But there is a crackling sound when its turned on. Even during the music. Got it replaced, thanks to the Amazon's amazing service. But again received a faulty product. As soon as I set the volume high, the audio was heard out of earphones. Its troubleshooting to use it in a silent library. Really disappointed with the product. Not buying it again.

name: avinashsai
title: Good one
content: Good oneI've been using it from weeks now and I think now is the time to give a review. I can tell you this that only weight you feel on your ears is of the sound of music, it is light as feather and battery life is amazing (I used it for more than 12 hours (5,6 hours ideal). Sound quality is good and I mostly use this for multiple devices and with my laptop it feels like its the best fit than wireheadphones. And for the price they are offering, this can't get any better. I'll recommend this product.

name: genuine customer
title: Dont buy sound not pleasant. not good for continuous use
content: Worst earphone i want refund not good for continous just by using for 15 to 20 minutes i am feeling my ears heavy. Poor quality speakers built quality is ok. Sound is loud but not pleasant at all. I want refund.. It replaced as its vibrator not working but still i again got aame faulty piece again it's vibrator is not working.another no one pickup your call at customer care

name: Vinay Kumar S
title: BOLUT vs Samsung
content: Hi All, after so many reviews, finally brought this headphones with Rs.999/-. Sound quality is too good after changing ear buds(small size). Noise cancellation working perfectly. Bass sound quality good for this price. Compare with Samsung Level U, I suggest you to go with this headphones because its Just Rs. 999/-.

name: Abhishek Kumar
title: Good product
content: Battery life: 9 | Looks fine till now. Bluetooth connectivity: 8 | Sometimes it disconnects automatically and then reconnect itself. Dual connection: 9 | Connects to my laptop & mobile simultaneously. Convenience: 7 | Wire is thin, so precaution required. Sound: 10 | You'd hear few extra sounds in the same music which you heard on any other device

name: Lalit Pant
title: Unable to register for warranty/product not up to the mark!
content: I bought Boult Probass neckband at the recently concluded sale. Recieved a card mentioning register warranty note and website address however, the website is not opening, showing the message account suspended. If so, would like to return the product as I also feel that the sound quality is not up to the mark.

name: Vinay Kumar
title: Boult! Can be better
content: The performance of the 0rocust is not as expected and wanted more from boult.. Also, I got an issue while using this product is that while talking on call using Bluetooth except my voice rest everyone's voice will be clear to the other person on call, instead of my voice! How could this is be fixed is to be taken care by boult itself!. Hope that u will fix this issue very soon!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Glitch sound while walking away from your phone
content: Product and sound quality was good when I checked after purchasing this product ..Got disappointed when there was connection issue and when you walk few steps away from Ur phone u can have some glitch sound .Got this for gym purpose but have to keep my phone near to me so it work well without any disturbance.

name: Sanju
title: Good Product
content: I am using this product from past 3 days and very good for handling calls. I am facing issue with sound quality while watching movies after 20-30 mins. I have to re-connect again and it works fine. Best part is Boult Service, they call me to check if product is working fine or not. If not and an since it on warranty it will be either replaced or repaired. so am happy with the purchase.. Good Product to buy for :)

name: Nilanjan S.
title: stopped working after 3 months...
content: It was a good product but such a shame that woked only for 3 months then it stopped working at all. Not even starting.. although its in warranty but its a very hectic process...so its a waste of 900 rs..

name: Shailendra
title: Go for sound quality with good bass...
content: For sound quality: No doubt .. it's good but when it comes to grip around neck.. it's very irritating sometimes. initially the range was good but later you may notice disturbance while walking. Latency is their while playing high end games.. So i will say, if your budget is tigt this is much better option.. Battery and charging wise it's average..not bad neither too good..but very decent.

name: ISHWAR KEWAT
title: Services
content: Hello sir, after receiving boult audio probass curve I'm very happy.But after using a week,i found that after putting on charging ,red led light is not glowing and it is not connecting to the device.. Sir as per the return criteria, return window closed on 28/10/20.But as per warranty it has a 1 year warranty.Sir please help me out to provide me a new serviceable product as soon as possible.

name: Kavita
title: Need ear holder, otherwise good quality for music.
content: I am using boult audio bluetooth earphones from 2-3 days. The battery backup is great. I have charged it only once and it is still working. It quickly connects to phone within 2-3seconds. Sound quality is good. The cons I found are, it is not comfortable for my ears as it drops down while eating or exercising, wires are too thin so have to handle it carefully. Better if it comes up with ear holder. Otherwise the product is good.

name: ASHISH MEHTA
title: Not Satisfied
content: After using it for 5 days I found the Sound Quality is NOT good and upto the mark... Noise Cancellation is also a problem.... Would not recommend this product to anyone.... Please avoid buying this... Instead opt for boat products. I made a wrong choice

name: Prasad
title: AWESOME
content: I am already using normal head phones but I can't got real feel of any music.so I think to buy a new headphone, search for it,that time I got Boult device reviews and I search for it real value in Amazon & Flipkart now I got Rs 899 only in Amazon (1499 Flipkart) .. This is on of the awesome product in my life from Amazon and Good & Clear BASS. IT'S Suitable for my ear and no pain such as local headphone. One of the mistake from Boult it's connection in songs with mobile Bluetooth any way I think it's valuable product of my money... THANKYOU.....

name: Mohamed mobin
title: No service ..pathetic experience
content: This product was good only for one month and then it simply refused to start at all..now i am stuck with this non working product, company claims they give warranty but not sure how to claim warranty and from where?, this is the most pathetic service. I complained on their website,just got an acknowledgement for my complaint and after that no action, this is not what I expected

name: Rajveer
title: Awesome
content: I have been using this produt for last 2 days and belive me it is the best blutooth earphone in this range that I have ever found If I talk about its built quality it has been made with fine material and it also comes with adjustable ear wire and If I talk you about the sound quality , belive me its awesome and I would give 8 out of 10 rating...

name: Vikas Zakas
title: awesome wireless earphones at this price range
content: this wireless neckbend earphones are awsome!. dont know why some people are giving negative comments, means seriously someone is telling that bass is not that good, some other are saying sound quality, you all are golden spoon babys go and get JBL or SONY neck bands at this price range this product is just awesome, at last i just want to say, ye jo wireless earphones best hai tumko ishka bass ya sound ishliye aacha nahi lag raha kyu k tum isse 4000 k earphone k saath compare kr rahe ho itta hai to vo lelo jaa kr jab aukat nahi thi tab he to ye liya.... best i love it.. 100 percent recommend

name: Abhijit Das, Bangalore
title: Average product
content: Bluetooth connection poor sometimes.. Off/ on is not operating properly.. The low battery warning starts from 20% battery life. This is very unusual.. After few months, the right ear phone is nor working. Asking for replacement, no response yet received.

name: Sangam Gupta
title: Not very good...
content: Product looks sturdy and of good quality.... Sound quality is OK.... But it is difficult to fit inside ears due to its oblong design... Better to buy standard straight design ear phones..

name: Dhananjay
title: Honest review
content: Well i used the older version of curve 2017 model and it did really well i used that earphone for atleast 1year , but today i got 2019 model and i was quite surprise that this version very different and even they maximisis its voice capacity and noise cancellation which is really good and i can these are the best earphone under 1500 and still. These are better than some 2000 to 3000 range earphone so i suggest if your budget is around 2500 or 2000 u should by boult curve.

name: Amazon Customer
