title: Poor customer service
content: Immediately after buying this product they will ask you to write a positive review to apply a film voucher and i did it.. now its only 3rd month and its left ear has stopped working when i called the customer care they are not responding when i messaged the same whatsapp no. That they told to send screenshot of the 5star review now they are seeing the message and not answering.... though the product was good and had a really good battery back up... i will never suggest u to buy this because of their customer service..

name: Shumaila
title: Amazon is deliberately sending faulty items to villages
content: Amazon is deliberately sending faulty items to villages i faced same issues with my Samsung Galaxy M01ORDER # 407-5761849-1749918 ,. i received this item with broken seal , Scratches on item and Extra buds missing last but not least item was very old color got fainted, the returning still not initiated.. Amazon Service is getting degrade day by day.. VERY DISAPPOINTED by amazon.

name: Aashish
title: Amazing sound quality
content: I would give the product a 4.5 . The sound quality is amazing , gives a very good experience . The flexible neckband helps u carry around even in pocket . The battery worked well for me .I do not have to charge again n again .works for 9-10 hours . Also , I am not a freq user . The product was economical too .overall I loved it .

name: Shaurya Dangwal
title: Looking for earphones... bang on this is the one!
content: A remarkable product at this price. Used it during my workout to check its sweatproof level and it worked better than expected. The curved design of band fits perfectly on neck reducing the chances of falling while running. If you workout and want a neckband that would blend in perfectly with your intense workout then i will definitely recommend this product.

name: Seuli Adhikary
title: Wonderful
content: Wonderful product. I always prefer to use reliable branded headphones, earlier i was using a bluetooth headphone of JBL, but BOULT is satisfying me in all aspests. Loving this brand.. Happy with boult.

name: Shashi Hans
title: Experience (Good+Bad)
content: Good experience. Pros:-. Sound quality was very good.. Battery backup almost 12-13 hrs after full charge (calculation on the basis of battery usage for 4hrs). Cons:-. Listning songs and vdos was a good experience, but while playing online multiplayer game the sound was 1s late

name: Varun
title: Useless Bluetooth for calling purposes
content: Ok type sound for music or YouTube videos. Dont even look at this if you plan to take calls on this as your voice is not clear to the person on the other side. Tried on multiple phones , cellular networks and places same result... wish could return this

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great product in this range
content: I'm using this product since September of 2019, this is a value for money product. It actually delivers what they have been mentioned. Battery life is gud, noise cancellation is descent, sound quality is upto the mark even by using some apps u can enhance the bass too. Durability is just awsome bcz I'm a very rough user so I'm saying.. Looking fo cheap n best bluetooth neckband go for it.

name: Aman
title: Review on Probass Curve
content: Durable, light weight and good looking, the quality of the earphone is impressive.. Bass is a little poor,noise cancellation is up to the mark, overall sound quality is too good.. It gives you an immersive sound experience, you can enjoy listening to songs in it.. No problem for people who are thinking of using it in the gym or while jogging.. Happy customer.

name: Raghu
title: Do not but it
content: The only thing what was promised was delivered was the battery life apart from that its not worth buying this product I have replaced the first piece thinking it's a fault on that however it's the brand which is at fault. 1 ) People complain that they can't hear u clearly and the best part is they hear the people on the background more than your voice. 2 ) While playing games it's off absolutely no use

name: Amazon Customer
title: sound was good
content: the sound quality was good and it had clear vocal and bass was good for my liking, it has passive noise cancellation which was ok in less crowded places. build quality was good for this price range and battery life was also good, my only complaint with this product was that its range is not good sometimes I had a problem with connection while my phone was in my pocket

name: Oliver Coelho
title: Buy the Boat rockers 255 over this one
content: Sound quality is the not at all decent. Bluetooth connectivity is bad as you'll continuously see your music face static disturbance. To add to it, it gave me a headache and caused discomfort in my ears. Overall they are not worth buying, even if it comes in a lucrative deal.

name: Vishal kamde
title: Excellent earphone for daily use
content: Writing this review after 10 days of use. Coming to sound quality, it's excellent in this price range. Noise cancelling is working perfectly, no wind noise while driving. Battery backup is good, with average use i'm getting 4-5 days backup. Only concern is the bass which is bit less compared to boat rockerz 255. But i like it as it is way more balanced and neutral for long term listening.

name: Bryan d.
title: Bad connectivity with 2 devices (unlike some other Bluetooth headsets)
content: For answering phone calls & simultaneouslylistening to music from my tab It is a problem, it doesn't connect to phone & tablet simultaneously.. I have to switch off the blue tooth of either one device to connect.

name: Gaurav Saini
title: Worthy for penny
content: Ultimate earphones, I bought it for recording purposes, they're serving my purpose, only thing is that they don't look like premium, they've cheap finishing, otherwise everything else is fine with it. Sound is much clear and more than a wired one, you can't keep the volume at extreme level

name: Devendrasinh
title: Best product at low price...go gaming
content: First yhe product is amazing and the quality too.. I buyed it for gaming purposes and then i found that this are the best wireless earphones ever till now at such low price.. Recommended by me for gaming u can play pubgm at a good sound quality u can even know the surrounding sound like foot steps very easily and kill enemies and also improve ur gameplay... üëåüèª

name: Aditya
title: Pros and cons
content: Pros:-. 1. Sound clearity is good. Most of the headphones, while using for long time, gives you pain in head but it is not like this with this product.. 2. Battery life is really good on this.. Cons:-. 1. Dont buy if u want to play games like pubg because there will be some lag of sound. I shall recommend you to buy wired earphone instead of wireless for games like pung as this laginess issue is found in most of wireless earphones.. 2. Not recommended for people who like high bass.. Overall good product for its price of 1000rs.

name: Lucky jha
title: Low bass compare to boultl low price headphone ,,low sound quality
content: Boult is delivering in market that extra bass and there microboofer but there is low bass quality of sound can damage ur ear bcoz sound is huge but quality is bad so guys u can buy jbl if u want quality ,,I raise a complaint for return but there is only replacement so I ll have to use without my choice

name: karan
title: Delivery ppl are not letting us sleep.
content: I am waiting for the person to come and pick this up. Also, want to raise an issue here, the delivery ppl come in between 6.30 to 7.00 am when we are sleeping. I work in night shift and sleep at 5 am and then these guys come, totally disappointing. Neither they call nor they come on the official time. This happened twice within this week. Tell them to come after 9 not when ppl are sleeping.

name: shubham singh
title: No noice cancellation,Battery issue,High price for this productNot recommended at all
content: Not at all satisfied with the product.The earphones do not support noice cancellation at all. Even sound of vehicles running 20-30 M away from you will be clearly adible to the person on call. At 20% battery itself it will continuously start popping up that battery is low which is very irritating and you need to charge it even if it is at 20%.I would recommend people to go for other brands.

name: Arun
title: Don't buy. Worst quality and service.
content: Worst product ever. Please go for branded headphones or even flipkart smartbuy bluetooth is better than this. Repaired 2 times in 11 months and both times problem remains same. Voice is so low after reparing that it's better to use without earphones.

name: Bibin Sebastian
title: Don't not buy at all.
content: Don't buy this product. The product is too bad. It stops working after few months. The audio automaticly gets disconnected and we can't hear anything. We need turn off the Bluetooth or disconnect from mobile and reconnect it again. Most of the time it happens same. Request U'll to go in some other brand.. The the name boult on the opposite of power stick holder gets erased too.

name: N Nagendra Gupta
title: Works only 2 months
content: I purchased the product in the month of apr19. 2 months later this product is not taking charging and not working. I informed the same to customer care. they told me that the product should be shipped to them to Delhi. I done the same.they replaced the product. After that the replaced product is also worked for 2 months. Now it is not working. Waste of money

name: heral raj
title: Does a good Job as a hands free
content: I picked it up to take calls in my car while I am driving and its doing its job perfectly as hands-free.. Pros:. Neck band vibrates to notify when you are getting a call. I really liked this feature.. The built quality is comparable to other brands (I've used sony and skull candy Bluetooth neck bands).. Cons:. Sound quality is OK OK. Not that great when I compare it the other bands that i've used.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good battery back up, good sound
content: Product is very good and easy to use...gets paired to with 2 devices easily without much of effort.. sound quality is really good it good to go with music movies or your calls...longer battery back up simply means less of charging...its 1 year still no issues.. So my take go buy it use it and be happy...

name: Chetan Gharat
title: Best neckband from Boult.......
content: Overall this neckband too good.....just little feature missing... vibration....... Need voice assistant button separate like other brands. Bass : 10/10. Noise cancellation : 10/10. Design : 9/10. I like this neckband because noise cancellation too awesome even when background noise is too loudly.....

name: Vinayak Kundgol
title: Best product at this price, Worth for what you pay
content: This Bluetooth handfree is really a awesome product at this price.. Even control of this headphone is really easy n v usefull.. Easy to connect.. Two samll issue's -. *Whenever you are having conversations (calling) with this headphone opposite side person will get lot of noice from your background.. Battery backup full music and call runs up to 3:1/2-4hrs

name: Rajesh
title: Average product, very average quality of sound
content: I brought this product 10 days before.. Good battery life. Average Sound. Poor bass. Poor noise cancellation. Charger port placement is a trouble.. Other products in same price range have better quality then this.. If you get good offer on this product and want only normal headphones then this is OK.

name: Rajesh Ravula
title: Not too worst and not good at all
content: The neckband fits well and I'm completely satisfied while wearing it. The battery backup is too good, What I don't like is the sound quality it sounds like cheap earphones, and there is no bass, the voulme Up button is well and Down button is not noticeable while clicking, and noise cancellation is out of syllabus i don't want to talk about it because there is no noise cancellation for this product, and there is no vibration alert for this product.... I'm not going to recommend this product for anyone..

name: Satish
title: Simply superb earphones in this budget
content: I am reviewing this after using it for a month. Sound quality is good. For bass lovers it is really good.. It is very comfortable in ears and no pain. I recommend buying this earphones.. There is some issue with vibration, at times it vibrates and we have to switch off and on again. But i don't see it as a major issue.

name: Prakashbhai Buha
title: Best Product but Deler was not Provide a Good Product i think change the product
content: This Product Really Good and all permanent working but I purchase this product in Amzion side was very bad experience l bzc very late delivery and Previous Product Products Purchase To Boult side it very good so I again request to company plz share a over view to your contact basis company bcz it's Brand value effected .I view customer is very happy tene he was a good Marketing behalf of you so think about

name: Ahemad B.
title: Boult curve bluetooth
content: It's good product but when am getting call it's too much vibration .So in office entire odc people looking at me when I get a call.. I reported the same thing to custom care regarding this vibration issue asked them how to turn off vibration and they told that is the special featere in that blue tooth.. Charging is 6-7 hrs stand by and good to listen music . Good to use outside not in inside. And when I joining in WebEx and skype calls (bridge calls)it's too noisy . But no issue with mobile calls.

name: Srikanth Rohit
title: Good product, worth the money
content: Sound quality is good. Overall design is good but the material of the headset feels like low quality but for the price point I think it is as good as it gets.. What I didnot like is the "power on" "power off" audio which comes, it feels less cheap. Instead have some sounds to indicate power on, power off like many other brands do.. Overall, for this price, I think this is as good as it gets.

name: govind rathi
title: Not a good product
content: Within one week the earfone started misbehaving. Issue i faced is following -. 1) Even when the battery is charged 100% within a few minutes it comes to 30% and then it drains within 10 minutes and gets switched off. 2)Bluetooth gets disconnected every few minutes and I have to connect it again and again.

name: Sasank kallepalli
title: Not Satisfied
content: The product is in absolutely good condition for the first 6 months after that,. 1. Connectivity problem ( Device is connected for mobile and used for calls but I can't use media like songs, watching YouTube videos and other). 2. Suddenly Right side earphone stopped working. 3. To claim the warranty you have to ship your product to them with your own expenses.

name: Jagdeep Singh
title: Go for it .... Good to Purchase.
content: Review after using 6 months. It was good experience. Connectivity is good covers approx 10 m range. Sound quality is good ... Can be improved. Color and built quality is sturdy. In this price its good to purchase. Only if they can provide travel or storagr bag with it.

name: Aravindhan
title: Value for Money!!
content: The audio quality and bass is greta for this price. I've been using for 6 months no issues so far except the cable for headphones are made of rubber like material, braided cable would be sturdier.. Used it in gym and slight rain ipx5 does works.

name: Satish
title: Great product worthing every penny you spend
content: I bought these earphones in the amazon great indian sale with 80% off which is worth for every penny. I really like the sound quality and the noise cancellation, the bass is just mind blowing. The earphones will give you a premium feel when you are using them and the design on the metal heads are awesome. If you are looking to buy a really premium bluetooth earphones then just go for it.

name: Sundeep Kheria
title: Great Product..!!
content: I have been using the Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband in-Ear Wireless Earphones for quite sometime now. This is my Second Purchase in the Last Year. The Product is Very Light in Weight, so it is very comfortable to hang around the neck. The Sound Qualty while on a Call or while listening to Music is too Good. The Buttons provided on the left side are very prominent as well. They are used for multiple functions like connecting or disconnecting the Calls or for Volume Control. Overall it as Good Product to Use compared to the Clumsy Wired Ones.

name: csbabu
title: Must buy boult wireless earphone.
content: Awesome one. I was very particular about bass & treble. There were little negative responses about bass.. But it's false info.. Audio clarity is great with deep bass.. Earlier boat. But didn't like it.. This one is perfect. Battery backup is best.. Must buy for everyone.

name: Santosh Khatri
title: Not as expected
content: Overall headset is ok but I gave 2 stars only because manufacture quality is not upto the mark.. I had to replace it with another one and other 2 which i had ordered are after using 2-3 week later have lots of issues.

name: Neha
title: Worst product
content: This Product is the worst purchase i have ever made.... One side of earphone is not working and customer support is extremely pathetic.. i have sent this product three different times to boult office but each time they sent the same product back to me.... Highly disappointed.... I would not recommend anyone to buy this product..waste of money..

name: Anup Anand Ghoshal

But the service team didn't send back the replacement rubber earbuds which I sent them with the product.. Sound quality, noise cancellation and bass quality is quite good. Great product at @900 rupees.

name: Anju Sharma
title: Not recommended

content: The product info is not the same as what was delivered. The details says manufactured by Exotic Mile a Delhi based company. Hence no assurance on the authenticity of the product.

name: Amrin S.

But no payment procedure started nor amazon people came to take back the product

name: Mahalakshmi
title: Best Earphones in Low Budget

title: Bluetooth connection too poor. Please don't buy

name: roselinjennifer

I really feel disappointed in this case because I have not even used this for long time and this happened. @amazon we accept a customer service from your end please help

name: Amazon Customer
title: DISAPPOINTING SERVICE....

title: Warranty policy not defined by amazon

name: Rajeev

And the sound quality is awesome. I think this was made for persons like me. thank you for making it.

name: Ruchika Singh

Buy it happily dude.

name: Namitha Abhijeet Roy

One more main issue I faced is with the distortion while I am in motion. There is a lot of audio distortion while riding or jogging.

title: The best in the market at this price. Go for it!!
content: Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband in-Ear Wireless Earphones with Latest Bluetooth 5.0 is the handsfree device you would need if you are looking for something comfy. Use it for the day and night and it feels like itas not even there over your neck. The sound quality is pretty impressive at this price point and it is not gonna disappoint you at all. The build quality is robust and the materials used are upmarket. It gets fully charged in a nick of time and battery lasts up to 8 hours as claimed.

name: suresh c
title: Superb headset in budget
content: finally i got a good product in my budget & at last my searching is closed. No doubt its sound quality is too good, Bass & Terble noise along wid Mic. Overall product is good if you are going to purchase budget Bluetooth earphone device i personally suggest you go for it wo closed eyes!!! Excellent. Thanks Amazon.. 7 people found this helpful

name: shankar
title: SIMPLE AND BEST. HITTING THE BULLS EYE üëåüèºüëåüèºüëåüèº
content: Very sturdy and amazing sound quality.. Wire doesn't hang too much over or below the chest like other products. Very near to ears , easy to fix and release. Doesn't look auckward from outside. Value for money and can be used for talking uninterruptedly and perform sports activities.. Bass quality is very good for music lovers. Simply go for it who always live in the principles of 'simple and best'.

name: swarna
title: Sound is good,mic and quality has to improve... cable should work long Time
content: Sound quality is good.. Noise cancellation is also fine.. But Mic has to take near to mouth manually.. looks like mic range is little less so it's performance is poor.after one month of usage cable stops it's working.it crosses one month I didn't return this.some times connectivity problems I face.usable time for charging is good.i buy it 999rupees in offer .. I feel atmost 700rupees ,we can spend for this.overall 3/5 I can give for this product.

name: rajeev kumar
title: Average product.
content: Although product is not sold at MRP. But MRP does not justify the quality it is insanely high. Build quality is not so good. Sound quality is average neither too good nor too bad. Notice cancellation and bass quality is ok. Boat performance is slightly better. Build quality need to be improved. Battery life can only be judge after consistent use. Lets see how long product run.

name: Jayshree Parmar
title: Worth The Money
content: This light-weight earphone has better sound quality with bass(which is in it's name). The sound won't degrade when listening at high volume.....And The most important thing is it's battery life- the most I have seen amongst earphones I have used........ Simple & easy pairing......One can go with it at this price.....

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not up to the mark.
content: It's a very average headphones and it's quite laggy in connectivity too..... Overall it's not that much good for audiophile and Even for mediocre music lovers.. Fitting issue, connection issue and less comfortable to use.

name: Utkarsh
title: Nice product in discounted price!
content: Till now I haven't come across any fault it met my all need in all aspects. It's just I don't know durability.. Good product if you get in discounts.

name: kunal
title: Excellent service and descent product.
content: Product delivered on time and it is best both for calling as well as listening to music.. Everything was working fine but suddenly the product started misbehaving after 6-7 montho of use, I have raised a request for replacement of the product and response from Boult team was very helpful and positive even during the lockdown period. I have received my replacement and its working fine.

name: Ankur Vishwakarma
title: Good sound quality and bass quality and noise cancellation as well.
content: The product is good. Before purchasing this product, i had comapred some more products in the same price and then i selected this product and ordered it. Well i wasn't sure about the quality because i had never used any boult product but when i received the product and starting using it , i felt satisfied by the product. It's value for money. One can surely go for this product

name: Saurabh Gokhale
title: Absolute nonsense.
content: Dislked Everything. Build quality very low. Noise quality very much poor. Cheap plasticy feel. Silicon ear buds very cheap quality. All sizes tried .none fitting. Leave work outs. They were falling even while normal routine walking. Dont understand why Amazon would sell this kinda cheap Chinese product. That too blindly under the heading Amazons Choice.

name: Jags
title: Long battery life.
content: I really like the headset. I use it for almost the entire day. There is no lag when I use it for audio conference on laptop. Can connect to multiple devices. I really like the long battery life. Worth buying for the price.

name: Syed Tehmid
title: Feel like duped
content: There was much hype created around this product. Came to know about the product from a youtube channel..However the headphones stopped working barely 15 days from purchase. First there was a charging issue. Once that was sorted, the headphones would automatically disconnect barely 40 seconds into playtime. Wasted around 1k purchasing this product. Don't buy it

name: Kuldeep
title: Good product & service quality
content: writing this after using around 1 year, sound is good, bass quality and mic is also fine.. Unfortunately, my earphone had some issue in mic and connectivity so I had made a complaint regarding that on boultaudio customer portal then they asked to courier defected piece and after around 7-8 days I got that back.. and now it's working fine as previously.

name: priyanshu goyal
title: Good product
content: I will tell you my experience of 75 days. For sound quality: No doubt .. it's good but when it comes to grip around neck.. it's very irritating sometimes. initially the range was good but late ri noticed that when i listen music while walking..continous disturbanxe will be there.. Also one most negative impacy is ..you can't bplay PUBG wearing it lol...sound comes little bit late... So i will say, if your budget is tigt this is much better option. battery and charging wise it's average..not bad neither too good..but very decent.

name: snmani
title: worth for  (each paisa ) money
content: This is my second one...last year i bought one and used it and still the first one is in good condition. i am happy with this product... long battery life and flexible neck band and light weight.

name: Adarsh bishwas
title: Comfortable for listening podcast & good battery life
content: Sound quality is really nice. and comfortable in ears but ear bud often lost because of this eay of design. but bass is so light. As i bought this earphone for listening podcast and youtube video so it's perfect for me because it has good quality sound and battery life. But those who love to listening music this is not much better for listening bass music

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best earphone I ever have
content: This is this best wireless earphone I have.. 30-40 mins full charge, best for excercise, Its a budget wireless earphone. I was just wasting my money on costly headphone. I want to recommend these earphone to the people to just give it a try, I am sure that you wouldn't regret.

name: Namita
title: "Vibration" üëéüò°
content: Headphones are madeup of very cheap quality. When it "vibrates" while call notification then it raise a lot of voice and along with it completely vibrates the volume button too, which makes it very worst product. "WasteOfMoney" "WasteOfTime"

name: Nagraj V Rampure
title: Awesome bluetooth neckband
content: Awesome product. I was able to grab one for 999/-during festival season. looks are very premium and sound too good. Vocals, highs, mids, lows are all perfect. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive. It also vibrates for incoming calls.

name: Jerin M.
title: Irritating sound in the background.
content: It has a weird noice coming when we raise the volume,really irritating,first piece i have returned because of the same issue. I think the entire batch of product has some manufacturing defect. Sadly no return and refund only replacement. So think twice before buy.

name: Saikat Das
title: Awesome
content: Excellent!!. one n only problem is Bluetooth range is around 4 metre. At highest volume treble is more then bass!!. At 80% volume bass is excellent vocals r clearer than ever. Outstanding part is its mic quality is excellent ... voice throigh call is crystal clear!!!. Overall satisfied .... cz my phone remains always in pocket so no disconnect issue

name: Supriya Lakra
title: Good bluetooth earphones
content: I am reviewing this product after 4 months of using it on a regular basis. The sound quality is good but the noise cancellation could have been better. But again for this price, the features and performance is quite decent. I have also used boat rockerz and I liked it better because of longer battery life and the ease of connectivity with my phone and laptop.

name: BINOJ PARAPPILLY VINCENT
title: Simultaneous connectivity to two devices
content: Product is working fine. And it has seamless connectivity across two devices at the same time (could be connected to my mobile and lap. While watching movie on lap, if a call comes in mobile, then the movie audio stops and the ringing starts.

name: Souvik D.
title: Awesomeness depends on you
content: I am using the product for about 3 days.. the sound quality is more treble oriented..bass is not at all punchy,rather suppressed... but that shouldn't be an issue if you can adjust your equilizer at the sweet point as the clarity is awesome. Battery life is good. Can't comment on the durability as it has only been 3 days. So 4 stars on that. Overall happy with my buy, and you can go for it if you are looking for a mid budget Bluetooth headset.

name: Tarana Suhail Shaikh
title: Useless
content: I used it for calling while driving. It was good for few days but now i cannot hear or receive call through bluetooth. Useless product not working now and could not even receive call through it. Have to use mobile to receive or cancel the call

name: sarthak belekar
title: Aggressive pricing!
content: Sound quality in these earphones are amazing. The mids are crisp and clear, the vocals are good the bass is also heavy but it's that not punchy. ... These boult earphones are really budget friendly and has some good premium features. If you're budget is around 1500 these are the best earphones.

name: Tajber
title: Earphone not working
content: I bought this product on 4th September however from last night it's not getting switch on. Really shameful that a product is not working within just 17 days. I really want to change my product.. Please do the needful. Regards. Tajber Singh

name: Viral
title: Please don't buy this product
content: Hi friends. I am using this headphones since 6 months but really disappointed with the quality of the product. The background noise is so loud that the other person can't here what I am talking. Please don't buy this product it's really useless. This is usefull only for normal calls not for what's app call or video calls

name: Kharre
title: Very good product in rhis rangeüëç
content: I am writing this review after using 10 days,. The quality of an Earphone is excellent, sound quality is simply superb, connectivity to the device is very easy, volume control and call pickup button working perfectly and very comfortable wearing.. Battery backup asking 12 hour but actual is 6 hour. Very good product in this range. Value for money

name: THAKUR JI TECH SOLUTION
title: Build quality and very poor and power switch not working
content: No doubt its sound quality is good but its build quality very poor ,its power siwtch not repond,its repond when he charging is on i am very dispointed .I am not suggest any one buy this product. Also am going to returning.

name: Prince raj
title: Sounds good
content: I loved this one and the sound is also good.. Color is also good.. For me it's up to mark.. If you want to buy it then go for it ..

name: Krishna verma
title: Good product!!
content: 1.Packaging - received packege with open seal, complained but not received any response.. 2. The quality of the neckband is not satisfied.. 3.Sound and calling quality is good as per expactation.. 4.Battery can be last long for 7hours for. Single charge.. 5.the connectivity is good.

name: Johny Paul
title: Product caused headaches.
content: Received this product today from Amazon. As soon as I started using it, I started having seering headaches. Not sure what's the cause, because I've us d bluetooth headsets before but never had headaches. This is clearly a defective product. Called Amazon to accept a return. No I don't want a replacement on such a product. They refus d to accept a return. Taking this for sure to consumer complaint forum. Strongly recommend not to buy this product.

name: ‡§®. ‡§ö‡§®‡•ç‡§¶‡•ç‡§∞‡§æ
title: bass quality very poor
content: I m not happy with the product buc bass quality is very poor but discretion say extra bass so discretion is totally fake.... And have not received in the parcel extra ear plug and chargering cable.... Very very poor products package....

name: RAVINDRA
title: Best in this budget range but need to improve quality.
content: The earphones have been very good n comfortable to wear at any time while enjoying the music. both music and call quality is good & budget friendly too. I have had no problems till 4-5 months then suddenly started having trouble in powering it on. It randomly gets power off will not power on for long. Have reported the issue to Customer Care, they seems nice. I am being hopefull for an early resolution.

name: Gp
title: Disappointed
content: Sounded like cheap earphones. Sound cracked at high volumes. Bought after listening to an old model which had vibrate function and also coz of the positive reviews, but its not at all good at sound. Got a replacement which was even worse, mayb the new models are such. Only pros is its battery life, lasts full day.

name: Dharmesh
title: Not satisfied, poor post same service
content: My first impression is a big ‚ÄúNo‚Äù. Within few days of usage, I got a pop up on my laptop and phone that mic is not working. Customer care raises ticket and closes them without actually solving the issue just do that they achieve the turn around time. Overall the sound is ok. Noise cancellation and bass could have been better got the price. Very disappointed

name: Avinash Vishwakarma
title: Worth for price
content: I forgot to take picture of the product when I was opening the package, the seal was broken and it was looking like that someone already opened it rest quality of the product is really good but I don't know why whenever I call and talk to anyone I face some issues like I can't hear people's voice clear and it gets cut again and again but overall product is really very good.

name: reena
title: Worked only ten days
content: Great for ten days when it worked. Loved the fit, sound quality, bass, etc etc color ...but worked only ten odd days....appalled. Have complained to their site. Apparently amazon cannot do anything...so have to write to boult...let's se what they do about it.

name: Vinay Krishna
title: Best in the category
content: Writing the review after more than a month's usage:. Pros:. 1. This product fits the criteria of nothing over the top.. 2. Sound quality is above average to high quality.. 3. No inconsistencies in the output delivery at low to medium volume.. 4. Noise cancellation is best in the category.. Cons:. Yes it has its flaws like even when the battery level is good or even full, sometimes it just doesn't switch on. Apart from this con, I don't see many for a normal daily usage.

name: Nitin
title: Awsome bluetooth earphone
content: I have used boult pro bass bluetooth earphone and after using one week I m totally satisfied with the product, it's sound quality, bass, battery time and noice cancellation is quite good but company can improve the quality of wire use for earphone, rest all product is awsome and I m enjoying it very well.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Everything is awesome
content: After searching too many bluetooth headphones finally bought this one.. Everything is awesome. Sound Quality:- 10-9.9. Battery:-10-10 (never expected to run for 10hrs after full recharge). Body material:-10-9. Connectivity::--10-9 (a little bit lags sometimes but Range is about 10 ft.). Comfort:--10-10 (Easily hangs on your neck and feels zero weight because of its lightweight.). Overall a nice product Go For It.

name: Rakesh Singh
title: poor product. removed vibration. disappoint
content: vibration has been removed, due to which calls are missed in silent mode.. the product is useless . and even the sound quality is just OK. wire is of poor quality.. they have some adjustment with amazon due to which product is not being returned . hugely disappointed

name: Rizwan Mir
title: Best audio curve
content: Best product and best price value. Sound quality is awesome with reduced noice distortions. Bass quality is good enough to please your ears. Shape and body is good. Wire length is changeable. Magnetic strips are good. Curve has been made soft and smooth and fits perfectly on neck giving a pleasing look. I couldn't find any other such a good product in this price. Grab it.

name: Pankaj Nagarwal
title: Suoerb and worth product in this price segment
content: I like the product...especially. 1.battery backup is very good..and work about 6 hours in single charge.... 2.bass is very enough to make every song perfect... 3.sound quality is clear.. 4.design of earphone is perfect ..fits very well around the neck..nd i feel very comfortable with it.. especially in the gym... 5.noise cancellation work perfectly... 6.Before purchasing this device i have so many options then i chose this one...and luckily this earphone making my money worth...

name: Droid RAZR
title: No warranty claimed by company boult
content: Product was good earlier but, it just complete dead within 6 month and got no support for warranty from boult company.

name: Sid
title: Value product with good sound clarity
content: Bought it for a great price during the Prime Day 2020 sale. Been using it for 2 days. Its a great value product and sound clarity is quite clear for music as well as phone calls.

name: Kindle Customer
title: Used product got delivered.
content: I got a dusty used product with blackness at some portions which is a clear indication of its old ness. Amazon should improve and take such matters seriously. The product was damaged badly. It‚Äôs inner cables were visible as the outer layer was peeled off. They gave me a very much used and damaged product. Highly dissatisfied. Amazon should improve big time. It‚Äôs high time.

name: Aravind R.
title: Worth it for it's price.
content: The product is good enough for occasional use and music and handling calls. One problem with this is the annoying and loud callouts for low battery and pairing confirmation. The call outs start at 20% and are announced every minute screaming low battery in your ears loudly. The bass isn't that great. But it's really worth it for the price.

name: Prince Lawrence
title: Value for money product
content: The product built was excellent and sound quality was awesome, i loved it, there are few cons but those are very minor and if you select this product then your choice is one among the best options you have choose.. The Bluetooth signal range can be increased.. Overall a good product and value for money and should have product if you a music lover and who travel a lot.

name: Asrar a.
title: Connectivity issues and sound issues when moving or jogging
content: As I brought it first I checked the sound quality it is great . Battery life good used it about 4 hrs still half a battery remains build quality is also good bcoz of this thing it deserves 3 stars atleast . The major problem with this earphones is the connectivity is not stable as they say 30 ft Bluetooth connection range it's totally wrong it's not more than 10 ft maximum. Sounds fluctuates when moving or jogging as u go far from u r phone there is a delay in sound and unpredictable interruption of sound . In my opinion the Bluetooth connectivity is not good don't buy it .

name: savitha
title: Excellent product
content: The packing is perfect with earphones placed securely.The earphones look very good and elegant, feels very light in hands.the neck band is very comfortable and flexible to wear.the ear earpiece looks good and gives premium look. Sound quality in these earphones are amazing. Totally unexpected good quality..Just keep going no two thoughts about purchasing the headphones.

name: Niket
title: Overall good wireless earphones in the price range.
content: Sound clartity is good but don't expect like that of Sennheiser or Sony. Good in the price range. Bass is very good in the earphones. Noise cancellation is excellent, you can't even hear a person talking beside you if the earphones are on full volume. Use an Equalizer to get the best of the earphones otherwise you'll not like the sound output. Battery lasts for about 6-7 hrs of continuous playback. Not recommended for playing games like pubg or cod as you will get sound delay.

name: NS SHEKHAWAT
title: Connecting problem
content: I online ordered boullt audio curve wirelesss neckband magnetic earphone vide invoice number DEL5-744905 and recieved on 22.05.2019 through amazon seller services pvt ltd. but after 2 month use they had blutooth connecting problem . Although its switch button is working, when it is getting on, its show blinking lights but it is not connecting with any smart phone. As this product is under warranty so please do corrective action and solve my issue... And otherwise replace my product.

name: Bhagyaraj Amara
title: Waste of money
content: The ear phones which I got not working after 2 months and completely stopped working and I don't the exact reason and Iam not a rough user and I won't use much time also.It is better to invest in someother good products like MI or Sony or Samsung

name: gopal
title: Just ok
content: Boult curve looks good, battery endurance is satisfactory but after 30% of remaining battery it is not usable, connection between phone and earphone is working within 5 meters, when on a move by bike aur riding bicycle it usually get disconnected even when you walk you will find that audio sound is distorting, it made me disappointed when I was on bike and every after 30-40 second it unpaired

name: Pratham Sharma
title: Worth to buy.
content: Sound quality is brilliant.. I felt that outside notice is unnoticeable while using this.. I can, in real, feel the base quality. Amazing product.. I just felt one thing missing that no of ear pieces are provided in the box but only 1 pair of ear cups are there which are attached in the earphones. More than 1 pair of them should be in the box.

name: Hiren Patel
title: Worst product
content: for first few weeks product is good in terms of sound quality and built quality but after few months it stopped working, now after 100% charging i'm not be able to switched it on, also many times i tried to connect the company for warranty but no response from their end.

name: Dundagi KR
title: These Headphones Don‚Äôt deserve that much of Price
content: Can Buy the Product, if the Cost Of this Headphones is around or less than Rs.1000. Only Noice cancellation is good remaining Treble, Bass is average and Vocals are High. Signal Dropping for Calls is Observed...However I Used JBL, Skullcandy, SoundOne, Sony, Mivi Thunderbeats. These are The Headphones, Which disappointed me a Lot..

name: Rohit Singh Arya
title: Did not worked for even 2 hrs.
content: Didn't work smoothly even for 2hrs after full charge. No manual provided to understand working . Tried to register ,Boult account showed suspended. Returned the product. Very low bass, noise cancellation is ok.bluetooth connectivity pethetic, misleading charge indicator.

name: Shobhit Bansal
title: Poor connectivity even in hands
content: Poor earphones since they can‚Äôt provide good connectivity even when you are walking with the phone in your hands.. However the sound quality is good, but if they cant provide connectivity then everything else is meaningless.. Thats the basic thing for a bluetooth headset.. Would not recommend.

name: sourav misra
title: Registration for Warranty is a lie
content: Dint start using the speaker yet. But the warranty is a big lie. Tried the QR code and direct link both. None of those are active.. Sound and connectivity are good after a 6 hours use i can assure that.

name: sYED k.
title: Good buy
content: Would definitely recommend this product for regular everyday use. The built quality and the feel of sound is great in the earphones and the buttons feels solid, no complaints there. Only issue i would say is the noise cancellation. It just isn't up to the other earphones level in this price segment.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best Buy! Must have!
content: I love it! I face serious network issues in my house. A simple would turn into a hassle. Somehow magically when I use these there is no problem and I can have absolutely trouble free clear conversations while I‚Äôm in the go!. A must buy! Very well priced! Looking at the price I had thought why I was buying such a Cheap one and that I may not work well but I was wrong

name: Ankit Chakravarty
title: Overpriced and bad sound quality
content: I rate 2 for this product. Returning this after use of 3 hours due to following reasons:. 1. No bass only plain voice is coming. As I bought it for listening music can't hear plain voice.. 2. Company removed the vibration feature form it when call is coming . Earphones are not vibrating when call is coming.. 3 it is overpriced and if you really want to listen good music go for boat.

name: Bhushan
title: Value for money
content: Boult audio pro ball curve is very good in sound quality and design. As compared to boat rockerz it is very good , The adjustable neck cord and call alert facility make this earphone unique.. Battery back up is up to 6 hours if you continuously use on 70% volume and Bluetooth range is also better than boat rockerz.. Overall it's value for money

name: Dr. A.
title: It can connect to TWO device
content: Best product. It will connect to two devices at a time.. How:- First connect to a device like one phone and than switch off the device. Turn on the first connected phone bluetooth and another phone bluetooth which you want to connect. Than turn on device and previously connected phone atomatically connect to the device and after that without any delay connect the other phone u want to connect.

name: shubham pandey
title: worst worst worst product...
content: initially i thought that all reviews which are showing in amazon that it is not a good product....yes that were all true.. my initial impression that it was looking really very cheap...vibration motor is really horrible..it vibrates like that some is killing it...and vibrates by itself without any incoming call and if u pick up the call then it still vibrates .....again one of the major problem that bluetooth connection is also really bakwaas...fluctuate everytime...

name: Ak
title: Worst product
content: I recieved damage product means vibrartor doesn't work i notice that problem after 8days so can't complaint regarding that to amazon. Also it has connectivity problems. During call or any time it is disconnected.. Whatever device has connect. Also blootooth connectivity range not gud. I'm totally disappointed with that

name: pramod
title: Bad, Unreliable, Unworthy product
content: Have purchased this item, not once, not twice but thrice and every time the product has stopped working in a span of 2 months. The customer support can't do anything about it, LOL!! It's better to spend some more money and buy more reliable products from reputed brands, at least if something goes wrong, we can visit their support centres.

name: Russell
title: Don't Buy Please
content: After 10 days of normal usages it shows the problem. The blutooth connection is not working properly. I can't pair it with any device. Automatically turned off. Please don't buy this product. Even I can't call Boult Customer Service. They are Fraud.

name: Janardhan
title: Value for Money
content: Nice in-ear speakers. the bass is quite deep and sounds good. Overall the sound quality is good and a value for money. Need to check on the performance now.

name: Ravindra Kumar
title: Great for the price
content: Excellent earphones... Loved them... Sound is decent, bass is above average... Many people were complaining that sound is reversed in left and right channel, but I didn't observe this issue... Performance of the mic and Bluetooth range are fantastic..

name: Jayanthi
title: A perfect product for all the ages
content: A perfect product for people who spend most of the time in driving and who love to listen to the music for more time with less full charge timing..... Sound quality is perfect and best advantage about the expandable ear bands suits for all the ages... Need to improve the service all india wise since we only have Delhi location for any service issues

name: Pratap Bhosle
title: Great quality and customer support.
content: Great quality. Surprisingly, I got a call from there customer care asking for any product difficulties. Also they remind me of a cashback pending at amazon.. Will soon buy another one for my YouTube channel.

name: Asad Khan
title: Best Buy
content: Best product in this price range. Super quality sound and perfectly comfortable. The size adjustment of wire and the band are the most favourite part of this product.. But one thing to mention that in left ear it makes noise when we play music on full voice something like bass drum is flickering and about to break.

name: RAJNISH KUMAR SINGH
title: This product is ok but not good
content: The design is good nd very comfortable ear buds are very nice , vabrating future is good but volume button nd power on button is sounding when it's vabrates , according to price is good but sound is giving pain nd not pleasent sound nd bass is also not ok, improve the build quality, it gives feel of local product. Atleast make pleasent sound . It gives too much crowd sound quality

name: Akhilesh
title: Value for money - Best buy
content: I have been using this headphone for the past three weeks, I am totally satisfied with its performance. The best thing is the sound - awesome performance. Noise cancellation is perfect. Connectivity is also good.. The wonderful thing is the battery.. keeps going for more than two days with optimum usage of 5 to 6 hrs per day.. Nice sleek design and comfortable

name: bhushan
title: vibration mode not working
content: just yesterday i got the product but , i am excited about boult all feature , and in that specially vibration alert feature , but i am very disappointed with product , vibration alert not working , i try to call boult customer care , but his phone automatically disconnect , very bad service by boult , now think to exchange

name: Alpana
title: ok h
content: the left ear piece is defective and doesn't fit in ear properly.. don't know if this can be adjusted...if anybody can help...or should i return this...

name: Anirban
title: Product not switching on after 5 months
content: Product is faulty. Not switching on after use of just 5 months. Never used it outdoors.It keeps getting disconnected from phone and laptop. I have to used my old wired headset when in meeting.. This is not expected from Boult.. Never buy.

name: pawan
title: Flexible to wear and good sound quality
content: This is a very good product, flexible to wear, good sound quality, and easy to use. Just a point to note the wires come out to the earphone looks not strong enough to last long and vibration is too high that others around you can hear the vibration sound.

name: Braveheart
title: Faulty headset
content: I ordered this product by mistake however started liking it when used it for the first time however I observed that the vibration feature is not working when we receive the call. Requested amazon to return the product and refund the amount as I don‚Äôt want to invest again after having bad experience with a faulty product. Hoping to get the money back soon.

name: Nitesh J.
title: Wrost product voice issus
content: I am frustrated with this product, now it's not working properly within a 15 days. Its showing connecting with my phone but no song is playing in mobile and and also i am unable to hear voice.. Worst product. Amazon please suggest what i need to do.

name: Brahadees
title: Good earphones, but Neckband is short
content: Overall the quality of the earphones is good. But the neckband in this model is 1-2 inches shorter in length when compared to the wireless earphones of Boat and Boult. Also, the neckband is too thin.

name: revanth
title: Not as good as expected.

name: Tanay Sule

Theyre also extremely comfortable to wear and iv fallen asleep while wearing them a couple times. Battery life will last you a day with moderate use

name: Hemanth

Thankyou Amazon and Boult Audio for giving a good product.

name: Nikhil Goenka

name: Utpal Datta
title: Boult Audio ProBass Curve Neckband

Its a simple Chinese product which was not mentioned in the advt (at least I did not see that), Price was too high, even after the so called price cut, price is too high. The price should be not more than 7-8 hundred only.

name: Aniruth
title: Quality needs improvement - Not durable.
content: The plastic on the ear buds are very weak and they came apart in 6 months. Also the wires are not great. The wires wore out too soon. I would expect a headset at this price to last at least 2 to 3 years.

name: Shashidhar

name: N
title: Good but.

name: Venkata Subba Reddy Thadigotla

name: balakannan

name: The Great Mom

name: ABHISHEK GOUTHAM M B

name: Prasun Kundu

So overall the product is really good and I recommend it to go for it.

name: Melwin D'mello

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average

name: Customer
title: Decent Quality for the Money

So you have to look up on internet for basic guidance if you are the first time user!

name: Ajay Kumar

name: paviperiya
title: Waste product

Now my money gone.

name: Tarun kumar

content: I am writing this review after usage for more than 5 months. 15 days back one side of earphone stopped working.. So I contacted the bohot team. name: Shrey

title: Flexible Neckband. Amazing so far!

Earlier, I used to have problem while working out with wired earphones, but now I am able to focus more on workout.

name: suman nayek
title: Don't waste your money

Totally disappointed about this product..... Please don't waste your money for this worst items..

name: Bhargav dave
title: Quality issue while calling...
content: This product is defective for calling and excellent for listening media.. There is a major problem in calling.. Evenwhen Bluetooth is connected with device then also you dont get voice of call in earbuds and evenafter bluetooth connection you need to listen voice of call from phone's speaker.. Initailly i thought that this is single product defect so i replaced it but in new neckband also same problem i am facing so returned it

name: shanmuganathan
title: Received defective product. not working
content: Received defective product. I'm not able to switch on the product, I also tried charging it but the charging indicator also not responding.. I also noticed while unboxing that the box seal were slightly opened already, seal sticker itself looks old/dirty & already the wordings in sticker got worn out.. I need replacement.

name: Ujjwal Aggarwal
title: Issue with the product
content: The earphones didn't even switched ON. Initially, I thought they are discharged but even after 1 hr charging, I was not able to switch it ON. I raised a replacement request, hope the next one works fine.. 25th Oct: Got Replacement. Ear phones work fine and it is having good Bluetooth range. Sound Quality is also good.

name: Pankaj Mehra
title: Defective product received
content: Product is good, but found defective, left side sound coming from right side earphone and right side sound coming from left side ear phone. After complaining regarding the same to customer care center, they also told me that many of customer had faced same problem and suggest me to buy upgraded version of earphone i.e boult sport

name: Nagaraj Hegde
title: Best product you can opt in market
content: I was looking for good quality wireless headset for my long hour office meeting. quality of the product , clarity of the audio and mic output is really good. its been more than month and i have not see any issue. it keeps its charge for ling hour. so you can trust the product.

name: Mohit Vijay
title: Sound quality
content: Sound quality :. Sound quality in these earphones are amazing.. The mids are crisp and clear, the vocals are good the bass is also heavy.. Connectivity :. Pairing your boult with your mobile is very easy...just press and hold the power button on the boult untill you feel the vibration twice.. Battery: Battery backup is good.

name: shashank kumar
title: Review after 1 year of extensive use
content: Excellent product by amazon.. 1. dual connectivity.. 2. batter last for 2 days (after 1 year). 3. sweat proof. 4. excellent bass on proper connectivity with ear.\. MUST BUY Product far better than Boat product as well as oneplus Series....

name: Ashwathram
title: Don't buy.. No warranty and No Guarantee
content: When connected on phone the connection keeps breaking in between and when connected on laptop the other person is finding connection breaking while I talk, didn't face issue when connected through other device.. Add the product replaced once and raised warranty claim on the replacement (same issue occuring), no response from Boult team.

name: KR
title: I want my money back
content: TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED FOR NOT HAVING NOISE CANCELLATION.. I want to return these ear phones and I want my money back..‚Çπ.999 is a good amount and we will expect NOISE CANCELLATION.. Ear phones are also used for calling purpose along with listening to music. so Noise is must for any ear phones which are at this cost...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor performance
content: The products engineering and planning is not good, the on and off switch is along with volume switch. Second and most important the connection between the phone and the product disconnects automatically. Very disappointed.

name: ROHIT SANDAW
title: Boult delivered a bolt!
content: Worth every Rupee! This was a purchase that was made out of want as my fully wireless earphones was not trustworthy due to its standby charge duration. But am I happy!? These headphones were bang for the buck....great sound quality for Phone calls and for online gaming. Bass is nice and sound is crisp. The battery life is what sticks out and goes all day even with heavy usage.

name: Priyanka
title: Nice and comfortable earphones from Boult
content: Speaking of the delivery, it was well packed and received it before estimated time.. About the product, the noise cancellation is excellent which was the main feature I was looking for. Its bass quality is as depicted. Overall it is a good quality product among its peers.

name: Ritesh satam
title: Very very stupid product.
content: Yes..the product has a good sound quality, but it's not a quality product, i have purchased it on 20th aug. And..it stops working..after 15 days.,. I have tried the warranty option but the company never replying and also not attending the phone which is given on the warranty card.. Please don't purchase this...stupid product

name: Rajkumar Nandanbar
title: Best in this price
content: The sound quality is really amazing. I can hear every beat and bass quality is also good. Fitting is very comfy. Even in the helmet. It doesn't bother you while wearing the helmet. The noise cancellation is little weak. I got many complaints about the background sound from my callers. The best part of this product is it is so light weight that i don't feel any itching on my neck. I wear it my whole day unless i have to charge it or while sleeping. Overall best Bluetooth i have ever used.

name: Arthur
title: Good product, but BATTERY!
content: The product is great, but the problem is you might need to change the battery after a few months. It's not easy, but that's a way to reuse the product.

name: Lavanya N
title: Wow just amazing one go for itüòç

name: Arjun Biradar

Which will make u feel smoothens. Battery back up is also good, About 11 Hrs it lasts. I would recommend if you are thinking to buy wireless earphones. Then go with BOULT.

name: Vinod P V
title: Value for money. Good product

name: sanjay kumar sharma

content: this earphone is the best in this price range. sound quality is at top notch. bass is superb. music lovers definitely love this earphone. also i gave review of this earphone on my youtube channel tech gyan 4 you. so if u r interest in it or want to know more about this earphone then watch my video on my youtube channel tech gyan 4 you. thnx

name: Anay
title: Do not buy if you plan to walk or jog with it
content: The headline I have given to this review should summarize it all. Good battery life, decent sound quality, durable as well.... But... Literally 'sucks' on bluetooth connectivity. The sound/connectivity keeps breaking every few seconds when you walk or jog with this put on. So, you can use this headset for everything, except for the purpose for which you would buy a wireless or bluetooth headset!. Too much sarcasm I guess, but that's out of sheer frustration this thing gives. DO NOT BUY.

name: Rohan
title: Good at this price
content: Pros:. Sound quality is good.. Look is nice.. Comfort is fine.. Battery backup is good.. Cons:. Speaker case quality is very cheap.. Doesn't pair with Laptop

Throw it wayüòîüòî¬≤a‚Å∏

Although in box it was written green but when i opened i found it grey. something might had wrong with it. Atlas it is a good product.

name: Menaka Gupta
title: Good product
content: The sound quality is really good, the only problem I found is that the battery discharges pretty quick, Or maybe I need to get used to it more to see if it last longer.

name: Senthil
title: Flimsy, cheap make
content: The user at the other end complains of fan noise in my end.. Embarrassing.. 2) flimsy silk wire and it's protection.. Easily torn and it's price is less than 50% of what I bought.. Ima loser. Overpriced and flimsy cables

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy any product of Boult - Third class service
content: One of the worst companies in Earphones. Many issues in products from day one, auto disconnecting after few minutes, auto restarting any time. When I raised the Boult complaint, they ask me to come Delhi service center (from Pune). Amazon can provide the minus rating. I don't want to give a single rating to this company‚Äîthird class service by the boult.

name: shreeram
title: Boult will go a long way
content: Good Product at a very decent price, the only problem I found was with the fitting of the buds but it may be of my improper way of use as I have purchased it couple of days back. Will update if there is any issues, currently the rating is based on the audio quality, which I find good at the price.

name: Niraj
title: Budget wireless earphones
content: If you are willing to buy a budget and comfortable Bluetooth earphones then this will surely in your buy list. As with some pros and cons. Pro:. Good sound quality. Vibration is at height. Fit to neck. Cons:. Sometime it loses range. Bass should be more compatible. Overall good products to own. Thanks

name: Kalesha
title: Awesome product
content: I've been using it from weeks now and I think now is the time to give a review. I can tell you this that only weight you feel on your ears is of the sound of music, it is light as feather and battery life is amazing (I used it for more than 12 hours (5,6 hours ideal). Sound quality is good and I mostly use this for multiple devices and with my laptop it feels like its the best fit than wireheadphones. And for the price they are offering, this can't get any better. I'll recommend this product.

name: prudhvi_chowdary
title: Good
content: + This earphones are amaze with great sound quality & with good battery backup. + Bass quality is superbbbb. + Design is just okay. - The only thing i felt dissapointed with this earphone is slightly color is lost that made me feel like I'm using 2nd hand product.... - Noise cancellation is there üòÖ Wwwhhhaaatttt üò≤ü§Øüò± ?????. Noise cancellation mode is not working well it is not disabling any surrounding sounds not even 3bds.

name: raj
title: i love this.. really
content: bhot best hai battery sounds deep base quality awesome hai yar.. ankh band krk le skte ho mere pass do hai ek mera or achha laga to mne apne friend k liy ek or lia

name: Abhishek Singh
title: good but not that much
content: sound quality is good but the build quality is poor gives a cheap feel as compaired to other products of same price and the main problem is its wires. They are too small due to which the earbuds does'nt stay in ears for too long you can get a better product at this price.

name: Adarsh
title: Best earphone in this price range
content: I‚Äôd bought their model known as Boult Audio Probass Curve price 899 in sale . These are bass driven and exciting to listen. I have been listening them with my Iphone. If your a bass lover then you will really like these.Sound distinction is quite clear , clear vocals both male and female .battery backup is also good around 6,7 hours in this price range

name: Chirag Jain
title: Great Battery Backup and Sound Quality
content: Like any other mid range Bluetooth neckband this offers good sound quality and noise cancellation. Bass quality bis something you shouldn't expect with earphones at first place but this one is fine. But the important thing is playback time which is 12 hours and it do have close to 10 which is still amazing compared to other products with similar price.

name: Paramjeet Singh
title: The amazing experience
content: The sound is amazing.. The Bolt wireless earphone certification justifies the amazing sound.. The comfort and pairing is also really good.. All in all it is a really good product for the given price. A product at this price from Bolt is really a surprise.. Sound - 5/5. Pairing - 5/5. Comfort - 5/5. Charging and battery - 5/5

name: Baba
title: Grabbed in Lighting Deal....
content: Got in 999/- during summer schemes...so it's worth. Other wise no need to spend actual cost...Build quality average ....sound ok low bass.. battery life is ok. Would not recommend for specific music lovers....for daily usage it's ok...

name: Shayan Dasgupta
title: Boult Audio ProBass Curve - Amazing sound quality and reliable Bluetooth for seamless connectivity
content: I have been using Boult Audio ProBass Curve for around 2 days after purchase and I am pretty happy with the product. The sound quality is amazing, the Bluetooth connectivity has a good range as promised. It is a perfect audio companion for a hands free smart phone operation.

name: Jeril Joice
title: Good neckband at affordable price
content: The sound quality was good and was also bass. The noise cancellation is not too good. Noise cancellation was the only defect. The sound gain of mic was high. Overall performance of band was good.

name: Arpit Saxena
title: The two earpods have magnet that when joint acts as locket type and really helpful while travelling.
content: I am using this product for last 1 year . I am telling you that this is the best neckband earphone you can get currently in market .. The battery time is 20 hours and can be used without charging for 3 days if you use it for sometime in day.. Earplugs fits in ear perfectly and have high quality HD sound .. Also length is adjustable with your own comfort.

name: janak k.
title: Powerpack performance!
content: A really nice wireless earbuds with rich bass, treble and decent noise cancellation.. Bluetooth connectivity is also real quick! Only drawback i see is very limited color options. Overall this is one of the best wireless earbuds in this price range!

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't Buy
content: I bought one as it looked good seeing the reviews. But after using them for 2 days I faced connectivity issues and the mic stopped working on the third day.. I called for a replacement and the one that came already had its seal pack opened.. I used it any which ways. It took me 20 minutes just to connect it to my phone. Once connected, I realized the vibration option does not work. So I'm finally returning this product for good and buying a different brand

name: Pradeep Daniel
title: Very good battery life
content: Am writing this review I guess after two weeks of use. Battery backup is Amazing, there's no problem with connectivity as such but sometimes there's some disturbance while listening to music or on call ( mostly while in the parking lot)

name: Girish C
title: Battery backup not good, not working
content: Poor battery backup. Once it becomes 20% of capacity, the alert message comes and it gets switched off immediately. Stopped working after 2 months, downgraded rating

name: sanjiv
title: To not buy this product has quality issues
content: Whorst quality, many have quality issues. I bought 2 units not working. When checked on net about this product found many customers have similar complaint of the unit not getting charged after few days i.e.after 30 to 45 days if purchase. Amazon should stop this product immediately to avoid other customrrs getting fooled.

name: Surinder Singh Manhas
title: Like them alot never takes them off.

name: Abdul Sattar
title: Value for Money

It's almost one year(only 10days left) now, still the sound quality is same. I have never given a feedback twice on one product, but this product is so good after a year I can't stop writing.. It's worth to give 5star rating to this product.

name: Anitha
title: Worst Vibration

This issue is in the device I received today 26May2019. It may be manufacturer defect, so I raised a replacement request for the same. But there is no option for refund that's y raised replacement.. Dear seller, If possible pls check the device and send the proper working device or request you to refund. As I would like to order boat rockerz 255

name: ankit
title: High quality product
content: The product is nice, I gift it to my sister, the best thing about this piece is that it has the enormous battery life of 12 hour, I hardly need to charge it, sound quality is nice , better than the other in this price segments, looks are stylish, sturdy....... recommend to everyone who ars looking wireless handset under 2000.....thanks

name: Siraj
title: Boult Neckband not working in 10 days

Its Not charging up nor glow any lights for any signal and There is NO Proper support or response from Boult support team... very worst experience on this Online shopping.

name: Nagendra Kumar
title: Good one from Boult

name: Mohammed Iqbal Alam

On contacting the customer care after several attempts (as there IVR call mostly gets disconnected) for Boult they asked me to courier the product for tech check/exchange which costed me another 400 Rs. for a headphone which is 1400 Rs. worth.. Regretting buying this product and the replacement service.

name: Gopal Agarwal

Battery backup is good , sounds quality is also good

name: Simpi
title: Average cost, average quality, ok sound for music.

Battery backup lasts max 1 day after usage of 2 months.i usually use it for calling max period of time. The battery drops suddenly from 60% to 20%. I have never seen anything in between.. But it is ok for music. Ok types clarity, a lot bette than local bluetooth devices.

name: Bhanu
title: It's the worst product
content: I have purchased this product and in 2-3 days it's charge goes automatically down and than i replaced it and i got new one within one month it automatically shuts down even if it is fully charged and not starts until I plug it on charge then again the same problem again again I have fed up of this dont waste your money on this product

name: from hyd
title: waste of mobey
content: I took the device seeing the #Name & #Branding but very #Unsatisfied...it started troubling me from the very second day...when we asked for replacement customer care started ignoring the calls..never try to buy it as it is fake.. completely waste of money... Don't buy cheap products...

name: Gipson
title: Good
content: Review after using for few days. Pros. 1. Easy to use and pairs with mobiles without any delay. 2. Battery backup is very good 8 to 10 hrs of continuous play. Charge time takes 2 hrs though. Red light indicator while charging and blue light indicator while completed.. 3. Good noise cancelation and comfortable in ear.. 4. One click voice assistant.. Cons:. 1. Voice breaks during call occasionally even on close range 2 to 3 meter.

name: sourashis mandal
title: Good for daily commute || Bad for enjoying music
content: Product design is good but built quality suggest that it would hardly last the first week while traveling in railways.. Honestly speaking, its not for rugged usage.. Also the bandwidth covered and bass is below average.. It's good as a style piece, but for music lovers, they will hate.. Though fine and comfortable for calling purpose.. So just think before buying this.

name: Machani Ashok krishna
title: Nice product with super feasibility

Blue tooth connectivity is super ,beats high sound clarity, easily u can manage up to 3days. once u charged long last batter running min 8 hrs /day no wire damage flexibility super. Nice product from Boult happy from this product. But no vibration in band when phone calls comes

name: yuvanitin
title: Worst earphones

Cant file a complaint or claim a warranty. Post-purchase support is such a pain. My boat rockerz works fine even after 2 years of abuse. This is absolute crap.

name: Kapil

name: SK

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good budget headphone
content: Overall the product is good with respect to the price. It plays the music very well with good amount of volume. The bass is not rich and deep but u can still enjoy it. There is no noise cancellation unless you shove the earbud deep inside your ear to get the proper covering. For 1100 bucks its a budget headphone with Bluetooth in it.

name: Sanjith
title: It was an average product.
content: I like the built style but the quality is not that good. Sounds quality is not what I have expected. Noise cancelling is very good that is 110%. Bass quality is middle not so good not so bad. That's all. The people who are looking for good quality wireless earphones then I suggest you to buy "Oneplus bullet wireless z under rs 2000."

name: Abraham
title: battery life pathetic
content: The battery life as promised did not work after two or three months. Since three weeks it is totally dead or the battery remains only for 10 or 20 minutes. Actually I deserve a replacement, it is justice done to me by amazon and seller, otherwise I feel I am cheated by both.

name: Demugin
title: Review of new one
content: Packaging is not good. But It have good sound quality. Frequency is so weak. It can be easily distorted by wind. Bass is not bad just ok for the price. Noice cancellation is not good. Fitting in ear in perfect. In 1k -1.5k price range you can expect these features only. It's ok for this price range.. I'll write another review after 6 monthsüëç

name: Anish Kumar
title: Cheap build quality. Decent sound.
content: Sound quality and bass are okay. But build quality is really really bad. Cheap plastic and dis balanced neck band.. Boat rockers have comparable sound but much better and sturdy build.. Terrible response from Amazon on reporting the issue.. Being a long time subscriber I am very disappointed with Amazon service.. Avoid this product.

name: Mrinal Mandal
title: Overall product is decent.
content: Audio quality is decent. But the vibration motor was not powerful enough for alerts. Although i recieved a defective product but don't worry, Amazon will replace it.. Overall the sound quality of this earphones is decent.. And the matte finish was really great.. DISCLAIMER: don't buy!..if you buying it for vibration alert feature.

name: Nitin Saini
title: Average product
content: I buy this headphone by watching good reviews of it but when i use it i found its sound quality is average because previosly i used leaf prodcut but i return it due to range issue but that sound is the sound to enjoy the music and this is just for listen the music but I purchase it only for the reason that i need neckbend at the range of 1400

name: Haridas
title: Very good blue tooth headset, bass is not too much, which was my requirement
content: Very good blue tooth headset, bass is not too much, which was my requirement. Balanced sound output, which is very good. Battery backup too good and great.

name: RV
title: Bout earphones review!!!
content: Sound quality and bass is good. Very helpful as I can connect to two phones at a time and not to worry in missing a call. The vibrate function when receiving call is very useful. Nice battery back up too. Have already recommended the product to my friend and he too has placed the order.

name: Babloo Chaurasiya
title: It's good in performance and battery backup
content: I bought it almost 3 months ago, and it's working absolutely fine.. If you are getting at 999 then just go for it. But if you are looking for High quality base the I wouldn't suggest this better if you go for boat. Rest all things working fantastic.. The battery backup is very very good backup

name: Saraansh Narula
title: JUST AMAZING!!
content: All i can say about this is just amazing... All the the things that you can expect from the best earphones of very expencive brands are all in this. The sound quality, the built quality, the packaging, the design, etc. are all very very good.. Just praising about this product is not enough. If you are planning to buy a product with classic sound quality, fab bass outputs, fantastic magnetic earphones, then i can just say you all to buy it.

name: Ananya
title: In Love with it
content: Very comfortable to wear all day long.. Light weight. Dual pairing mode very useful which allows seamless experience. No doubts about sound quality...perfect bass ... neither too high nor too low.... totally awesome. Single charge lasts easily 1 to 1.5 days...on moderate usage..... Absolutely recommended in this price range!!üëç

name: Sahil Nikam
title: Worth it

Red means charging, and Blue means completely charged, actually what I wanted from a portable device, compared to other things where there is no indication of charging. And automatic shut down when battery is low and displays battery percentage on Bluetooth.

name: ASHISH
title: Not for people looking for powerful bass

name: Amazon Customer
title: Over all good product
content: Sound quality is good, design is good.. Suddenly left one is stop working ... But I filed online complain... they asked me to send the faulty one at Delhi service center through courier .. I have sent and got the acknowledgement, Might be new or repaired one will be recieved soon.

name: shad
title: Stylish and comfy to use
content: I am really enjoying the the boult audio curve bluetooth headphone.this time I got it with good sound quality and a good back up too..the noise cancellation is great and it's very convenient to use..would recommend it for sure..stylish and comfy..

name: parthibaan
title: Worst delivery
content: Product was good but the product was not working at first and when i replace this product i packed as how i received but with out looking inside the delivery executive shouted on road at my mom who gave the package packed by me.so better next time im not going to buy these accessories on amazon good bye amazon u sucks

name: Bhupesh Sharma
title: Awesome Eyerphone this price

name: Rashu
