I have another wireless of boult sound quality n connectivity is very awsome. Thats why I had make my mind to buy another product bt quality of this product of boult curve wireless is too pathetic. I think the product what I recieved that is not orignal product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Value for money!!!
content: Value for money. I am using for last 3 to 4 days. But don't found any major issue with this product. I like a bass in music. and sound quality is as per my expectation. So I like it. If you find this product below 1000/- during any special offer then buy it.. Go for it...

name: T K G NMBIAR
title: IT IS VERY GOOD, WORTH THE MONEY SPENT.
content: IT is a very good product. I am using it for a few weeks now. It is performing well, as expected. The BOULT AUDIO system is unique in performance. I think it is worth the money I have spent. Good. Keep it up. TKG NAMBIAR

name: Prijith Raj
title: For this money it's worth.
content: Product is good. Audio wise, it's good, not awesome but while considering the money range its awesome. Bluetooth range is decent for my use. Battery life is satisfactory for me as I don't continuously hear music for more than an hour.

name: Aniket Maurya
title: Product not working
content: Bluetooth disconnect automatically.After replacement power on issue.. Final return.

name: Saikat Modak
title: Huge connectivity issue.  Don't go 4 it
content: Quality is something that is not taken care of in this product. There are huge problems with the Bluetooth connectivity. It is not good and keeps breaking. At first I thought it was issue of buffering as I was playing songs from YouTube, but to test, I played a song after downloading it from the internet, but result was same.. Please do not go for it. Save some money and buy a better product.

name: Himanshu kumar
title: Just read it before you buy.
content: Hey! For all those who always read reviews before buying any product. Let me tell you about this in few sentences.. 1. Only buy if available less than 1000 rs.. 2. Don't expect better noise cancelling.. 3. Looks and design is best for this price range. 4. Sound quality is not better than a wired earphones that I bought a few time ago of boAt company.. 5. Product is genuine. 6. And last don't leave it for charging for a very long time

name: Jackie Sundar
title: Boult , the comfort
content: I have been using boult for 18 days. The battery, sound, comfort everything was good.. But suddenly it stopped working on 18th day. ON BUTTON fails to work. Now I couldn't use the device. Raised a complaint on boult offical site.

name: Vikram bhaliya
title: Music call
content: very worst quality please don't buy it price is hight I brought 1499rs. bettle you go boult cure all model it is very good .sound is good.this is not worth to buy.. bakavas product.

name: Nikhil kumar singh
title: Great battery life, water & sweat resistant
content: Boult Audio has amazing sound quality, balance of the sound is great. I have been using Boult Audio for last 4 months now so I wouldn't be able to tell you about the durability of the product but having said that it has worked the best for me while workout and even in leisure times. Wireless has good bass as well.. So I recommend to go for wireless headphones. But if you are looking for something in the lower price range they probably have some products in that range as well.

name: Paras
title: Totally Worth It
content: Was hesitant to purchase these mid level wireless earphones but these turned out to be pretty awesome. It has good build quality. The lock to increase or decrease the the length of the wire is pretty useful. Overall a very Good purchase

name: Rohan
title: Very nice product and value for money
content: I write this feedback after using it for more than a month... battery life is very good...sound quality is tremendous...sometimes a little uncomfortable after wearing it for long time...but overall the product good and value for money...I purchased it in 1300 rs.

name: Aditya Verma
title: Good battery and sound quality
content: After one month of usage I can say the product is really nice. The sound quality is good considering the price point. The battery backup is around 7-8 hours of continous usage at about 75% of volume. Battery charges in about 1 hour fully. Only issue here is with Bluetooth connectivity. It is phone if the phone is within 1 or 2 meters beyond that you will suffer with interference. Build quality is pretty decent. Overall a good product to buy considering the price point. Buy is you want great battery and good sound quality.

name: Amit yadav
title: Worst headphones
content: Don't buy this headphones this are worst its start giving problem when returned period over its hang and sometimes not power on until u connect charger for some time waste of money and i think amozon selling duplicate product privisoly i use this headphones buy from mayntra its last 2 year and quality is also good.

name: Tanishq Lakra
title: Happiest Customer of the day!

Bass is reallygood( more than I expected), Treble and Mid are also good!. Durability is also strong and it's very flexible üëå. Battery life is greatttttt....... ! Worth the money!!

name: Amazon Customer

name: Anandhu

The magnet works but the wire keeps twisting and making loops.. All over rating will be 2.5\5.

name: Amazon Customer

Couldn't return this product since material i received after 3weeks because of lock down, during this time material return period is over. So i lost my money.

Overall, you must buy it if you just want it for regular use.

name: ash

title: Good Bluetooth set within best price
content: Product design is good.sound quality is very impressive.configuring the Boult with other products is very easy.i am very satisfied with this product and I will recommend this to others.thank you Boult.

name: Ashish Saikia
title: Stereo sound | sweet proof |Secure fit
content: Excellent product... I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment... Design and build quality:- looks are very premium and light when you wear it. Its very much flexible and buttons are well responsive.. "Sound quality":- really sound quality was very impressive and clear.. "Bass quality" :- awesome.

name: Mangala Singh
title: Best Bluetooth earphone within Rs 1000
content: One of the best Bluetooth earphone available in the market below Rs1000.. Pros: Very good Design, sound quality, bass, Noise cancellation, Battery life and quick charge.. Cons: Earpiece connecting cable is very delicate.

name: Nilesh Bhor
title: Good sound quality
content: Average build quality,. Sound is good but starts breaking on high volume.. Bass is good but not best.. Do not have FM support.. Amazon delivery was fast with prime membership.

name: Amit Kajale
title: Promising new brand
content: I was skeptical at first to try brand. But I gave it a shot and I found it pretty good.. Battery is fantastic. Charge time is less.. I feel Boult will give tough competition to rivals.

name: Romy
title: Seal broken

name: NAGZ
title: Okay

name: Vicky kumar
title: Not for gaming. .  very late responce, battery down within 4hr. .  its worst

Sound quality is great but very slow response approx 1 second delay to hearing. Also the wire quality is disgusting .. Thankyou

name: Naveen S
title: Product damaged and not working

Very bad experience. I choose amazon because of good product quality and timely delivery. I am surprised at this point of time. Really disappointed with the product quality

name: VENKATASANTOSH

name: prabhumathivanan
title: box seal is broken ..

name: ANIL KUMAR
title: Boult Audio Probass curve Bt Headfone is one of the Best Headfone 8 out of 10 in over all Rating

name: DKS
title: Long user review

I have been searching for the long user review for buying this,so I thought it will help someone

name: Utkarsh Tripathi
title: Left side system stoped working.
content: Review. 1.With in a month left hand side system is not working.. 2.I have complain them through mail no respond from there yet.. 3.Customer number is not responding.. 4.Not found any service center near by me.. It's in warranty period any can help me ? How to connect with Boult so it can replace or repair it?

name: Parth Bathia
title: Great Product!!!
content: This is a really good product. Have been using it for quite some time. Have not found any issues till date.. The company also gives prompt replies if any issues occur in the product.. I would definitely recommend going for this headphones.

name: Shuvayan Biswas
title: Best neckband under 1000 rupees. Go for it.
content: The sound quality is good and the mids and lows handled well. Though it's a bit extra bass than my liking. But bass heads are sure gonna love it. The value proposition of this product is better than anything in this price segment.

name: Ankita Shrivastava
title: No vibration feature :/
content: I'm giving 2-stars because I bought this earphones just because of its vibrating feature. There are many other products in market of similar range and better quality which don't vibrate while incoming call or while starting the device but when I received it, the feature was missing. When I wear the neck band and on it I don't get any indication whether it is started or not. I'm highly disappointed because of this. Apart from that sound quality is fine.

name: Hema Sarathy
title: Value for money
content: Great Product. Easy connect, decent sound quality and buiid. Long battery life.. Used one full day and had still 60% charge left

name: sivakumar
title: Boult Airbass Tru5ive pro
content: I bought boult curve and I'm not satisfied with that, but I bought this buds which is really good it support AAC and call quality also decent.

name: Tanmay P
title: Boult Bluetooth Headphone Review after using 1 week
content: After reviewing all the headphones under 1500 i chose Boult & it's totally worth it, believe me or not but it's my personal opinion looks, color, battery life, and bass totally awesome, Satisfaction Level üòç‚ò∫Ô∏è

name: nilesh shukla
title: Defective product
content: I had buy this headset on 7th May, it was very good product but it has a problem that today I was not getting connected to my mobile device I found it could be some problem it will get connected with switching off and know my mobile but still it is not connected. Then I try it on some other Mobile device but it is not showing devices after a certain period of time. I wanted to return it but my return period is overtime help me with this.atleast give a replace for this product out will be very helpful

name: Dalip bora
title: Value for money
content: Hi, I am writing this review after 20days of usage. I'll give 5/4.7 battery back up was nice and the sound quality is awesome in the price range. My office has a neckband trends nowdays and most of them have 2k to 2.5k range neck band but out of them my was really decent. I'll suggest it's a value for money.

name: Shrejeet Gupta
title: All together good as budget wireless headphones
content: At price I got this it is worth to buy, sound quality is good at mid range but gets distorted at high range. Bass is good and strong, easy to connect and battery life is also satisfactory. The only issue dur to which I have given 3 star is it's right ear piece not fits well, I tried all earplugs but none fit well

name: Mukesh Kumar
title: Noice cancellation not good but all are good quality.
content: The sound quality of Boult audio probass curve pro is very good and its battery backup is also very good.It gets a 3-day backup and good neckband and can be folded and kept in the pocket.The only drawback is that it is That the noise cancellation is not good in it.If the noise cancellation was good then it would have been very good.

name: Varun Mangla
title: Earphone for on the Go life
content: I really like the product. I'm not that great music enthusiasm but it fulfills all my requirement like music for jogging, gyming, studying.. The best part of all of this, now I don't have to fight with earphone wires.. The call function is good and the addition of Google and Cortana assistance also become handy. The material is flexible so it requires less care and battery backup is also great

name: Pawan Padwal
title: Well designed with quality casing
content: Good product at this price range.. Key features which I liked:. 1. Well designed buds that do not slip off while jogging and exercising.. 2. Fast charging. 3. Quality of casing and buttons. 4. Better sound quality

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unhappy
content: Got defective product.. Requested for replacement.. PATHETIC PRODUCT IT IS .. TODAY ONLY I GOT THE REPLACEMENT OF THIS PRODUCT AND AGAIN I RECED DAMAGED PRODUCT . AS PER THEIR GIVEN DESCRIPTION ITS NOT VIBRATING AS I M RECEIVING CALLS AND CONNECTION LOOSING WHILE WALKING. BATTERY ALSO GOT OVER IN 2 HRS . IT IS PROMISING 33 FEET RANGE BUT THAT IS ALSO FALSE IN 15 FEET IT GET DISCONNECTED.

name: Aishwarya
title: True to its claims!
content: It's been about a month of regular use with Bluetooth connectivity on for about 6-8 hours/day.. No complains. I have to charge it every 3 days or so.. (Usage : Primarily used for handsfree calling)

name: Ravikiran
title: Noise
content: Noise and disturbances are coming during call

name: Amazon Customer
title: Defective product received from seller
content: Received defective product from seller, power button not working..it works only when keeping the charging cable... Seller has to give the defect free product..

name: Govind C
title: Overall

In terms of connectivity, the audio is good even in different rooms it can handle one or two walls. Battery easily lasts a day.

name: A S G Sankaram
title: Perfect Review for a Perfect Product
content: A nice Product for Listening to Music, Calls.. StandBy Duration is Wonderful and also backup for calls and Music is Satisfied.. SOUND QUALITY IS Good.. BASS Quality is Satisfactory.. Noise Cancellation Is Acceptable. Thanks For a GOOD PRODUCT

name: iambala
title: Value for Money product
content: If you want a decent Bluetooth Headphone under a reasonable price range, please go for this one.. Lasting for a day under regular usage.. Buy @ 999 or lesser.

name: Prudhvi
title: Just go for it
content: Good bluetooth range.... LED indicators and indicator sounds.... Good sound quality.... Good battery life.... The plug-in ear phones are very comfortable.... Cheapest and best in its class...

name: Mahuya Deb
title: Satisfied

I would like to request boult to look into the matter. Satisfied

name: Poonam G.

name: Jaya Chandresh J
title: Worth for money!!!
content: I am writing this review after 3 days of usage.. I feel the Stiffness of neck band is slightly higher than the normal cable. But it is not a big problem in its performance. Sound quality is good for music and call. Mic also works fine for mobile and also for computer too. Over all this product gives justification for this price.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product with value for money
content: This is a really good pair of headphones(or earphones) with really good sound quality. But the piece I received was faulty as the power on button stopped working after a few weeks. We contacted the customer care and they replaced it for us. Now it is working fine.

name: SANJAY BHATIA
title: Not recommended due to Poor Sound quality.
content: The sound quality is just like a local earphone, it's not at all clear. Only positive is, it fits well in the ear. I tried to return the product, but only replacement option was there. Product was replaced, but has same quality. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR PURCHASE.

name: Tejas r.
title: Go for it but read my review first....
content: Battery backup is really good and sound quality is also good as expected but customer care service is very bad, I have launched the complaint for replacement due to mic problem also I have couriered the product to customer care but behalf of replacement, they send the same product without any repair and replacment so think once before buy.

name: Daniel
title: Know your utility before you buy it..
content: After so much review checks and comparison, finally I made my purchase. I would say, it is value for money. I am a kind of person who would prefer to attend calls hands free. 8/10 for calling experience ( noise cancellation is not that good). Sound quality is pretty good for both calling and for music/movies etc. Good battery backup. Great connectivity. Verdict: Lacks a little bit on calling experience, but a decent gadget for music lovers.

name: Shivangi chhonkar
title: Best buy in this range
content: I bought it for office purpose I was suggested to buy 1+ z series but I bought it it is working good it has been 4 months and it's has amazing backup it works for more than 24 hrs in one go when fully charged. I am happy with this product . Thou it's sound quality is not very good but still I rate it as good sound quality.

name: Naveen
title: 5 star product. Useful in all conditions.
content: Its a nice product with good noise cancellation and clear sound. Its very comfortable and battery life is awesome. Its can withstand upto 10hrs of usage when charged fully. Bluetooth range is around 8-9 mtr which is also above expectations. I do gyming and running while wearing them and they don't pull off from my ears. ipv5 water resistant makes it a great buy. Overall a nice product at this price bracket.

name: SADDAM HUSSAIN
title: Product Damage after 2 days uses..
content: After 2 days use Product not working, it's totally damage within 2 day's uses, it's no responding,need to improve Products quality and stability..üëéüëéüëéüëéüëéüòûüòûüòû. But Amazon Service is Too awesome and superior,there is no doubt, thanks Amazon plz recommend quality products..

name: Meenakshi
title: Superb ear phones
content: Everything is superb about this product. Superb buy. Except that the user Manuel was missing and I had to take extra efforts to get an e copy of it Too good for the price

name: Sudhir Rai
title: Charging cable defective, quality ok..ok don't think it will last long
content: Charging cable provided not working , using my phone charger to charge it .. is it a kind of service you give to customers , product build quality is also not satisfactory. My wife have thrown the package otherwise I would have returned it back

name: PRANAY
title: Best best and best
content: Really good and durable. I purchased it second time, gifted first one to brother. This is really good. Sound quality is really good. You can connect 2 devices at a time.l connect laptop and mobile both.. No doubt it has a great bass and to a great extent noise cancellation and decent sound clarity and mindblowing battery backup

name: yaswanth
title: Very good product
content: Sound quality (music) is ok. Battery is good infact very good(I'm listening in low volume). Call quality is pretty awesome pound and clear for me and for other side but if ur in a noisy atmosphere it will not be audible for the reciever end. Sometimes ear hurts ( depend on individual). Overall a very good one 3.85/5

name: Abhishek Sisodiya
title: Against neckband, product is OKish
content: Nothing wrong with the product but it's me, who HATES ANYTHING ON MY NECK. Neckband sucks for someone like me.. Boult has good sound, adjustable wire, good fit buds.. Although bass is bad, wire is thin, over all product built quality is cheap plastic.. All cons were ok for me cause it has BT 5 which means no lag and latency issue, good range, pubg ek no.

name: Bharath
title: Worth every penny
content: Charges super fast, I am getting approximately 7-8 hours of non-stop music / audio. Pairs instantly and vibration helps a lot for calls. Band is very flexible and earbuds have a good snug fit. Value for money. Great product

name: Ramesh
title: Superb Boult Curve
content: I have received my Boult Curve. Its really awesome, sound quality is so good. The chances of breakagr of wires is less due to adjustable support provided for the wires Totaly I am happy with the product purchase. Out of 5, I will give you 5.

name: Amazon Customer
title: good customer support
content: Bought for my sister... She loved it... When the device felt like having some issue in btwn, I raised a warranty claim and the response was prompt. But luckily there wasnt any issue with the device and its working proper..Hope the same support will continue even if there is a requirement for raising warranty claim...

name: Yash athwani
title: Battery heating issue
content: Writing this after 3days of usage. First 2days it was working fine the sound is ok battery life was good...bt on the 3rd day i faced some issue with the charging port and after that I've charged it for just half an hour the battery show's 100% on my phone.. bt just about 15min it says battery low...and the neckband was heating... Boult audio plz check your products before sending it to customer...all thanks to Amazon for the replacement.

name: Vaz
title: Not impressed
content: No bass at all, why the name Probass god only knows? Frequent disconnects or garbling even when keeping it in pocket. Not satisfied. Charge time and batter backup is the only good thing. Go for others.

name: Kruthik Tr
title: Bang for the buck!!

Build quality is great. Will surely last a year with rough use.. Overall good product. Start looking for an expensive earphone if you care about sound quality though.

name: Kaushik
title: Its ok
content: Product is good in terms of budget but doesn't fit properly in ear lot of inconvenience while handling it. Calling sound clearityis very good, volume is too loud while listening music. It is just a day I have used so need to give more time for rest of features like battery backup n quality

name: Dr.uma shankar sharma
title: cheater company
content: It is the most pathetic product that I have ever seen on Amazon. I bought this on 14sep last date for return was 21 sep, this product stopped working on 22sep. No reply from boult support system. Kindly dont buy this.

name: vishal  wagh
title: Very Nice sound , Good

Material of the earphones look like a low cost plastic or something just like that . Also Bluetooth is not able to detect in 2 meter distance , the earphone stop playting the sound .

name: Manoj Haswar
title: A good product overall

Only one issue I faced in the previous one was that the ear plug cables were of bad quality and the external black insulation has peeled off. The ear plugs are now attached with the help of the two thin wires that actually carry the current.

name: DIPANSHU
title: GOOD

Its a 100% worth product.. The only thing is Material Quality should be little low grade should be upgraded.

name: Divyesh
title: This is a Very Good product below 1.5k

name: trin
title: As compared it is the best in this price range
content: As compared it is the best in this price range.. Pros:- Standard design, Better battery backup, better music experience compared to JBL,Mi (But it may annoy for long listening). Feel the freedom using a wireless headset. Cons:- Few guys told me their concern about clarity issues while making calls, Slightly inconvenient wearing it on the public place

name: Ria K.
title: Doesnot get charged
content: bought it with such high hopes..but after 1 usage it just could not get charged ,within 10 days of buying .I requested refund but they said its not returnable ...it was replaced...worked for some time and today again unable to charge it ...if a product cannot be used worth its money ..whats the use....please think before buying ...

name: Sai Kumar
title: Budget headphones
content: There is no return for this product, only replacement...if it doesn't fit we can't return the product think before you order

name: Nikhil mhala
title: Good budget Headphone (I got it for 999/- only)
content: Pros:-. 1) Good battery life. Lasts up to 7-8hours.. 2) Good Bluetooth connectivity.. 3) good mike.. 4) Can connect to multiple devices. (i have tried it with iPhone and MacBook air both connected simultaneously ).. Cons:-. 1) Auto-connect is not reliable.. 2) it is made up of plastic. so build quality is a concern. (purely depends on prices and user's view)

name: YOGESH
title: Simply awesome ü•∞

name: Sagar
title: Amazing earphones
content: Earphones are comfortable to wear. Bass is just awesome, feels like home theater in the ear. Quality is good. Sound is precisely clear. The earphones are definitely recommended.

name: Harsh Apte

name: Ajay
title: Long battery life
content: After using one Month I'm writing this review,. The Quality of an Earphones was Excellant Sound quality was Simply superb, Connectivity to the device very easy and very simple on & off, Volume controls & Call pickup buttons working perfectly and very comfortable wearing, fast Charging, long battery life...

name: MK
title: Honest Review
content: Sound quality is great but when you use it @100%, it starts make unpleasant sound quality.. Battery was good enough for complete day.. Connectivity is great around 10m I guess.. Well after 6 months one side stopped working and CO-VID19 happened now my warranty is expire, otherwise product was really good

name: Customer
title: Overall it is very good for all age groups
content: The audio is brilliant with great noise cancellation and has a sleek body with soft material used, it is light weighted and durable. The ear pieces are metallic and can be fused magnetically. The wires of ear piece are thin, but can withstand some degree of tension.

name: s k Singh
title: Not satisfactory
content: I have purchased two pc ,both having problem not getting on.no service centre in pune.customer have to send to Delhi by their own cost,so what is the meaning of warranty,don't purchase

name: VS Ramachandran
title: Good sound quality
content: Sound quality is good as is the noice cancellation. Good for long hours. I am using it for almost more than a month. Nice gadget. Only issue I saw was that when it reaches 50% power it gives notification of low battery.

name: Consumer right
title: Stop working after 20 days, lost my money
content: Don't buy this product, after 20 days of use it stop working, it can't be get charged or get ON. After 10 days of purchasing from amazon I lost return policy., as its still under warranty now I hv been contacting Boult India cust. Care from 3 days, their cust. Care service is fake. Belive me. Seems like I lost my 1500rs.. So please beware

name: Tarachand nama
title: Battery life

name: Amazon Customer

Don't know whether they are just manipulating by mentioning customer support no. N showing good no. Of service centers in India. Request Amazon to look into this and do the needful at earliest.

name: Amazon Customer

Also it hs adjustable wire which you can adjust as per need, i hve attached photo. On prime offer i got for 999.

name: Abinash Mishra

name: Varma
title: Good product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy...!

name: ishan_patel

name: ANEEL
title: Worst product

name: Dr.Ashutosh S.
title: 2 star quality.
content: Voice quality is good but every now and then gets disconnected during a call. Also no notification sound if battery is exhausted and headphones get disconnected. Suddenly gets disconnected. Only keep getting message if battery is low.

name: Rishah
title: POOR MIC YOU HAVE STICK IT ON YOUR LIPS and LOW BATTERY LIFE

name: Mukesh Andhalgaonkar
title: Good Service

As of right now, I think Boult Audio offers more value to the customer than boAt if your priority is sound quality over durability

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth spending money, but you may receive multiple unnecessary calls
content: Product is good.... But you will receive many calls asking you to review the product and send the screenshot of the same. They ask your whatsapp number and paytm number saying that you will be rewarded for writing a good review.. They won't stop calling you till you send the screenshot!

name: vikkyadithya01

name: S Mahesh
title: Average sound with good batteries
content: This is a average earphones with good battery life .. Bass is also average , era fitting is very good .. But it start paining after 1 hour use ..brought it @899 so I can bare with all its con's...

name: Murugesh
title: Worst Head set
content: Bought this Headset Six month back, now it's not working and worst customer care support. They asking us to courier the defect and again they send another defective product to us. Even in warranty period they are trying to repair the product not replacing the product. Don't buy this .

name: Sriram Storm
title: They Sold defective product, I wasted 1500‚Çπ for defective not working earphones . Feeling sad

name: Ishu kumar

name: Preetham Raj

name: aditya

content: The neckband is good. It has good quality of bass,and sound is more crisp.. Pros-. Good bass. Nice fit. Magnetic earbuds. The battery life is good lasts about 7-8 hours may depend on your volume level.. Cons-. The treble level is too high when we listen in high volume. All over the product is good and you can buy it for sure..

name: Om S.
title: Very good and comfortable.
content: Sound quality is very nice. Bass quality also very good. I am 95% Happy to buy this product. Overall very good quality product it is!

name: Maulik
title: Gone in 15 days
content: Not a good experience. After only 15 days, the earphones are not working properly. The issue seems to be the battery. It's dead. When charging, they work and as so OK n as I remove the charger, they stop.. I got them for my gym workouts - and this doesn't serve that purpose.. I will try and get a replacement - let's see how that experience goes.

name: Rajesh pabari
title: Good sound and good product with few cons
content: Battery drains super fast once it touches 60 percent and drains lightening fast from 30 to 0.. Next band and wire could have been better and stronger for rough users.

name: Vishal Andhare
title: Worst , Dont Buy or use
content: The product is cheap and has worst built quality. Zero star, dont buy or use even if you get free. Ear cushion can hurt your ears and it leaves bluetooth connections in between. Also they are fraud will ask you to rate 5 star by calling again and again , dont entertain their calls.

name: Vijay
title: Product is Good
content: Overall it was supub but it's vibrat when someone calling if I sailent the phone / ringer then also it comes vibrating and it's irritating otherwise the product is very good.

name: AP
title: Great product
content: Super bass, great sound. Enjoying the music. Usage after one week... super battery backup lasts for apprx 10 hrs.

name: Godfrey Dalmet
title: Freedom from wired headphones
content: The new ProBass Curve is outstanding. Charge it for an hour and next few hours be hastle free of Charing it. Mic is good enough volume features are awesome.. The best thing about this product is its lightweight you don't feel anything on your neck and long-lasting battery. It's a thumbs up product to all the people who workout in gym or play outdoor games.

name: Sathish Kumar J
title: Bad
content: Warranty and service are not good, we need to send defective product to them as other brands do self pick-up.

name: Panky K
title: Advice to buy! Good value for money !
content: Good value for money. I'm getting bluetooth range 20-25 metres approx. Bass is a bit low. Ears friendly. Neckband is very flexible (Good). Wire quality is good. No cons is this price range.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Claiming warrenty is hectic
content: Worked fine for first 3 months but not long lasting, claiming warranty is very hectic as there are no service centers in South india. They only have service center in Delhi.

name: Karthik
title: Must buy
content: Very good sound quality, good comfort and fit. Sound quality is also good at this price range ,a must buy product for neck band lovers

name: Manish Madhukar
title: Decent. Does the work required.
content: For its price it is good. Does the job. Buttons are hardy. Duration is decent. I have headphone of Boult which is giving me nice service. Hence decided to try this one too. Earlier I had bought one of patron but its button were a pain. Switching it on and off. Pretty happy with this one.

name: Soumyadip Dey
title: Not a good product.....check another item
content: The sound and bass quality is not good guys.......i already return this prpduct for it's preformenc.... At high volume it does not produce clear sound...and it's range is not 10 mt..... Totally wrost product at this price...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Buy!!
content: I am giving this review after using this recently purchased Boult wireless earphones for a month.sound quality,battary life is good.. One should go for this product in this budget.

name: Abhijit
title: BassBlasting Product!!! Awesome experience..
content: Really worth in this costing. The quality of bass, sound is really nice.. Best part is easy to handle, earphone wires are coming from back side and going directly into ear with short wire. Not like other earphones where they are hanging with big wires on chest.. After my first experience, I also bought for my husband.. Thanks Boult.

name: sashi raj p s
title: The Best
content: Totally satisfied with the product for the price. Great battery life. Bqss quality is awesome. Noise cancelation is too good. Sound quality equally balanced and fit in ear perfectly without any challenge. Feather weight. Easy to control and very handy.

name: Ankita
title: Amazing Product
content: 2 days of use, and I really have nothing to complain. A flawless product from Boult. Got it for 1099 in amazon Great indian festival. Buy it if you in need of a great budget wireless earphones. Working out is great, it sits firmly in your ears. No complains soo far. Great work team Boult.

name: Anuj adhruj
title: Waste of money to buy this product
content: Worst product the battery doesn't not even 2hours after 2 months...it doesn't work as stated,u will fully charge it if use on the go then it will work on the same day but if you thought u'll charge it today nd use it tomorrow it's not gonna work,you have to charge it again nd after 3-4 months u will not able to charge it..

name: prashant
title: Dont waste your money.
content: Pathetic product and total waste of money(Save Yours). *Sound quality is too bad with no bass. * Bluetooth connectivity works like Infrared connectivity.. * Company manupulate customer to give ++reviews by gifing movie coupons so as to hide their worthless product.. Dear Boult/Amazon. My returned item is still untrackable :-(

name: Vivek Chaubey
title: Using Boult Probass Curve..A best neckband in market
content: Product review after using 08 days. The Boult probass curve is best bluetooth Neckband in all.. Price is reasonable n Voice calling quality is just awesome, if u r music lover go for it.u will not disappoint n I m enjoying my Pro bass. Noise cancellation is also better than others. Ankh mund ke lo yaar..u will be in benifit..

name: Prashant
title: Wastage of money
content: Wastage of money. I had purchased it on 16 May 2019. In July 2019 it's main button (power on/off) stop working then I had send it to the repair centre of Boult after 15-20 days I received after repair. Now again in August end same problem occurred again and I am not able to start or use it. Totally wastage of money.

name: Sunil Rawat
title: Good product at a reasonable price üëç
content: Look and feel of the product is quite good. Audio quality and battery life (of real world 10+ hours) both are pretty acceptable, especially keeping the asking price in mind.. Overall, I would say Boult Audio Curve is a good value for money option...

name: SAGAR WAVHAL
title: Worst service
content: The product sent to me is defective and not working since January 2020....i purchased the product in September 2019.... Worst service by the company... I have sent them 8 e-mails but no revert except automatic reply on email.

name: Lalit Shekhawat
title: Value for money
content: User friendly, very good sound & bass quality, long battery life which easily last for 2days. Best part is it automatically gets turned off if not connected to any device for some time so saves battery on its own. Light weight- one would not feel heavy on neck. Magnet works fine on earphones. Review after one month usage.

name: Ananda babu saravakota
title: Good one.. it's been 10 days..nice experience
content: So far it's good product for the price range..good sound quality..calling is Lso good..pairing s. Has no issues . ..will try to update after long term..go for it.i would say

name: Nafih Hassan
title: Decent earphones for an affordable price
content: Boult Pro bass Curve is really good earphones at this price tag. The sound quality is really nice,have decent noise cancellation and the bass is extremely good. The build quality is nice and the earphones fit extremely well in the ears.. Overall this product is worth buying and wouldn't regret this decision.

name: Swapnil
title: no return available , connectivity issue within 2 days of delivery
content: no return available for this product. For replacement too amazon wont provide pickup facility . I has to courier this and need to bear courier charges .. very Bad quality product. Voice break frequently and gets disconnected while on calls.

name: Gaurav
title: Good quality product

name: Viswa
title: Light weight with good sound... Seems worth and in a parallel with best headphones

name: Raaj
title: Best for its price.
content: Intially i was provided with open box piece,then opted for the replacement.. Overall performance is good.! Battery life is best in its segment.i bought it for a 3 digit price in a festive sale for this its is the best value for money. Can easily connect 2 devices at atime

name: Sasank
title: Good for use in terms of its value
content: Sound quality is good...bass effect also there and battery life is preety good...good connectivity with blutooth for music & call...As i got warrenty card and movie voucher having barcode & website id, where i gave all the details of mine but i dont received any message or mail in return...is this original product??

name: Chandru Pendyala
title: Value buying

name: Srinibas Sahoo

name: Md fayaz khan
title: it's a awesome product...
content: its a verygood product by boult, built in quality was super, sound and bass are very clear and extreme good to hear, noice cancellation for phonecalls are simply super, it'll fit ear and very comfortable.. battery life is awesome one time charge can be used upto 4 to 5 days....overall its awesome

name: anets jose p
title: Good call quality
content: I used this for 2 weeks. Good sound quality. Clear sound. Good bass. Nice design. Length of neck back could have been a little bit more. Call quality need a special mention. Realy good. Range is good. Overall a good product.. I felt some dificulty in registering warranty of this product.

name: Ashokkumar

name: Sachin

At last , I felt it's a leftover product I received, from Amazon.. I had to return the product.

name: Certified buyer
title: Value for money

name: Jitendra singh
title: Excellent product

name: Tarun Kundnani
title: Bestest ear Phone

name: Avinash More

name: A K Sharma

name: Mohit Wadhawan

name: Chandrashekar G
title: Not as expected. Brand name getting defamed

name: Sham Sonar
title: Comfort and Quality

They are really comfortable. They fit perfectly in-ear. Sometimes I even forget I am wearing them. Their sound quality is the best. Thank You, Boult

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Quality Product
content: Good comfortable flexible featherweight neckband. Sound and balance in both ears are good, Small size earplug can be easily worn under helmet( while driving is not to use phone), pairing is also easy, decent vibratory alert. I found rang is over 8 meters. Overall it is too good for me.

name: Amazon Customer
title: A Good Purchase.
content: We experienced some issues in sound quality, especially during voice calls. However, ice we informed them, they resolved the issue in a speedy manner. Regarding comfort, the buds are a lot more comfortable than expected. A good deal for the price.

name: Vinod Verma

name: R. K. Singh

name: Imran

name: Traveller
title: Worst product

name: SHASHANK
title: Good

name: Maahi
title: Sound & battery life
content: Boult... Have become huge fan of these bluetooth earphones üòç. Its looks classy n is also light weighted... Easy to use... Sound and bass quality is superb.... name: Ravi Jain

name: basant

name: Mayukh Bose

name: skynet

name: vijayendar.reddy

Anyway overall quality of the product is best. I like it. Its a good product in this price range.

name: Amazon Customer

I really wanted to return it.. Is it possible to replace it?????. While using it for a mobile with dual sim, it vibrates only for a single sim For the second sim you need to swipe the mobile screen to attend and to end a call.

name: Uday

name: Amazon Customer

name: Amazon Customer
title: Sound quality is just OK and bad for calling

name: RC

name: Andrews

Be it flexibility or long-lasting battery, sound quality - noise cancellation ,soul-reaching bass quality or Passive Noise Cancellation,you can't say no to the magnetic performance of Boult Curve.Truly Amazing !

name: Abhi Gujar

name: Vishwas Kushwaha
title: Good product and great service.
content: This is a good product. I have used this product for more than a year now and it's still working fine. There was a problem in between but I sent the product back to the company and they repaired/replaces my product and sent back to me. Overall the product is worth your money.

name: Rajath
title: Not up to the mark
content: The sound quality is not good as per the price of it sounds hass at the high range of sound. The Bluetooth connection is not so good it is last up to the only 2 meters, up to the mark I suggest realmi earphonesbluetooth...........

name: razeen
title: Exceptionally Good & Worthy
content: Bought the product at a price tag of ‚Çπ999/- ,I feel like it's the best choice at this range.. Sound Quality & Bass is decent, Bass is not so punchy but still deliver's best. Noise isolation is okay for the price we are paying for.. Earpiece comfortably fit's into ear and the neckband lie down perfectly around the neck without any disturbance.

name: Khasim jan
title: Better than the best.
content: Good product. These products can increase emage of Amazon. Very good battery work, very good sound quality, very good bass. Overall performance is better than the best.

name: Hrudayendra
title: Worth it!!!
content: Its quite impressive at this price range, overall sound quality is superb. Connectivity is great doesn't take too long to get connected to the device. Bass could have been better. But the sound is crystal clear no distortion in the audio quality even if the volume level is at the max level.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor product design
content: Couldn't have wasted my money better in selecting this having read stupid reviews. The ear plugs never fits in properly and falls off every time. It never sticks around the neck and one of the ends of always falling off. Bluetooth disconnects frequently and audio stops.

name: George Alex
title: A good bang for the buck.
content: Best Bluetooth earphone in this price range. I bought it for around 1100 bucks and it's totally worth it . Good sound quality and noise cancellation. Gives amazing battery backup too. Overall a very decent product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Low price bass heavy
content: Main thing you need to know about the earphone is that it is on the bass category. Sound quality is good but not the best. Also I have notice some time there is connecting problem and in gaming there is a lag sound and action most of the earphone out there is like that I think it is solid purchase if you looking for a low price bass heavy wireless earphone

name: Aswin Ramachandran
title: Disappointed
content: Quite disappointed. This gave issues to my laptop speakers and isn't working after 2 weeks use. Though the controls are working, no sound seems to be appearing from the ear phones any more.

name: shahinsha
title: Super service
content: Good customer support. Good service provided by support team. Good response from service team. Super built quality. Noise cancelling nice. Connectivity is faster. Sound quality is simply super. Overall nice product in budget price

name: Hemant sahu
title: Connection issue
content: I have bought it on 24th October but from yesterday 18th Dec I am facing connection issues. While on call it keeps getting disconnected and connected automatically. Is there any solution for this??

name: Viplav Mishra
title: Good Quality Product..
content: Good comfortable flexible featherlight neckband. Sound and balance in both the ears are awesome....small sized earplugs...can be worn under helmet also...pairing is also easy..... However there occurs slight lag in connectivity when the bluetooth source is few metres away. I found the range to be approx 9m.. Overall a good investment for the price it costs...GO FOR ITüëçüëç

name: priyank
title: Value for money, Just go for it..
content: Using from last 2 months. Here is my review... 1. Sound quality is good. 2. Decent call quality. 3. Good build quality. 4. Light weight. 5. Bluetooth connectivity can be improved

name: Aatif Nisar
title: Good product
content: Its a very good product. I recommended it to many of my friends. But the only problem buying this product is customer servive. My right side buds' sound suddenly dropped. I wanted to exchange as it was on warranty. I sent them a lot of mails and even called them still i got no positive response.

name: Pratheep C
title: Superb battery life
content: What I like the most is the battery life. I charged it once and used it for three days (mostly for calls and some time for media )and then left unattended. It's almost ten days now and still it's 50% charge left. I am very happy with this.. Quality wise also it's good..

name: MANTASHA KHAN
title: Go for it ...
content: The quality earphones is very good especially the neck band is very comfortable to wear.Pairing with your mobile is very easy. With good battery backup and one year warranty.... Sound quality in these earphones are excellent,noise cancellation and base quality is also good.

name: Hemanth kumar
title: Repair in 1 month...
content: I have purchased on 12th Nov.....Up to 8th dec ...It was working good...But suddenly it is not working ...If we press on hold the power button then it is working if we release the power button then it is disconnecting...... Remain everything ok i.e., sound quality etc..

name: Shivansh Saini
title: Service center problem
content: I'm from Lucknow, I search for Boult service center unfortunately their is no service center register on Google map and I also search online helpline , support functions their given no. Is unavailable.. Some times it connected with the phone but sound not coming from earbuds

name: Dr.Yashashvi Choudhary
title: No bass at all
content: Bass is just 0. Any one lookin for a good music experience will be totally disappointed. Slightly loud volume it screeches into ears.. Returning back within jus 2 days of use

name: Abhijeet
title: Poor build quality
content: It last only for 6 to 7 months, if you use regularly then it will only last for 3 to 4 months. Poor build quality

name: Indira Nayak
title: Best at this price
content: Its good...charges 100% only in 1 hr and battery bkup is 12hrs...good in this price...i got it in 899rs during sale...i will suggest this if u are looking neckband within 1000 range

name: Reema
title: Best Quality products but but but Customer care service very bad
content: Excellent Performance and more than 10 hours battery backup..customer care not responding on the 9555602505..... After one month use its power button not working

name: Hemant More
title: Baying 2 boult blootuth items Foult in 1 item On / Off button are not working
content: Baying 2 boult blootuth items. Foult in 1 item. On / Off button are not working

name: Pratik Patil
title: Bang for bucks! Go for it!
content: At this price point, what you get is really amazing! I would recommend you to go for these headphones!. Just be careful with what package you got. At first I got already opened package. I replaced it & got new one.. New headphones are best quality!

name: Vikas R.
title: Sound quality , build quality
content: totally made of plastic , voice shatters just after 3 metres, there is approximately no bass, adds to your looks , easy to handle and quick pairing, but still could have been better in this price.. Confirming the review after using for about 9 days now.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good product at this price
content: The product is amazing.. Good bass and treble, noise cancellation is also up to the mark.. Good product at this price.. Reccomended to ppl who listen to music all time and also is over the phone mostly.

name: Dharmendra Singh
title: Everything is good except sound quality
content: Design - 5 star. Battery - 5 star. Bluetooth range - 4 star. Sound quality - 3 star. Bass - 3 star. Loudness - 3 star. Noise cancellation - 3 star. Mic. quality - 4 star. Still gets the work done like normal music playback and handsfree calls.

name: Vinay
title: Good quality 4.5/5. But It's not vibrating.
content: Very nice earphones. Sound quality is good. Bass is not too loud. Mic sound is clear to the other party. Built quality is fine it's Flexible. Issue is It's suppose to vibrate on incoming calls, but it simply doesn't. Is there a problem with my phone or with this device.? Do I need to make any changes in my phone settings?

name: Ashrafi Aftab
title: Good but coupon expired.
content: Product is awesome ear birds are very convenient. I bought ftwo pieces and suggested friends too and two more bought.. However they gave one card for movie ticket when I tried to redeem it nothing happened and says expires.

name: Ram
title: Quality
content: Very good quality & battery lasts more than a week. Impressed by the quality & performance.

name: McVicky
title: Unsatisfied
content: I bought this 8 months ago.. this is my review after long experience: I really disappointed with price when I bought and wire extension clips both the sides r very tight and the wire quality is not good, they were slowly started breaking over the clips from 4th month onwards . Now it's totally useless.

name: Nedungilli Natarajan
title: Not a great product
content: Product is light weight. Connects very slow. But the sound quality is not good. Range for Bluetooth is very disappointing. If i move just 2 meters away it disconnects. Vibrator is so powerful. Some times it feels like a shock in neck. With 100% charge you can play music for 6 hours. Charging takes less than 1 hour.

name: Himansu P.
title: Battery drops from 40% to 0 in 20 mins..
content: Battery drops from 40% to 0 in 20 mins. 4-5 hours of play time.. BT range is ok, music quality is ok not great.. too much of noisy... No noise cancellation

name: NRK
title: Good one
content: Overall good product. Definitely worth it's price. Bought it at Rs. 799 after all discounts.

name: Prasad b
title: Bass quality is better
content: Good sound and awesome bass quality. Battery backup long running 10 hours. Better Sound clear when I call to other . I will buy again for friends family only boult product. And delivery service is better.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent battery and very good sound quality
content: Excellent battery back up for full 2 days, very comfortable to use, mix quality is also good. I am satisfied with the product.

name: Madhu Kittur
title: Battery *****
content: Connection issues. Takes a lot of time to connect to phone. But the sound quality and battery life is too good!!

name: RajKC
title: Good.
content: Good at this price. If u r looking for a bluetooth neckband at a lower price with decent sound quality, this is the one. Also for ppl who need earphones while wearing helmet, go for this one, its very comfortable in the ears.

name: Borah & Company
title: Moderate product
content: The neck band is not fitted well in neck like other brand's neck band. It often falls down.

name: Kanchana
title: Did they sell me a faulty piece?
content: since the time I bought this thing, I couldn‚Äôt have been more disappointed with it!. Reason 1: the ear buds don‚Äôt fit it properly EVERY TIME. Reason 2: the charge runs out really fast!. Reason 3: and it stopped working on the 33rd day from the date of delivery!! Wow

name: Bunny
title: Not working ...I want to return
content: I brought in may 2020 to present on my sister birthday its not working now ... Now there is no return policy also ..I wasted my money ...so tell me the solution what to do?

name: Ramesh Babu
title: Boult Bluetooth Headset
content: I have purchased one week back. This is looking very beautiful. Audio quality is excellent. I am satisfied.

name: S
title: Very bad
content: Very poor quality. The first one didn‚Äôt work within a month. Was replaced with another one which is now not working after 2 months!

name: Abhishek Pandey
title: Review to get a movie voucher üòÖüòù
content: First product was faulty wherein left headphone was not giving the required output. Ordered a replacement and as usual amazon was able to replace it in a short time.. Battery life is the best in this price segment, sound quality upto the mark. Bluetooth connectivity is fast but the range is too short.. Even if you move 5m away from your phone, you'll be disconnected.

name: Prashant
title: Not reliable - stops working in 2months
content: After sale Service is no satisfactory, I got a call from Boult & they asked me to write a review ( my headphones was in the service center at that time.. Headphones stopped working in 2 months. Sound quality also went down in these 2 months.

name: Prathmesh Gadre
title: Satisfied with purchase
content: So far its working as expected. Sound quality is good. Gets connected easily and automatically. battery backup seems good, can last 1.5 day for moderate usage. full charging takes around 1.5+ to 2 hours.

name: saranyadharmalingam
title: Not worth for money
content: Very worst product, purchased this bluetooth headset on Nov only. 3 months worked properly after that battery gone.Not at all charging.Not at all worthy one. Warrenty is also waste . They are not responding properly.. Totally waste of money. I hate Boult product.Both wired and wireless is waste in Boult.

name: Priyanka
title: Good product and worth the price
content: Its been 3 days that I started using Boult blutooth earphones and I didnt regret once buying this product for this price.. Sound quality is good, battery duration is better than the products I used earlier and worth the money with 1 year warranty. Hope durability is good as well.

name: Mitesh P.
title: Amazing sound and value for money. Go for it.
content: I have been using these earphones since 2 months now. It has been a really great buy. It is definitely value for money for what the product has to offer. The battery life is really good and the charging is quick too. The bass is really nice and doesn‚Äôt distort the sound in high volume. The noise isolation is really good when not playing but still leaving the earphones in. All in all a best buy.

name: Manjeet Pareek
title: Great!!!
content: I am amazed when I listed the sound of the Boult ProBass Curve. I am very happy with the Boult ProBass Curve ..

name: Rajat Paliwal
title: Great quality and great price.
content: Sound Quality: Clear sound without noise.. Noise cancellation: After putting on these earphones you can get lost in music forgetting the world around you. It's great at it.. Bass quality: With current pricing, it's one of the best you'll get in category.. Only problem mic voice is low and length of wire is a bit short from neck to ear.

name: Shiv
title: Value for money!!!
content: This is my first Boult product and seriously I am satisfied. I got it for 999/- and at this price range, didn't expect to be such amazing product.. Pro: 6+ hours of battery time. Mids are crystal clear. Bass is punchy. Magnetic. Compact. Cons: highs are a little distorted. Wires are very thin, so require a little care

name: Chirag Vageria
title: Reasonable product....
content: After 3 days of use:. Connectivity - 5-6 meters. Quality of sound is good. I have marathon calls for almost 5-6 hours a day... I had to charge my battery once after 2 days of use... according me product should be priced between INR 800 to INR 1000

name: Viki Routray
title: Awesome performance with a sporty look!
content: The sound quality and bass thumping is unquestionable but only defect i found in my product on the second day is vibration. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. Apart from that the Neckband's design is awesome and gives a sporty look. I am thinking to replace the item!

name: Raghavulu Meruva
title: It's good product with very good bass and noise cancellation
content: When the battery is 20% it keeps saying battery is low for every 2min. Alert should come only once when the battery is 20%. Should add one more feature that is when the magnetic buds connected together bluetooth should be disabled. This will save the battery for the earphones.

name: Pr√†d√´ep
title: Connectivity issues
content: Bluetooth connectivity is worst, not reliable. Audio gitters when we touch Bluetooth module. Also I have a doubt about battery life. I don't think it lasts for 10 hours its only 5 hours I'm getting with my usage.

name: santhosh
title: Works good if the battery is more than 50%
content: Really disappointed.. A fantastic BT earphone but getting worst if the baterry level wents below 50%.. First time getting So disappointed from Amazon.

name: kaustubh
title: Best product
content: I‚Äôll received my BoultCurve. Its really awesome. Sound quality is so good n clear. 12+ hours of usage in one full charge. I was never expecting this premium quality headset with this price segment. Just go for it.

name: DIWAKAR CHOUBEY
title: Very bad product provided by amazon
content: I bought a Boult curve Pro bass earphone but I got some problem in that eaphone so I replacment that after Amazon provide me different earphone which is very bad sound in comparison of first earphone.model has been changed.

name: Zahirul Hasan Khan
title: Product is good but got 2 defective items.
content: Bought it after seeing all those positive reviews but the first item was defective as only the right ear was working but the left one was not. Got it exchanged and the second item had battery issues. Only after 30-40 minutes of use battery drains to zero. Then only after 10 minutes of charging battery gets full.

name: Nalluri Srinivasu
title: Feel Discomfort
content: 1. Low end mobiles forget it.. 2. Not comfortable wire.. 3. Bass Avarage. 4. Noise Cancellation Avg+. 5. No Premium Look. 6. Discomfort... It's my usage report...

name: Nilesh Gadiya
title: Stopped working immediately after one month from the use..
content: Stopped working immediately after one month from the use.. please do not buy.. Marked mail to customer care but no one responding as well.. pathetic after sale service and the worst product I bought and money wasted..

name: Roshni
title: Stopped charging.
content: It does not charge anymore. What do I do? It heats up like crazy the minute I plug it in.

name: Tapan Kr Chakrawarti
title: Excellent product.
content: Very good product. Battery back up is satisfactory. I am using the product for a month. Back up last for 3/4 days. It is very useful for me, because I can do my office work in computer whenever any call comes to me without hassale.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Don't buy
content: Awesome product. Loved it at the beginning but not even 5 months it's battery exploded. Thank God I was not wearing it while it exploded . And there's a 1 year warranty on the product. I have tried to contact boult support many times but no use. I have emailed them and also call but there is no response.

name: PRAVEEN
title: A very low quality product
content: This product crashed after 5 months. Power button failed to turn on. Audio quality was also not good. Experienced trouble with Bluetooth even at 10ft distance. Overall a bad experience with this product. I dont recommend this product to anyone.

name: Lohith Gowda
title: 100% value for money
content: Great earphones. Absolutely love it. The only issue I faced with these is that it hurt the earlobes after using for long as the speaker housing is a little too big for my ears. Apart from that, everything else is amazing

name: Ritesh Ghosh
title: "Boult" from the Blue
content: I am extremely satisfied with the product. Starting from its packaging & presentation ti it's looks and features, everything was exactly as had been described by the seller. I use it regularly now whenever Iam cycling or commuting. I would Highly recommend this product for all.

name: Mudassir Nazar
title: All Good
content: I like the sound very much . An it's very comfortable with my ears. I don't feel any pain in my ears .. Overall product was Good.

name: Rijo T Thomas
title: worse product, payed reviews are there
content: Sound quality of the product is very nice.. but you should go for boat beacuse audio quality is not good.dont buy this product upon the reviews posted these reviews are posted because of 100 rs cashback is given by the boult audio for putting the review after buying this product

name: Sarwan
title: Absolutely awesome
content: Awesome product with very good battery backup upto 3day . Bass is superb. Little problem with sound but negligible . Confertable while running and sleeping too. Really happy with this product . I used many of Bluetooth headphones but the battery backup I found in this product really great

name: Alen Joseph
title: Bang for buck.
content: Awesome product. Great battery life and charges fast as well. My daily driver. Very light and comfortable to use. Super quick connectivity as well. Have not experienced any connection drop issues till now. Great sound quality. Great job Boult. Keep up the good work.

name: Ram K.
title: Great peoduct good choice for gifting...
content: Very good product by BOULT Audio. got it for 8 9 9 ony in sale. Crystal clear sound with good enough bearable bass. Red color is stunning good. loved it very much. Thank you Amazon for such a good deal.

name: Om
title: Good customer service
content: I bought Boult earphones couple of weeks back.. The product came out to be defective after using it for a 10-15 days. I mailed the the company about the issue and they made sure to resolve the problem as early as they could.. That's what I really appreciate about the company's policy.

name: Madhava Rao
title: Works both with mobile and PC
content: Liked the product overall. Using for more than 2 months now.. Headset works well with both my PC and mobile at a time without much hassle to switch. This helps me a lot when doing work from home to pick calls either way.. It also charges very quickly

name: Puttabasappa
title: It's suitable for music only, not upto the mark for calls..
content: Bass is good, sound quality is also upto the mark, but the caller sound is not how the specifications are mentioned, when you are speaking over call, it won't be audible to the other person sometime, it happens every second time. Bit disappointed with the product.

name: kunika Bansal
title: Good features but defective product
content: Sound Quality and Noise Cancellation are good, but the earbuds are too large for my ears these doesn't stay in place o have to adjust every time.. Within 2 months of buying one side of headphone stopped working and it turned off even though i have fully charged in morning

name: Mahesh Soni
title: Bad quality Product
content: Battery draining very fast, it's just only 1 month. After complaining about 1 month, no response to from the Boult, instead of this KDM Bluetooth headphones is recommended, it's the half price of this and sound quality time is superb. Conclusion it's a totally waste of money.

name: Samrat
title: No value of money
content: One of the wrost product I have ever used,after using one month it getting damaged üòï its not getting on even after charging three hours .don't buy, its completely waste of money.i recommend you not to buy,services was not good by boult...its better tou buy other products.

name: chethan m
title: One time charge = continuous 3 days
content: Literally this is the best product I have seen....with good performance.. This tiny battery makes your jaws down moment.. One charge = 3days even though using it .. I bet anyone can buy this genuine product.. Totally Amazed. Thank you so much recommend by Amazon

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst after service
content: Overall product is good but the after service is worst . They don't have a service center, you have to send them by courier and they take like 7-10 days to give your product in comparison to other companies which exhange products in less than an hour.

name: Sai Charan Tej Mukthavaram
title: Boult supplyer thinks customer is fool.
content: They have delivered the used product and it have scratches on it no stickers for magnets over all worst product.

name: Mahalingayya Hiremath
title: It's nice product
content: Hi, I'm using it since 3 days,. It's basically a nice product in this price range, BT connection is good & we can pair with the device easily, sound quality is good but Deep bass I didn't feel in this, noise cancellation is poor, but mic performance is also good.... The build material quality is not satisfied.... Anyway overall performance is good...

name: ruthravelu
title: plz help support costumer care.
content: Last month this products automatically switched off not working properly not on. i try charging than Not working... but after 15 days try to battery charging is working good. Nowadays I am using working fine... plz support costumer care. If any problems.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Fake product
content: I bought this product due to its better review on Amazon. But after purchasing it disappointed me. Don't consider its 4 star review. It's fake. Except good look it has not any quality. Battery backup very poor. Sound quality poor. As per its quality its cost should be Rs 300.

name: Mehul Patel
title: Music that you can feel.!
content: After using for a month , I can definitely say that "JUST GO FOR IT" . A wonderful sound quality with moderate bass will give you completely different experience. It fits on the backside of the neck so well that you couldn't even feel the weight of it. Durability is also promising. People who love "high pitch of bass" might not find this perfect for them. Overall experience is satisfactory.

name: Santosh
title: Awesome earphones
content: The earphones are comfortably ¬†fit, crisp audio for media streaming and phone calls, and a hands-free experience to interact with the smartphone via digital assistant good improvements in Bluetooth, microphone technologies, and battery life have made them a must-have purchase

name: Vishwajit
title: Value for money!
content: This product has quiet balanced sound in terms treble and bass and has good noise isolation.. Battery life is good and currently using for last 6 hours continuously and has not lasted still.. I am a big bass lover and need little more enhanced bass for my requirements, but this one has balanced one.. I hope this review will help for your purchase.

name: ‡§Ö‡§Ç‡§ï‡•Å‡§∞
title: MIC stopped working with in 1 month
content: Given all over 1 star as the mic of the head phone stopped working.....have registered the complain in website......waiting for the the company revert on the issue.......seeking help from Amazon also on resolution of the same.....

name: Santanu
title: Looks good!
content: Good product woth reasonable price. Voice quality is great. Will update my review after a month of use.

name: Amalkrishnan
title: Recommended only at 999rs.
content: I got it at 999rs based on that the sound quality is satisfying and build quality is satisfying.. Bass is 3.5/5. Build quality 4/5. Over all its good.. But not worthy of regular price which is 1400-1600. Only recommended to buy during sale at 999 or less.. Description says they give a free travel case but no they dont.

name: Srisankaraswaminathan
title: Awesome bluetooth headset
content: A very good one in this range. The quality and strength are good. The battery backup is also good. Works fine with my android phone and MacBook. Give it a try

name: Om Tiwari
title: Great product with affordable prices.
content: Great quality . Purchasing it again cause of its sound quality and noise cancellation . Being sweatproof is also great advantage of this product. Simply loved it.. There is only one complain about product is vibration. It doesn't vibrate when you receive a call or put it on or off.

name: Hussain kachwala
title: likes and dislikes
content: The product is good with wieght and comfortable around the neck. The bass is okay too. Noise cancellation is very poor, can't talk on call specially when u r riding bike at even slow speed, also your Bluetooth connectivity goes disturbed when you put your cellphone in pocket. Vibration is so loud that it irritates. Earbuds are comfortable and the magnets are good to hold each other.

name: Kirti
title: Headphones
content: Bass is not that great but overall other features for noise cancellation or sound quality and price point the product is amazing.

name: Vaibhav.masane
title: Boult audio proBass Curvepro
content: The built quality and the in hand feel of this erphones is good fir the price & regarding the sound quality the bass is sure loud and clear and its also great earphones to take calls and im just impressed with the battery backup its great.

name: balakumar
title: Quality and reliable product for a reasonable price tag
content: Sound quality is quite nice. Battery backup stand by lasts for more than 20 days. Without charging for more than 20 days and not using it, it's battery remains 80%. For usage it works for 5 hours normally with a single charge. Totally I am satisfied .

name: Aditya Paul
title: Best at this price range
content: If you are confused between boAt rockerz 255 and boult curve. I think you go for these as i used both of them.. The in line mic on the boAt rockerz 255 is not as good as the one on these.. Boult Curve looks stronger than boAt rockerz 255 and is

name: Soumen Kumar Mondal
title: Wors experience - Can only smile on the product :-).
content: Dont buy...... Worst product bought ever. Within 2 days due to battery or some other technical issue never able to use it.. After sales service:- Raised complaint and reply came "courier to Delhi, we will see".. Review to company- Guys stop the business or else come and collect ur product.

name: Anirudha Biswas
title: I want replacement
content: After 3 months of purchase it's stop working. Unable to contact customer care. They never pickup the phone. Also I mailed them but they never replied

name: Lokesh s.
title: Boat rockrz 255 vs this
content: If u r luking for bass...then its big no 4 u...go for boat rockrz 255....but 1 good thing is its earphones don't hang till half of ur chest.... comfortable 2 wear as compare 2 boat earphones

name: Ravi
title: Noise issue at right earplug
content: Ordered it and request for return within an hour. There is some disturbance sound at right earplug. Sound and bass is also average. Unfortunately there is replacement policy so no return and I requested for replacement.

name: vishal
title: Faulty and worst product

name: Aditi Patni
title: Worthy!!
content: Sound quality is good and it is worthy for the price. It has amazing features, lightweight and looks good. Also it comes with a 1 year warranty which is amazing! Give it a try.

name: AVINASH
title: Good Neckband,But.....

Except that everything is Good....

name: AG
title: Very poor!

I got it replaced by a new one but still the sound quality is really bad, it catches the background sounds but the sound of the person is very unclear for the listener on other side. It gets disconnected automatically and sometimes only music can be heard but the voice calling option gets turned off.. Its waste of money and very annoying.

name: Yadav shiva
title: Think twice before you buy
content: Pack was open unexpected from Amazon quality is ok kind of in this range can get another brand products with more good quality

name: Tina Shetty
title: Review
content: I have been having some issues with the call volumes, the opposite person finds it difficult to hear volume on the lower side otherwise all good went listen to music

name: rajiv
title: Wire cover getting break always
content: Do not have any concern about sound quality just have a worse noise cancellation bit more than that its 3rd same product that i purchased and all the 3times i got same build quality issue that the wire cover get breaks and wire comes out hence the earphone got damage after few days.

name: rajesh8607
title: Seller sending defective product
content: Zero star for seller as was sending me the defective product, I have went to service center they replaced it. Otherwise new received product is awesome

name: Gangadhar Rao
title: Good product
content: The product is great in this price range. The design looks cool. Earbuds do not slip out during jogging. Good sound quality.. Incoming call vibration is a bit harsh. Overall it's best buy within this price range

name: edwin joseph
title: Not as expected
content: Not as expected for this price. Even the switch is not fixed properly, it's keep shaking. Until now it's just work...ok ok only

name: Sanjoy Roy
title: Most disgusting customer service. Defective product . Company does not respond
content: The earphone after using for two months only is not working and after writing to the company number of times there has been no response. Inspite of having a one year warranty this type of callous approach is not acceptable. This is clear case of cheating . Pls do not buy Boult products

name: RAJESH PATHAK
title: Boult curve head phones is best Qualities
content: Why anyone buys a Bluetooth earphone?. ... So that they can do their work freely while having earphone on. Imagine the voice continuously breaking while you have that plugged into your ears listening to your favorite song.. I assure that is one of the most annoying thing you can experience

name: Balaji Chinnasamy
title: Value for money
content: Amazing neck band with strudy quality and never comes out even while jogging and connecting to smartphone is just a few seconds. Can able to answer phone calls without any drop and call quality is good.. Go for it if you looking for a budget based and superb quality..

name: Raju
title: Not a setisfectory purchase
content: Bluetooth connectivity is poor just aftt a month use. it got distracted and sometimes disconnected for a while, Now it is useless as one can not every time press play pause button keeping phon in hand as it has to stop working.. Make some quality product... Making copy is not enough

name: Girish Shenoy
title: Excellent value to money! Good sound
content: Excellent value to money, good sound. bass ok. I didn't find any cons. I recommend this product to all music lovers. Battery backup is good.

name: Raghuram
title: There is NO SOLUTION once its not working
content: It's been 8 weeks since I got this product, for a wireless earphone is was pretty decent with range and audio quality. But now it's misbehaving/not working and the customer care no. Is not reachable and no response to the email too. I think they don't even have a service center in India. Can better go for some standard brands like samsung, sennheiser or Skullcandy etc...

name: Heisenberg
title: Dead in less than 2 months
content: Was working fine till first 40 days. Then dead completely. Raised request to process my warranty. Would update once done.

name: Sandeep Sharma.
title: Very Thin Wire

name: Amazon Customer
title: Expect better quality at this price point
content: I was not expecting much of sound quality when I bought it. But what was surprising was that the sound quality was way below par. Even more surprising was that the connection was unstable.

name: Xavier
title: Worst Sounding Earphones

name: Nilesh Malandkar

content: 1.Improve bass quality of this product, bass is very low .... 2.Bass is cracking into the song.... 3. Very tight for the Ear that's why after 15 minutes ear paining very badly ..... 4.Battery drain on 30% and got continues reminder to charge it...

name: Palash
title: Good product

name: Shiva
title: Everything Good but Dead

name: karthik
title: Absolute value for money bluetooth earphone

name: Avinash Doiphode
title: It's not working in 15 days

name: praveen kumar singh
title: Very bad experience

name: Avais M.
title: Okayishhh...

name: prodip k.
title: Product description
content: This product is good but reaching the battery level at 20% it continues messaging battery level low...who's is not good.,. either you have to recharge it or you have to switch off the device.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best neckband in the segment
content: Perfect budget neckband. Battery life is better than most of the neckbands in this segment. Audio and bass is better. It would have been more better if the treble is little more good.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Vibration is not working
content: In the user manual it specifies that press and hold the power button for 7 seconds then it vibrates. I have ordered the first item and returned as it was not vibrating. Again i have received the new one with the same problem. I assume amazon is selling defected pieces with the offers as i have experienced same issues for these two items and product looks like not a sealed piece..

name: Surya
title: Yes responded &  sent new one...... thanks

name: Vishal Kudu
title: Not value for money,Please dont buy.

I would recommend this product for all the customers who are reading this review.(Don't kill me if it doesn't work sometimes).. I am personally using this product and have become a fan of boult audio. Thanks Boult Audio for launching this wonderful product.

name: MAHENDRA
title: Best ever till now

name: Kiran kanna
title: Over all my review and rating

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good Sound Qualiy

name: Vishnu
title: Happy customer ‚úåüèº

name: Pruthvi

name: Prasad P.
title: Very disappointed about this product.
content: I bought this product from amazon.. But after using it for 5 or 6 days it was stop working. Nothing is working. It not getting on, not getting charged also now showing any blue light and all. It's completely gone off/faulty.. Very disappointed about this product.

name: Deactivated account
title: Boult curve positive review

name: RUPESH SHAH

name: Talluri Nithej chowdary

name: Dr. Dastidar

name: Yamini
