name: Chetan Chavan
title: not original product
content: I have used these earphones hardly for 1 month and now it's not working, fake product.. the overall product is not as comparable to original boult earphones

name: Mohan Kumareshan
title: Go for it without a thought :)
content: A really well-engineered product at this price point. Worth every single penny. Don't hesitate to purchase it after negative reviews from customers who received faulty products by accident.

name: suresh
title: Defective
content: I have received a defective product. Initially it was fine. But after few days it's not charging. Whenever I connect to charger it's continuously vibrating. Unusable now. Return window also closed. Very bad service from Boult and Amazon. Frustrating.

name: chaitanya
title: This is great
content: I was skeptical abt the bass and voice clarity . But it really performed better , voice clarity is good and sound latency is no where to be found yet . Even while playing PUBG u don't find any voice lags . This is the best budget bluetooth earphone.

name: Shivani
title: It's ok ok.
content: Sound quality is good and base too. As i experienced that treble is little high.Apart from treble the earphone is good. There is an advantage for customer if the earphone wouldn't work in warranty period they will provide us brand new earphone instead of repair them.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Faulty earphones
content: Used it for a week. The device is faulty. There's a lot of noise and also beeping sounds when we are using this earphones. Just a waste of money. No replacement available after a week. And it started behaving badly after a week.

name: Pratik Kumar Sahu
title: Needs little modification
content: There was lag in audio streaming. Also the battery drained too quickly at times. The sound quality was good. There was also passive noise cancellation which at this price range is very good. The earphones were light weight so didn't cause any discomfort

name: Benet
title: Awesome device
content: I purchased this product like almost 1 month .. It's really great mostly i use it for listening music and watching movies . I fell like awesome. It really gives nice sounds. Most of people around my age will like it .It has good bass and all . I like it very much..

name: Ananda babar
title: Amazing
content: Good product !. Though the material of the headphones is very light dont know how long will it last..but the sound quality is superb .. these are noise cancellation headphones. Pretty impressed with the sound quality of the headphones for the given price

name: Saurabh Tupe
title: Cheap but Amazing
content: Boult audio pross bass curve has great sound quality. Even at high volume the sound clearity is great and there is no distortion. Bass could have been better but for this price i think it's amazing. If you are tight on budget and want good bluetooth earphones go for this one.

name: Vijay P.
title: Fake Product
content: Don't purchase this product. This is not trustable company. I purchased 2 pieces one in Amazon and other in TATA Cliq and both of them are not working. If there is a problem in one piece we can understand but both of them are not working.

name: Dhruva S.
title: A cost effective product
content: The material of the product is really good... Been using it for about an year now and it still looks new. The sound quality is good and the noise cancellation is amazing. Also the battery lasts for about 10-11 hours even after being used for long. Overall a really good product from boult.

name: Sunny Mutha
title: Not worth as these are not durable and earpiece quality is not upto the mark
content: Found surprising from Brand: Boult, had expectation that the earpiece would be durable however these are made up of low quality and will damage very soon. In same range, my experience with BoAt is just amazing, way better. I am returning this product.

name: Sharath_kushal
title: My words!
content: Built quality is good,audio clarity is also good, only the draw back of this headphone I have found is poor bass quality, If you are a melody songs lover bass doesn't bother you anyway! battery backup is upto the mark.

name: Govind
title: Awesome prodüòÜ
content: Very nice prod... Battery life is brilliant... Almost two three days working while i listen it almost 4 hours daily. Bass is very good and sound is crisp

name: Maheshwar dhruw
title: Its powerpack of large battery and balanced sound
content: In this prize segment , curv pro is valuable product,.. Pros- balanced sound , good bass , long battery, verry slick design & noise canceletion is also good.. Cons.- not heavy bass but its good, noise cancelation is also not very good but it's ok,

name: Prakhar
title: Boult audio regular customer
content: Using boult curve from past 2 years and I like boult audio sound signature that's why I again opted for these earphones also their were no warranty issues because I once changed my previous earphones and the response was good and quick so happy with the product

name: Charan
title: Best in the market
content: Worth every penny. voice quality is better than sony.. 5 stars for bass music.. Best battery backup 15 hrs.. Boult is the best for all accessories.. good for playing games also. It can manage all internal playing voice as well as call voice.

name: Srinivasan
title: Boult probase curve
content: Description. In product says bluetooth version 5.0 but it's 4.2 and range is comfortable in less than 3m

name: TEJAS LAXMAN CHAVAN
title: Best quality
content: Light weight, better battery performance, awesome sound quality easily carry and best fit for playing games, gym ,any traveling purpose.

name: Alok
title: Best music clarity and good build quality
content: It is a very good earphone with good build quality and excellent sound. It is not bass emphasised and hence you can enjoy pure music....

name: Chaitanya B
title: What a powerful earphones
content: The quality product from boult audio. The sound clarity, Deep bass takes it to the next level of music with an amazing battery life. I brought it for 1299/- and it worth.. Advise to Boult Audio: Please add rubber buttons instead of plastic.

name: Kannan
title: Wonderful budget headphone.., recommend..
content: Past 3 weeks am using, battery packup is very good and sound quality is wonderful,. Small suggestion on the neck round mic end volume and power button has loose ends,when we shake you will hear the sound, next edition they can arrest it,. Vibration when phone rings is good, if the Bluetooth went out of range it vibrates and indentify to switch off, I love that

name: We three
title: Pretty good product

name: rama krishna
title: Bad experience and not upto to the satisfaction
content: I had a bad experience with this product. It got repaired twice by company. I had spend 900 rupees for courier charges to ship the product to Delhi. This amount is equal to the product cost.the start/stop buttons are not worked properly.

name: Pk
title: Good one.
content: I have been using this Product for almost 10 Months & After 10 months it stopped working. but I really love the sound quality of my Boult Audio Curve Neckband. Sound Quality is very decent. I send to service and Now I returned back new one . But again damaged within one week

name: Abhiraj Patole
title: Over all Good product to use
content: The sound quality is very good of the product. The neck band comfortably fits around neck, the ear plugs does not get out of ears with proper ear knobs with it. The battery life is quite good.. Only the charging flap is totally dislocated when opened for charging. Also, the previous song is not played on long press of negative button.

name: bharat bagda
title: Crap item...useless...wasted money
content: Stay away from his crap. Its traps they do not have return option but you only have replacement option......wasted my money on this product...name says pro bass...my first experience was ...no bass at all.... not even comparable to Rs 50 ear phone. Stay away...

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not worthy
content: I bought it to test the product quality but it doesn't even fare well compared to a product of the same price by BOATS.. Bluetooth gets disconnected when phone inside pocket. Noise cancellation is not worthy of the prices. Sound quality is average.. I wouldn't recommend this product.

name: Arnab Sadhu
title: Superb Boult Neckband Headset
content: I was little confused while buying boult headset bcz other where selling in 2.5k to 4k other brands . I was thinking if the product was not good in the range I have purchased then my amount will be wasted but when I have received the product then I was shocked that it was so beautiful Bluetooth headset we can use it anywhere while working .. Thank you for the product

name: Amazon Customer
title: Easy service system
content: Product is good and it was working excellent, after using a month the connectivity was drop after 10 to 15 mints of uses. Later after few days after charging 100% device is not opening. Now the device is totally dead condition.

name: Rohit Srivastava
title: Just love it
content: Love this Bluetooth headphone. The best I have used especially for talk back on calls perfect clarity and very comfortable to wear

name: Subhran
title: Late sound and stopped working

name: rgns@A2Z
title: Good Quality

name: Suroor Bin Muhammed

name: Kindle Customer
title: You won't regret buying this one!
content: I recently purchased it for my dad. It is very light weight and the audio quality is Crystal clear. I bought one for my wife also and she is very excited. The battery life is also very good. If you are planning to but then I certainly recommend it!

name: YOGESH
title: Awesomeüëç

name: Prince Kumar

name: Ajinkya More

name: Akshita Bansal
title: Okay product

name: Sarbananda
title: Value for money.

name: udaybhan
title: Value For Money.

name: Ravikumar

name: Sudin Sengupta

Vibration alert is too good. Connectivity issue is there... Workaround - keep your phone in front of you or in hand. Overall a good budget option.

name: Amit Joshi
title: Chota Package Bada Dhamaka

name: avdreamz
title: Durable...high bass workout headphones.
content: Excellent headphones for the price with good sound clarity and reasonable noise cancellation.. The headphones are very durable with great bass for high energy music...highly recommended.

name: sandeep kabra

name: Santan sharma

name: sunil babu
title: How to warranty claim
content: After two months my neckband was got damaged but the service of boult audio is really awasome he replaced my neckband and now again we listen the sweet sound of boult audio neckband

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good one
content: Great headphones with good sound quality and very comfortable and stylish neckband. Microphone works good, can easily take calls. Battery last for long time. These are really good at this price range(999). I liked it a lot and recommended to my friends also.

name: Abhijeet Kumar
title: Good as price
content: I'm using this since 1 year.... No complaints as I have used it too much... But now it sometimes don't pair with my mobile ..... It's a value for money product.. bur I would suggest go for JBL, Sony, or branded products.

name: Sruthi Suresh
title: Worst product
content: Bought the product and it stopped working in 2 months, customer care won't reply and the 1-year warranty they mentioned is a fake one. You can try your luck by buying a local product at Rs. 300-500 but not this one.

name: nitin y.
title: Not working after 20 days... Post sale service is worst
content: It stopped getting charged after 20 days.... Post sales service is worst as you have to dispatch it with your own pocket and you don't know when they will send it back...

name: Sachin Sharma
title: Good pair of earphones in the price range
content: Biggest complaint is it doesn't vibrate as advertised. Biggest quality of these earphones is their bass, Clarity of sound is also good considering the price. Battery life is also very good. Magnetic pause feature could have been a charm.

name: khadeer ahmed N
title: In good condition
content: The sound quality is so good.i used this product for 11 months its working good.But last month one side of boult curve earphone is not working. I have been contacted with them they are providing me a replacement.good product and good services impressive

name: Dharmender Kaushik
title: Built quality is good

name: Hyderabad Family
title: Great product

name: Momita singha
title: Sound quality is amazing!!

name: Vini
title: Users friendly product

name: preethy
title: The awesome product to buy
content: The Boult curve is the most comfortable, best overall in ear bluetooth sports headphone you can by right now.! The headphone works decently as a headset for making calls and has an auto off feature to preserve battery life. Battery life tops out at 12 hours.

name: Mayur Dhere
title: After 2months of use

name: Amazon Customer

content: I have purchased this recently, and the sound quality is awesome. The best feature is its battery life. I am very satisfied with the battery life. Overall it is a good product to purchase

name: Amazon user

Initially I was confused between boat and boult audio but i am happy that i purchased Boult audio because its sound soothes the ear and it is wearable for long hours due to light weight and its soft to ears. Overall very good sound machine and looks professional as well.

name: Aayush Shrivastava
title: 4 Star

content: I believe this is the best product in this price range , overall sound quality is excellent and the thing which impressed me most is the its monster battery which lasts for 12 hours

name: Bharath
title: Must Buy...!!!
content: I have been using this for 6 months now, the sound quality is amazing. Battery life is great. The connectivity is simple and effective. Best headphones at this price range ...üòÅüòÅüòÅ

name: Jyoti kashyap
title: It's one earplug isn't working properly and its sound quality becomes worst sometimes.
content: I liked the product but it's not working good. It's one earplug is not working also and sometimes after connecting it with the phone it doesn't work and sound quality becomes worst.

name: Muthu kumar
title: Don't buy this simply your money will waste
content: Dont recomment to others my headset only one month old. Facing several issues headset not charging latency issue automatic disconnecting issue. Dont waste your money by buying this.

name: CHANDAN BHOWMICK
title: Cool Product
content: You cannot get a product like this at this price. One of the best bluetooth headphones available in market. Ergonomic design and good sound quality !!

name: LOK
title: Stopped working
content: Worst quality. Stopped working in 14 days.

name: Siddharth panikar
title: Absolute value for money. Better than boats 255
content: Cons-Built quality feels a bit cheap.. Cons-blue tooth connection does drop a little from time to time.. Pros-Unbelievable sound quality, even when compared to devices at 5 times the cost.. Everything else about this device works well.

name: krishna
title: value buy
content: its working fine and good buy in the offered price brand

name: Rosy Menezes
title: Bad Buy
content: The product doesnt work... After presding the power on button... The first piece was replaced... The second worked for a few days and now doesnt work at all.... Bad buy.

name: Priyanka
title: Good Value for money, amazing sound quality with a good mic
content: Pros:. 1. The sound quality is really good. 2. The neckband looks good.. 3. Bass is good, listening to music is a pleasant experience.. 4. Good battery life.. Cons:. 1. The cover on the charging port is a little fragile.

name: HRJ
title: Recieved a defective product,
content: Recieved a defective product, sound quality is not up to the mark in this price range also call alert vibration function is not working. Bluetooth connectivity keeps on dropping. Initiated a replacement request let's see if another pair will work fine

name: Amazon Customer
title: decent sound üëç
content: Good clear sound ....and its loud to enjoy every types of music ....bass is also good...but not as deep as i thought...but in 999 price segment its good....earphone wire is too thin...after 9 months of usage the wire is getting loose.
